1b1(mdo sde): ga / dus
1b2(mdo sde):
1b3(mdo sde): tsakrang shun ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du
2a1(mdo sde): // dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
2a2(mdo sde): mdo/ bam po dang / po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
2a3(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis the sa pa dus gcig na
2a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ri khal te ya zhes bya ba na/ drang srong thub pa ming po'i spyod
2b1(mdo sde): yul gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te
2b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po shasta 'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan
2b3(mdo sde): po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kya // byang chub sems dpa'i dge
2b4(mdo sde): 'dun chen po sha stag ste/ zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin
2b5(mdo sde): chen po 'dus pa las/ bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po// me tog gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ me tog gi
3a1(mdo sde): char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyun gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ rin
3a2(mdo sde): po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyun gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gre kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ lha rdzas kyi
3a3(mdo sde): gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bru ba bo// de lta bu'i sprin dang / cha ri che na pos drang srong thub pa mang
3a4(mdo sde): po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de khyab par gyur to// gsung dang / me ta ga dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / 
3a5(mdo sde): gos de dag las rin po che'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon
3a6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi
3b1(mdo sde): sgra dang / brtson 'grus rlom pa'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang / 
3b2(mdo sde): grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi khyad
3b3(mdo sde): bar la nan tan pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod
3b4(mdo sde): chags kyis yongasu skyo ba'i sgra// dang / gzugs ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu zhes// bya ba'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu
3b5(mdo sde): bur lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / 'du shas ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / 'du byed na chu shing lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang
3b6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / mi rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / 
3b7(mdo sde): steng pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang / kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / 
4a1(mdo sde): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / chos kun chud pa'i sgra dang / mtho risu skye ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang / theg
4a2(mdo sde): pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongasu smin par/ 
4a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drag yongasu rdzogs par nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pa'i sgra
4a4(mdo sde): dang sa bcu la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / ma/ ngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa la
4a5(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang / sa las phyir mi lde ga pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spri bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas
4a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / 
4a7(mdo sde): char pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong zhing / de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro yang thos par gyur nas/ de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
4b1(mdo sde): bsrung dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyun dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pa yongasu brgyan par mthong ngo // yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ yid/ 
4b2(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo // gzhan yang nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer de
4b3(mdo sde): dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas/ phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong // yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin ga
4b4(mdo sde): pa re re la yang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcwa te yongasu bskor bar mthong // gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang dgis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sems can gang nad kyis
4b5(mdo sde): gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nang kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to// gang gsad pa la hUM ga pa dang / btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang / 'od zer de
4b6(mdo sde): dag gis reg ma thag tu de las yongasu thar par gyur to// gang lus dang ngag dang / yid mi dga' bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to// ga/ 
4b7(mdo sde): bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'drangs shing ngoms par gyur to// gang gsad pa dang / chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang / 'od kyis rag ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar
4b8(mdo sde): gyur to// gang bgo ba dang / rin po che'i brgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing 'ongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang srog gcod pa la da / 
5a1(mdo sde): zhing mos pa nas/ log par lta ba'i bar du/ dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang / 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongasu spong ba la dga' zhing mos nas log par lta
5a2(mdo sde): ba'i bar du yongasu spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang / 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba
5a3(mdo sde): bzhin du rnyed par gyur to// gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag/ thams cad ni nas rab tu zhi/ bde ba dang ldan
5a4(mdo sde): te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo // gzhan ya dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / 
5a5(mdo sde): char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi'ong ba'i reg bya dang / 'jig skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po rnams
5a6(mdo sde): med par gyur to// gzhan yang las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsams pa dang / log par phyogs pa dang yongasu bral te/ lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing
5a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang / sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad kyis yongasu gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing
5a8(mdo sde): mi theg pa tsam du gyur to// ltas 'di lta bur gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na
5b1(mdo sde): brgya byin lha'i dbang po dri ma med par skyes shes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyibos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
5b2(mdo sde): 'das gang na ba log su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshogasu bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa// bden la rab gnas thub pa khyod// 'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams
5b3(mdo sde): cad la mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig/ so so'i skye bo mang po dag/ sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal sel// ci'i slad du 'khor 'dir ni// sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur// 'kha
5b4(mdo sde): rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas// shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skye ngas// theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol// yang dag da lta skye som nyi rgal// 'khor mang lha dang mi'i lus// lhag par sa
5b5(mdo sde): khams lci bas// rang gis mi theg gyur pa 'di// ci'i dri na/ gyis ltas 'di byung // lag mthil gnyis kyi na ra bu las// rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang 'gyed// phyogs
5b6(mdo sde): bcur snang byas sdig pa gsal// sdug bsngal ni nas bde ba thob// 'dren pas gsungs shig ci'i rkyen// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la// spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis// so so'i lus la
5b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa gdara'// lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes// ci'i rgyu dang ci'i rkyen// su zhig gang nas 'dir mchin// rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// 'on te tshangs
5b8(mdo sde): pa'am bdud lags sam// brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba// 'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsol// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces bka'
6a1(mdo sde): stsal to// khyed kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sngon bskal pa chen po tshad
6a2(mdo sde): med grangs med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu sems can yongasu smin par byed pa de/ da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
6a3(mdo sde): stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la lta ba dang
6a4(mdo sde): rje su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te/ dge sbyong rang gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas/ mngon par das pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to// byang chub sems
6a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de/ tshang/ med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yonatan gyi khyad par gyi yongasu brgyan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sa
6a6(mdo sde): rgyas dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i rin po/ 
6a7(mdo sde): che'i 'byung gnas yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongasu dag par byed pa'o// mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin
6a8(mdo sde): poche thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas/ ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa'o// tshong pa mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o// dge ba'i rtsab 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing
6b1(mdo sde): gshin pa lta bu'o// rnam par grol ba'i bdo ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod lta bu'o// rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnasu gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o// dge ba'i nan tan can la snang
6b2(mdo sde): bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsas pa lta bu'o// lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir bla bltar sim pa lta bu'o// rkang pa med pa la theg par gyur
6b3(mdo sde): ba lta bu'o// lam ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi lta bu'o// 'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o// smyos shing 'khrugs pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o// nad kyi gzir ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa
6b4(mdo sde): lta bu'o// rgas shing 'khogs pa la rten dang khar ba lta bu'o// dngal ba dang dub pal khri stan lta bu'i// chu bo bzhin/ la ba la zam pa lta bu'o// pha rol tu 'gro ba'i glu dang gzings lta bu
6b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu'i khyad par can smin parabyed pa'o// dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing / rgyun tu 'bebs pa'o// sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor
6b6(mdo sde): ltar 'jug pa'o// tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o// brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' ba ni rdo rje rin po che lta bu'o// bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o// bsam gtan
6b7(mdo sde): zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o// mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba dam pa lta bu'o// shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o// cis kyang mi chags pa ni na mkha'
6b8(mdo sde): lta bur// 'bras bu dam pa'i dang nye ba ni me teg rgyas pa lta bu'o// mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng gi'i rgyal po lta bu'o// lha'i bdud yong su 'joms pa ni klu'am/ glang po che lta bu'o// nyen
7a1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o// 'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang blta/ 
7a2(mdo sde): bu'o/ mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyi la sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o// kun nas nyon mongs pas klags pa gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o// 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam
7a3(mdo sde): mdza' bo lta bu'o// phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam mkhar lta bu'o// nyam nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o// zhan cing nyam chung ba rnams sbed pa ni nag
7a4(mdo sde): lcags po lta bu'o// dbyar lam ring por 'gro ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o// tsha ba dang skem gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu grang lta bu'o// bkres pa rnams la 'bras
7a5(mdo sde): bu zhim po lta bu'o// gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byedapa'o// tsha bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por rgyu ra ba'o// dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur
7a6(mdo sde): pa'o// 'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang gnas su gyur pa'o// lo thog rnams la char par gyur pa'o// chu rnyog pa can rnam+ba la nor bu chu 'dang du gyur pa'o// sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
7a7(mdo sde): mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang tshim par byed pa'o// sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba la skul zhing 'dzud pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes
7a8(mdo sde): kyi tshogs sogs pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa yongasu sel ba la skyug pa dang / 'khru ba'i sman lta bur gyur pa/ sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul
7b1(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni po chun rgyud ma'i 'khor lo lta bu'o// dmigs pa la sems sdud pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtogs pa lta bu'o// bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po// 
7b2(mdo sde): bu'o// gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni na mkha' lta bu'o// sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongasu sel ba ni/ ji ltar nyi ma tshabs la byag/ 
7b3(mdo sde): tsam com bzhu ba lta bu'o// rtag tu bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur pas ched du ma
7b4(mdo sde): bsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu skoro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med bsam
7b5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de/ 'khor dang bcas te gan sa 'dir phyin du nye bas/ 'od las 'di lta bu'i tshe 'dral dang / ltas sngar bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
7b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po// 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sa
7b7(mdo sde): cu dang bcas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugasu ston cing / lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ 'khor mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
7b8(mdo sde): spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'greng bzhin du tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
8a1(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog/ byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob// sa chen ltar ni shin tu bzod// zhe sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal// mtshan dang dpe byad/ 
8a2(mdo sde): mchog ldan pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab rgyan// bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis// rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs// sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas// yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas// 
8a3(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa'i zhing spangs nas// rnyog pa can gyi sems can sgrol// rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te// ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad// yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis// ring mo
8a4(mdo sde): zhig nas dka' thub spyad// yun rings dka' thub spyad pa dang // thos na 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes
8a5(mdo sde): rab spyad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // tshad/ med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod// gzhan yang skye za/ mang po dag/ dkris skom na 'chi kun las sprul// so so'i skye/ 
8a6(mdo sde): bo gzhan gyi phyir// lus srog ma chags mang du btang // yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir// sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang // bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas// skye bo rnams la thugs rtsar dgongs// 
8a7(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir// the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson// dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas// 'dod pa thams cad ring du spangs// 'dus byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te// bdag med stong pa nyid
8a8(mdo sde): rtogs// sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi// rgyu ni 'dod chags sred pa'o// de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar// 'dod chags yongasu gcad par bya// sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu// rtag/ 
8b1(mdo sde): par thugs rje chen po gnas// byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang // sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong // sems can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi// rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas// shin
8b2(mdo sde): tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas// ji ltar ma ni bu cig la// byams pa'i
8b3(mdo sde): sems kyis gso ba bzhin// sngon yang sems can ris kun la// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas// de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas// tshad med pa'i 'khor rnams sgrol// ji tsam byang
8b4(mdo sde): chub spyod bsgoms pa// sems can don du ma bsngos med // de bas sems can thams cad la// pha rol phyin pa du dag mi gtong // rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe// bla med byang chub sgra/ 
8b5(mdo sde): bas no// da yang dus ngan pa ma'i tshe// bla med byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// ngan par lta ba'i lha klu mi// ga/ nod sbyin dag ni kun btul te// the tsom gcod cing 'dan
8b6(mdo sde): bkod pa// rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o// tshad med pa'i skye ba dag/ byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston// mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur te// mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur// dpe zla med pa'i ba
8b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das// byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob// tshad med grags pa chen po yis// phyogs cu'i 'jig rten yongasu khyab// de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bdag gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 
8b8(mdo sde): kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas// thub pa chen po'i spyan sngar lhags// dmapa'i chos rnams thos nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te// lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas// byang chub spyod la
9a1(mdo sde): nan tan bgyid// rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus// thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas// de bas deng 'dir 'dren khyod kyis// bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung / 
9a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed// rtag tu sha za khrag mthung ba// thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas// byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol// kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang
9a3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i ting 'dzin yang thob// kha cig zag pa kun zad nas// 'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom gyur// kha cig tshad med bzhi sgoms shing // kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas// kha cig yang
9a4(mdo sde): dag rig bzhi thob// kha cig 'thun pa'i bzod la gan// kha cig dpa' 'gro'i ting 'dzin thob// kha cig shes rab dmig dang ldan// kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas// de kun
9a5(mdo sde): 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs// bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus// bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom nas// rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yis// mu stegs can gyi ris kun
9a6(mdo sde): btul// sems can dmyal ba byol song dang // yi dgas lha min rgyud kun bcom// de bas sems can bden pa rnams// thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags// nad dang mtshon
9a7(mdo sde): gyis 'jigs pa dang // mu ges 'jigs pa'ang dang 'dir bcil// sems can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang // yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgral// nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag/ 
9a8(mdo sde): thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod// bdag gis bya ba kun spangs te// lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug/ dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na// bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams// ba/ 
9b1(mdo sde): cad khyod la kun sngags pas// thos nas thams cad 'di ru lhags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho yi// gang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis// sems can mang po 'don mdzad pa// mos pa'i sems
9b2(mdo sde): kyis phyag 'tshalo// tshad med bsod nams rdzogs bgyis pas// bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur// tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang // mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog/ bdag kyang
9b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan ji bzhin du// de lta bu yi yi dam bcas// rnyog pa can gyis 'jig rten 'dir// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos
9b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'ad/ das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor dang bcas te gzhan ya dang lha rdzas kyis bsung dang / me tog dang / rnam pa sna tshogs
9b5(mdo sde): kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'ang sa la mngon par gtor nas/ steng gi bar snang la rin po che'o// gdugasu gyur te/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom
9b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci yang mi smra bar 'dug go// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas/ ngo
9b7(mdo sde): mtshar du gyur te/ sa so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa
9b8(mdo sde): phul te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smraso// bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mngon
10a1(mdo sde): sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas/ bsti stang dang bcas te/ mchod pa byas par gyur to zhes smra'o// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'
10a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa las langs nas/ gos tshags bcos te/ phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
10a3(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
10a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/ gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'di nas ji srid gin mchis/ yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na/ bcom ldan
10a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la/ phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/ bdag
10a6(mdo sde): cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thong shig/ skyes bu chen
10a7(mdo sde): po 'di'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa/ lha dang mi'i 'khor thams cad kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu
10a8(mdo sde): chen po de'i yon tan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na/ 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs/ 
10b1(mdo sde): par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid/ 
10b2(mdo sde): la zung shig dang / ngas khyed la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// 'di ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan// 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro ban
10b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang shin tu rtogs pas 'jug pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o// sangs
10b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen po'i ye shes kyis la bzod pa thob pa'o// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin
10b5(mdo sde): pa'o// seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin la yang shin tu gnas pa'o// thams cad ma khyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la yang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o// 
10b6(mdo sde): mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu choms pa ste/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do// skyes
10b7(mdo sde): bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems
10b8(mdo sde): can tshad med pa dag yongasu smin par byed do// skyes bu chen po'i de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes mngon par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i/ 
11a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thun par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun
11a2(mdo sde): mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge/ 
11a3(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du/ tshad med pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang
11a4(mdo sde): bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
11a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nag/ nus pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i
11a6(mdo sde): spyod yul gyis nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te khrel
11a7(mdo sde): ba dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i
11a8(mdo sde): 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang ldan zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongasu bral nas/ bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin
11b1(mdo sde): du 'gyur te/ gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas
11b2(mdo sde): nga'i 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu
11b3(mdo sde): dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes
11b4(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sem/ sa can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi mug pa dang / rmugs
11b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur/ te/ gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes
11b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci ltar gnas pa
11b7(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
11b8(mdo sde): khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs
12a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
12a2(mdo sde): zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongasu spangs nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
12a3(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rdo rje 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ri 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po
12a4(mdo sde): dang / ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang / lung pa dang / lung phran dang / gcong rong dang / gse/ gam dang / gyo mo dang / tshor ma dang / ru dang / shing ngan pa tham
12a5(mdo sde): cang mi snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji tsam du ngan par gad gas pa dug dang / byad snyems dang / can zan ma rungs pa dang / ye 'drog dang / glo bur dang / rims nad dang / yul
12a6(mdo sde): ngan dang / nam rmus pa dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyi la thams cad zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi yang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis
12a7(mdo sde): pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / phul du 'gyur ba dang / dam par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongasu brgyan par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa
12a8(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes kyi stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
12b1(mdo sde): zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te/ thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
12b2(mdo sde): zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can
12b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam
12b4(mdo sde): pa'i ro dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bsams pa
12b5(mdo sde): bzhin du zas dang skom gyis tshim par 'gyur ro// de rje ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi nga de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan
12b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang
12b7(mdo sde): mi ldan pa med de/ nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces bya
12b8(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang / gding ba dang / gos dang / na
13a1(mdo sde): po che'i rgyan dang / ji tsam du 'tsho ba'i yo byad du gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel cing phongs pa med de/ rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
13a2(mdo sde): ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus
13a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang / dgra sdang ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'dum zhing dga' ba dang / 
13a4(mdo sde): spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems mi 'khrug pa dang / shes rab yong su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par
13a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam sa kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te phul du gyur pa 'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ 
13a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
13a7(mdo sde): zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can
13a8(mdo sde): thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ 
13b1(mdo sde): gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rje la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams
13b2(mdo sde): cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing / dbang po mi nyams pa dang / rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la mos shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
13b3(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs
13b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad pa de dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang / thams cad kyang dge ba bsrung ba dang / dge
13b5(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam sa kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa
13b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / gnod/ 
13b7(mdo sde): pa'am/ 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig phan pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
13b8(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
14a1(mdo sde): zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thub partsod pa dang / nang dang / mu ge dang / yongasu bral te/ 'dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / khab dang / 
14a2(mdo sde): rtsub pa dang / tsha ba dang / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ongs pa thams cad yongasu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho klog 'od ces bya ba'i
14a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams
14a4(mdo sde): cad dang yongasu bral te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin dpo che'i shing dang / gos kyi shing dang / snod kyi shing dang / rgyan gyi shing da dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / rol
14a5(mdo sde): mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs te/ 'tsho ba'i yodabyad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongasu rgyan par gyur to// de bzhin du mdor na rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongasu smin
14a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
14a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang / bde ba'i don de dang de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon skal pa chen po
14a8(mdo sde): tshad dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongasu smin par byed do// phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi
14b1(mdo sde): khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur pa na/ rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus/ 
14b2(mdo sde): mtshon gyis 'jigs pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyi 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems
14b3(mdo sde): can kha 'dag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas/ sems can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par
14b4(mdo sde): byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu dges 'jigs pa 'byung ste/ sems can kha 'dag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis/ de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i 'dus kyi tshe/ ting nge 'dzin
14b5(mdo sde): gyis mthus mu ge'i 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te/ sems can rnams kha zas kyis tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sog
14b6(mdo sde): pa tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa
14b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu brtson pa'o// sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs su smin
14b8(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yi dam chen po bcas te/ snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu
15a1(mdo sde): bskyed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed de/ zad mi shes pa'i yid dam bcas pas/ gong nas gong du 'phags
15a2(mdo sde): pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad ci
15a3(mdo sde): dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/ 'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur
15a4(mdo sde): pa dag sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems da dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas/ bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ ci
15a5(mdo sde): dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya// ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas
15a6(mdo sde): gang dag na sems can gang gza' ba dang / btung bas phongs par gyur pa dag gis/ sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmig
15a7(mdo sde): pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing / bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan te/ mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar
15a8(mdo sde): du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyan nam/ nad kyi rkyen sman nam/ gding ba 'am/ khri 'am/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis
15b1(mdo sde): brel cing dngos par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ 
15b2(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'dod pa rnyed cing bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / gding ba dang / khri dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing / ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris
15b3(mdo sde): kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag byams sdug pa dang bral te/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad par
15b4(mdo sde): gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa / 'a sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjo/ de cing dmigs pas/ bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa
15b5(mdo sde): byas na/ byams sdug pa dang phrad cing / dgra sdang / ba dang bral te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob
15b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems/ nad dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'
15b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas/ bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun lus dang sems bde zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ 
15b8(mdo sde): skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur pa dag gis
16a1(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te
16a2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas na/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang bral te/ gcig la gcig dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis 'gyod cing 'chags par 'gyur te/ 
16a3(mdo sde): skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang btson du bzung ste/ brtson rar bcug gam/ lcag
16a4(mdo sde): dang / khong sgril dang / shing gi gdos kyis bcings sa dam/ yan lag bcings te/ sdug bsngal ba dar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems
16a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmi gas pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson ra dang / lcags dang / khong sgril
16a6(mdo sde): dang / lcags sgrog las thar te/ bag yangs su gyur nas/ dga' ba dang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
16a7(mdo sde): gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag btson du bzung nas bzhu ba 'am/ 'chog pa 'am/ nan la bor ba dang / gsad pa la thug pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
16a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas/ bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson du bzung ba dang / bzhu bcog pa dang / nan la bor ba las thams cad thar
16b1(mdo sde): te skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems dub pa dang / mthu stongs
16b2(mdo sde): dang mi ldan zhing / nyam chung bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na// 
16b3(mdo sde): de kun lus dang sems yangs zhing bde ba dang mthu stobs skyes te/ cis 'dul ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems
16b4(mdo sde): can gang dbang po nyams pa dang mtshang bar gyur pa dag gis sems rje gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas/ bsti
16b5(mdo sde): stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ da kun dbang po ma tshang ba med cing dbang po dang ldan te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du
16b6(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag spros shing sems 'khrugs sam/ 'byung po'i gdon gyis brlabs pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16b7(mdo sde): chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun smos shing 'khrugs pa dang bral te/ rab tu bde ba dang skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris
16b8(mdo sde): kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khong khro ba dang / phrag dag dang / 
17a1(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang / ngan par lta ba dang / gnyid dang / bag med pa dang / the tsom la sogs pas lus dang sems gdungs te/ mi bde bar gyur pa dag gis sems
17a2(mdo sde): brtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas/ bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'dod chags la sogs pa dang
17a3(mdo sde): bral te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag me
17a4(mdo sde): tshig par gyur pa 'am/ chus khyer ba 'am/ rlung gis khyer ba 'am/ dbab tu ltung ba 'am/ shing ka 'am/ khang da thog nas lhung ste/ sems dngangs shing 'kham par gyur pa
17a5(mdo sde): sa //  ma mi mas na sa ma rnam sa na sas
17a6(mdo sde): mi bde ba'i bgegs dang / g.yang sa de dag thams cad las thar te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sem/ 
17a7(mdo sde): can gang dag sbrul gdug pa 'am/ gcan zan gdug pas zin tam/ dug rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phog par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i
17a8(mdo sde): snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas ni/ de kun 'tshe zhing gdid pa thams cad dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma tho ras kyi lhar skye ba nas/ myangs
17b1(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab ste/ rtag pa'i rims dang / zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / 'ag gsum pa dang / zhag
17b2(mdo sde): bzhi pa dang / smyos nas lus dang sems 'dar zhing 'khrugs te/ dran pa nyams shing shes pa med par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying por
17b3(mdo sde): mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'jigs pa las rnam par grol te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las
17b4(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na se mas can gang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum dang / 
17b5(mdo sde): mdangs za ba dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang seng ge dang / !ga dang / spyang ki la sogs pa gcan zan gdug pas te/ sa pa dang / sngags dang / byad dang / g.yul ngor lhags pa
17b6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang 'jigs par gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkra shis shing rlags te/ lus dang sems rab tu dngangs par gyur nas/ shi bas 'jigs shing 'tsho bar 'dod pa dang / bde ba 'chol
17b7(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa dag gis sems brtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ 
17b8(mdo sde): de kun 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus dang srog la mi dma' ba dang / skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas
18a1(mdo sde): gang dag na sems can gang mang du thos par 'dod pa'am/ mos pa dag par 'dod pa'am/ bsam gtan sgrub par 'dod pa'am/ mngon par shes pa 'dod pa'am/ 
18a2(mdo sde): shes rab 'dod pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'am/ gzugs dam pa 'dod pa 'am/ sgra snyan pa 'dod pa 'am/ dri zhim po 'dod pa'am/ ro zhim po 'dod pa 'am/ reg bya mchog 'dod pa
18a3(mdo sde): 'am/ \u0f7fgrugs pa 'dod pa 'am/ bsod nams 'dod pa 'am/ bzos 'tsho bar 'dod pa 'am/ me tog dang 'bras bu 'dod pa 'am/ bskyed mos tshal 'dod pa 'am/ khri stan 'dod pa 'am/ 
18a4(mdo sde): gding ba 'dod pa 'am/ yul rgyu bar 'dod pa 'am/ no da ra dang 'bru 'dod pa 'am/ nad kyi rkyen sman 'dod pa 'a dam/ khang khyim 'dod pa 'am/ bran khol 'dod pa 'am/ tshen
18a5(mdo sde): rtsi 'dod pa 'am/ char pa 'dod pa'am/ chu 'dod pa'am/ lo tog 'dod pa 'am/ bsil yab 'dod pa 'am/ rlung bsil ba 'dod pa 'am/ me 'dod pa 'am/ theg pa
18a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa 'am/ bu pho dang bu mo 'dod pa 'am/ thabs mkhas pa 'dod pa 'am/ bsod nams bya bar 'dod pa 'am/ dro bar 'dod pa 'am/ bsil bar 'dod pa 'am/ yid gzhungs par 'dod pa 'am/ 
18a7(mdo sde): de ma yin pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs shing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa dag gis/ sems rtse gcig tu
18a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te/ mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang / mthung
18b1(mdo sde): gzi rji kyi shugs kyis de ga thams car sdug bsngal gyis gdus pa dang bral te/  yang yong su rdzogs nas/ skas pa 'i lta ba pa'i du ma tho ngas kyi lha skye nas/ myang nangs 'da' da'i du lab
18b2(mdo sde): 'gyurar// gnas yang dag na sems can gang dag zhing gshin pa'am/ nang mig shin pa las ba bta nas/ gal na tan byas kya nga / nan tan ma byas kyang ste/ sems rtse gcig dbyung \u0f7f
18b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang / mthu dang gzi brjid kyi
18b4(mdo sde): shugs de dag gis lo thog thams cad legs shing 'bras dbu smin cing legs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i
18b5(mdo sde): bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag la brtson 'grus chen po'i sbyor ba dang / brtan pa'i yi dam bcas ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can yongs su smin par bya
18b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ rtag tus chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu sa bon gyi chog thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing / rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis yid bzhin spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu
18b7(mdo sde): de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sa chen po 'di las skye ba'i rtsa dang / shing gi rtsa ba dang / yal ga dang / myu gu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa
18b8(mdo sde): thams cad rgyas par skye zhing / rtsi shing dang / le tog la sogs pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu yang smin cing grung ba dang / dang rab dang / snum pa dang / dri zhim par byed do// gnas gang dag na sems
19a1(mdo sde): can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa drag la rno bas srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par
19a2(mdo sde): g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / ngag rtsub por smra ba dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig kyal par smra ba dang / 'dod chags can dang / zhe sdang can dang / log par lta ba dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi
19a3(mdo sde): lam mngon du spyod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing / dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ nyon
19a4(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing mi dge ba bcu dang yongs su bral te dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje ba dang / phan pa dang / 
19a5(mdo sde): bde ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'a/ di ni de lta bu'i yon tan dam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin da/ nga / mthu dang / gzi brjid kyi shugs dang / shin tu
19a6(mdo sde): brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig thang cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhong tshad med grangs med par phyin cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de re rer yang skad cig gis sems can snod du gyur pa tshad med grangs
19a7(mdo sde): med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdug bsngal las bsgral nas bde ba thob par byas te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur
19a8(mdo sde): ro/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang / smon lam brtan pa dang / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
19b1(mdo sde): phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kha cig la ni tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po'i lus su ston te/ sems can rnams cis 'dul ba'i chos ston to// kha gcig la ni dbang phyug chen po'i
19b2(mdo sde): lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'phrul dga' gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig
19b3(mdo sde): la ni dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rab mchi ma gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni
19b4(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sangs rgyas kyi skur ston to// kha cig la ni byang chub sems dang / nga'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus
19b5(mdo sde): su ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rgyal rigs kyi lus su ston to// 
19b6(mdo sde): kha cig la ni bram ze'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dmangs rigs kyi lus su ston to// khe cig la ni rje'u rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni skyes pa'i lusu ston to// kha cig
19b7(mdo sde): la ni bud med kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gzhon nu'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni bu mo'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dri za'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi
19b8(mdo sde): lus su ston to// kha cig la ni mi 'am ci'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni klu'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi lus su ston
20a1(mdo sde): to/ kha cig la ni srin po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni grul bum gyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sha za'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni yi dgas kyi/ 
20a2(mdo sde): lus su ston to// kha cig la ni srul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lus srul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gnon po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni seng ge'i lus ston
20a3(mdo sde): to/ kha cig la ni spos kyi ban glang gi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rta'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni khyu mchog gi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gcan zan sna tshogs kyi lus su ston
20a4(mdo sde): to/ kha cig la ni gshin rje'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi lus su
20a5(mdo sde): ston to// de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus su ston te// skye bo mang po skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas/ theg pa gsum las
20a6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'dzud do// rigs kyi bu skyes bu chen po de ni de ltar de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan te/ de ni yon tan mchog tu gyur pa/ phul du gyur pa'i
20a7(mdo sde): gter yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rin po che thams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung gnas yin no// byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mig yongasu dag pa yin no// mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer
20a8(mdo sde): chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no// de ltar ched du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bugs
20b1(mdo sde): te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa 'am/ 'jam dpal lam/ kun tu spyan ras gzigs sam/ kun tu bzang po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/ skal
20b2(mdo sde): pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabasu song nas/ de dag gi mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti sdang dang bcas te mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dod pa re ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa bas/ 'ga'
20b3(mdo sde): zhig gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas mchod pa dang phyag byas na/ re ba'i smon lam
20b4(mdo sde): thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i dri sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems
20b5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang 'dra'o// de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par
20b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ yun ring po nas smon lam chen po shin tu brtan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
20b7(mdo sde): bas 'phags pa yin pas/ khyed kyi bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
20b8(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / lha dang / mi dang / gnod sbyin dang / drib la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las langs nas/ ci nus su so so nas gser dang / 
21a1(mdo sde): dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to// de ma/ 
21a2(mdo sde): yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / nor bu dang / nor bu rin po che dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / mu tig gi ser mo do dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rgyal mtshan
21a3(mdo sde): dang ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo// gzhan yang tshad med pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo snyan pa dang / 
21a4(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa
21a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod/ pa'i yo byad de dag slar bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi
21a6(mdo sde): rnams dang // phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa rnams// yon tan chen po 'jig rten gtso la 'bul// mchog gi mchod pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
21a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshogasu bcad pa de smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pas 'di skad ces bka'
21a8(mdo sde): stsal to// brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas// sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal btsal// rin chen dag ltar kun la bde bar mthong // rdo rje bzhin du the tsom dra ba gcod// snying rje chen po sa
21b1(mdo sde): blo can brtson 'grus kyis// mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la 'dul// rgya mtsho'i ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol// 'jigs pa med pas srid pa'i pha rol phyin// de nas byang
21b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu bo bzhi las bskol ba'i bcom
21b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa dran pa 'phel ba dang / bsrung ba'i dran pa 'phel ba dang / 'tsho ba 'phel ba dang / lus bde ba
21b4(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang / gzugs da dang stobs 'phel ba dang / grags pa 'phel ba dang / 'tsho da pa'i yo byad 'phel ba dang / gnyen bshes 'phel ba dang / slob
21b5(mdo sde): ma 'phel ba dang / tshul khrims 'phel ba dang / mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang / bzod pa 'phel ba dang / thabs mkhas pa
21b6(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa 'phel ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba 'phel ba dang / chos kyi sgron ma 'phel ba dang / sems
21b7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'phel ba dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang / rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel ba dang / khams gsum du grags pa 'phel ba dang / khams
21b8(mdo sde): gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang / sa chen po thams cad kyi ro bro ba 'phel ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang / dge ba'i las 'phel ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i
22a1(mdo sde): spyod pa 'phel ba dang / shes rab kyi 'od 'phel ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang / spyan lnga 'phel ba dang / dbang bskur ba 'thob pa dang / lhar skye
22a2(mdo sde): ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel ba sogs thob par byed pa nas/ 'di lta ste/ me dang chur ldan pa dang / bkra shis 'od snang dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sngags chen po dang / gzungs
22a3(mdo sde): kyi tshig 'di dag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'di thos te/ gzungs 'dis ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad
22a4(mdo sde): 'phel zhing skye ba dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gu dang / yal ga dang / sdong po dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsi shing la// 
22a5(mdo sde): tog gi bro ba dang / bsrung 'phel zhing skye ba dang / char chu dang / ldan pa dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung 'phel zhing skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde
22a6(mdo sde): ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang / rin po che dang / nor rdzas 'phel zhing skyo ba dang / mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'dis
22a7(mdo sde): ni shes rab skyes pas nyon mongs pa'i dgra yang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngags la/ 'di lta ste/ tshim b+ho/ tshim b+ho/ tsom tshim b+ho/ A kA sha tshim b+haM/ ba kar tshim b+ho/ am bra tshim
22a8(mdo sde): b+h+yo bar tshim b+ho/ btsir tshim b+ho/ a rog tshim b+ho/ d+harma tshim b+ho/ sa te batshom b+ho/ sa tini ha la tshim b+hi/ bi ba ro ka sha ba tshim b+he/ u pa sha mchim g+ho na yan tshim g+he/ pradz+nyAs ma mon/ 
22b1(mdo sde): rangan tshim tha/ klan tshim tho/ bi she ma b+ha ri yA tshim zlo/ shA sI tA lam b+ha chim b+ho/ b+hi a d+ha so ta ma he le/ dam b+he yam b+he/ tsakrA se/ tsakrA ba si le/ kI le/ pi le/ kar bA dAr/ b.ri t+yai ha se re ba ma
22b2(mdo sde): pa re tsa rA/ ban dA ne/ a rad ne/ pA dar/ tsatsa6tsa/ he le mi le/ a kha ta thA ga le/ zag khI lo/ b+hA re b+hA re/ mi le me/ nan te/ ku le mi le/ ang kutsi ta b+he/ A ra~M gyi re/ bar gyi re// 
22b3(mdo sde): ku ta sha ma ma le/ ton gyi ton gyi/ ton gA le/ hu ru h+ya ru hu ru/ ku lo sto ma le/ mi rI to ma ri te/ bAn d+hA ta/ ha ra kha ma re/ hu ru ho ru/ srid pa'i drim sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/ 'thab
22b4(mdo sde): rtsod skal bzhi pa'ang dge bar gsungs// mi dge bsam pa sbyong ba/ dge bar gsungs// 'byung ba chen po sbyong ba 'ang dge bar dgasungs// ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba dge bar gsungs// sdig pa'i/ 
22b5(mdo sde): bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs// re ba rdzogs par byed pa dge bar gsungs// lo tog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dge bar gsungs pa 'di// 
22b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs pa// dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar me dang chu dang ldan pa dang / 
22b7(mdo sde): bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis
22b8(mdo sde): pas thos so// gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs spyod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do// 
23a1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su gyur pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
23a2(mdo sde): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do// gzungs 'di ni bcom
23a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi 'phags pa'i gsungs rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang / yun tu gnas shing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
23a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'ji/ dran pa'i rig sngags chen po dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di smra sa pa na/ ri khal te ya rab tu g.yos nas/ lha'i rol
23a5(mdo sde): mo bye ba khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te/ lha'i spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du bab nas/ de'i tshe 'khor mang po thams cad kyang / 
23a6(mdo sde): ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to// de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na lha mo bkra shis chen mo dang / dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang / mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang / brtan pa lha mo chen mo dang / chu
23a7(mdo sde): can lha mo chen mo dang / 'od chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa lha mo 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag bco brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
23a8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas sti stang dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag
23b1(mdo sde): cag gis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'thun pa dang / mi 'thun pa'i phyogs mi 'tshal te/ skyes bu
23b2(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'thun pa dang / mi
23b3(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// deng bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thab pas/ 'byung ba
23b4(mdo sde): chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'thun pa dang / mi 'thun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so// lha mo 'di ltar shes par
23b5(mdo sde): bya'o/ 'di lta ste yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang dang ldan pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di yang
23b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bebs te/ sems can la sbyin par byed do// 'di lta ste rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
23b7(mdo sde): gang ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no// 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri dzi tra la bsung dang / me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin du/ 
23b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rab tu mdzes so// 'di lta ste/ seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dgas thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa bzhin du/ rigs
24a1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba'am/ zil gyis non pa med do// 'di la ste/ ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad
24a2(mdo sde): yongs su sel ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel to// 'di lta ste/ nam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam
24a3(mdo sde): stor ba'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston te/ gar 'gro bar dga' bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang ma rigs pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de
24a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can tham sa cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing / bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par
24a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la 'god par byed do// 'di lta ste/ sa chen po la ni sa bon gyis tshogs thams cad dang rtsi shing dang / lo tog dang / sa'i khams su gtog
24a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar/ rigs kyi bu 'di la yang byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyis chos thams cad ston pa'i gnas so// 'di lta ste rin po che chen po ri rab ri'i rgyal po
24a7(mdo sde): ni shin tu brtan zhing mgos ma nyams pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir/ mi nyams/ 
24a8(mdo sde): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir mgod pa'o// 'di lta ste/ namakha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams
24b1(mdo sde): cad bde ba la longs spyod do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po
24b2(mdo sde): yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ bkur bsti dang / rim gro byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po
24b3(mdo sde): la mig mi 'dzum par lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni/ yon tan mang po
24b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par ldan// dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa// ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lcags // sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin// srid pa gsum
24b5(mdo sde): gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol// tshad med rnam pa sna chog sa char phab nas// ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed// bad+ma byin dri ma med par skyes pa des// phyogs bzhi kun du
24b6(mdo sde): bltas shing brtags nas su// thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te// ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba// nor bu rin chen 'od
24b7(mdo sde): ze'i 'od zer ltar// sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te// thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med// mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed// deng 'dir 'dus shing
24b8(mdo sde): lhags par 'gyur ba ni// shin tu dpa' ba sa'i snying po ste// rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam mngon par ston// 'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te// 'jigs pa med pa'i sangs
25a1(mdo sde): rgyas nga ro dbyangs// byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan de// sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso ba'o// rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khung ste/ 
25a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin// byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtsel mos// sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol// 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i 'obs dang mkhar yin
25a3(mdo sde): tel nam mkha' dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston// sa ltar dge ba'i rtsab thams cad skyed// rdo rje ltar ni the tsom yongasu gcod// rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtong // chu lngar
25a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed// nyon mongs tsha bas gang rangs pa'i gdug su 'gyur// sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tshe bar byed// zhag cig sa'i snying po'i ming brjod pa'o// 
25a5(mdo sde): grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni// bskal pa bye/ ba khrag khrig bar du yang // blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhags// so so'i skye bo'i grol bar byed pa ni// nyon
25a6(mdo sde): mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching ba la'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tong 'dzin mthar phyin cing // ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin// rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag pas// mang po kun
25a7(mdo sde): la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin// dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnas kyis// skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom// zhing rnams ji bzhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing // bsam gtan bzhi po la/ 
25a8(mdo sde): yang rgyun tu 'jug/ ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi// nyon mongs pa yi gdung ba rab tu sel// so so'i skye bo sngon gyi sdig pa'i las// mtshon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang // 
25b1(mdo sde): rnam pa mang bas 'tsho zhing gsod gyur pa// de dag kun las rnam par grol bar byed// sems can nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga// sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa// sa'i snying po
25b2(mdo sde): de la sbubs gsol na// srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// sems can sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab bskor te// gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur pa// sa mi
25b3(mdo sde): snying po de la skabs gsol na// bzod cing byams pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur// bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab tu 'jigs skrag cing // rgol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag/ sa yi snying po la
25b4(mdo sde): skyabs gsol na// 'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas para'agyur// bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang / tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag/ sa yi snying po/ 
25b5(mdo sde): de la skyabs gsol na// re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs pa ra 'gyur// yon tan so sor smon pa'i bzo rtsal dang // sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag/ sa yi snying po de la
25b6(mdo sde): skyabs gsol na// re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur// lo tog rtsi shing legs par 'dod pa dang // khye'u dang bu mo gos dang bran khol phyir// sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// re ba
25b7(mdo sde): bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan mang po kun dang ldan pas na// sa chen 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin// de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo tog rnams// snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan
25b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// nyon mongs mang po sgribs par gyur nas su// mi dge bcu'i las la mos pa dag/ sa yi snying po de la skyab gsol na// mi dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// rnam pa
26a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing // skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston// sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rab rdzogs pas// sems can kun la snying rjes brgya/ 
26a2(mdo sde): bar gyur// gal te bskal pa mang po brgya'i bar// de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod kyang // mthar byon rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'// de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod
26a3(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / 'dus pa chen po
26a4(mdo sde): las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying po stan las langs nas/ bla gos/ phyogs gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab/ sa la spyi bos btugs nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang
26a6(mdo sde): sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can// bcom ldan 'das la zhu gsol ba// the tsom nem nur
26a7(mdo sde): ci mchis pa// bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba la thog pa med de/ 'on
26a8(mdo sde): kyang sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi
26b1(mdo sde): sems rang par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying ngos/ tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ bdag sngon sprul pa bcu ga sum du// spyod pa dka' ba shin tu
26b2(mdo sde): spyad so so'i skye bo kun don du// 'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga bsal// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la// tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod bgyis pas// bas mo pa dag pa'i 'khor
26b3(mdo sde): 'odi dang // tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang ston mthong ngo // blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dag/ thams cad 'dus shing tshogs 'dir lhags// shin tu skyon med 'khor 'di dag/ mthong bar gyur pa ngo
26b4(mdo sde): mtshar rmad// ci slad sangs rgyas zhing du 'dis// sdig pas da dge ba nyams bgyis shing // blo can dag gis spangs pa yi// ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas// mtshams med sdig pa bgyid
26b5(mdo sde): pa dang // yang dag dam pa'i chos la bskur// 'phags pa smod cing nga log lta bas// rtag dang chad pa'i gtsug lag 'cha/ da// sdig pa bcu'i las bgyid cing // 'jig rten phyi mas mi
26b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa// theg pa rnam gsum rim spangs shing // sdig can ngan 'gro dag la gzhol// ma rig pas ni sgribs pa'i mig/ 'i dod chags phra dog sgyus 'tsho ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab skor/ 
26b7(mdo sde): te pa sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad// ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor ba yi// nyon mongs rdo rje lta bu gcad// ji lta bur na gzugs dga' thob// de bzhin bzod pa 'ang nges par 'gyur// 
26b8(mdo sde): bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen dag/ mthong bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che// 'di 'dra'i yon tan kun tshogs pa// phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo // yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing // byang chub lam la
27a1(mdo sde): rab brtson pas// ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo skor ba mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs legs so rigs kyi bu khyod/ 
27a2(mdo sde): kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing na rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu bzhus so// 
27a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis dris pa'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas/ shin tu rtogs shing khong du chud do// spyad pa mang po phun sum tshogs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab
27a4(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang // phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par bya ba dang // byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas/ 
27a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
27a6(mdo sde): kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang / zhing / 
27a7(mdo sde): 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin tu rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i don dris pa legs so// shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bstan par
27a8(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
27b1(mdo sde): sul to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcud nga ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyis sems can thams cad rnam par
27b2(mdo sde): dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang / 'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis dril ba dang / mkhas padag dang ring du gyur pa/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas klags pa dang / ngan song du
27b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang / skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi blta ba dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs
27b4(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang za ba/ dge ba'i cho sa thams cad ring du spong zhing / mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par
27b5(mdo sde): byed pa'i gnas na bzhug so// de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde/ bar bzhugs te/ bag tsha ba med pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa/ 
27b6(mdo sde): med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ lha dang bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi
27b7(mdo sde): rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas/ ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do// mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa yang mdzad do// rigs
27b8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na/ de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang / gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal bar
28a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i mi mang po yang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / gcig la gcig spong pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / 
28a2(mdo sde): g.yo sgyu dang / tshig rtsub por smra ba dang / skur klang 'debs shing 'khrugs pa dang / dmus long dang / ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / grang ba dang che ba'i nang ma
28a3(mdo sde): rungs pa dang / rims rnam pa mang po dang / spro ba dang / skem byed dang / kha zas mi 'jub dang / sems 'khrugs cing myos pa dang / dbang po mtshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa dang / bgo
28a4(mdo sde): ba dang / bza' ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pho ngas shing brel te/ bdog pa thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba da dang / skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang / 'jig rten gyi
28a5(mdo sde): lha la skyabasu song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang / bsam pa ngan pa da/  / mos pa ngan pa yongs su rgyas te/ yang dag pa'i/ lam stor nas/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na/ de'i tshe
28a6(mdo sde): yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa mang du thos pa dran dkan che ba dag 'dus nas gros su bgros te/ yul dang grong gi mi kun sdus nas/ thams cad kyis 'thun par rgyal bu gcig
