129b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dam bcas pa de dag rjesu gzung du gsol// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang nas sems can blo dang ldan pa tshad med pa bye ba
129b8(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong snyed stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bas phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
130a1(mdo sde): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsam pa nges par dam 'cha' bar 'tshal te/ 'khor ba
130a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba 'di phan chad nas/ nam chos kyi mi bzod pa ma thob kyi bar du rgyal por ma gyur cig/ blon por ma gyur cig/ yul gyi ston par ma gyur cig/ grong rdal dang / grong
130a3(mdo sde): khyer dang / grong 'dab kyi bdag por ma gyur cig/ dmag la dbang po'i bdag por ma gyur cig/ tshong dpon du ma gyur cig/ mchod pa dang / gtsug lag khang la dbang byed pa'i
130a4(mdo sde): bdag por ma gyur cig/ tshong dpon dang / khyim pa de dag dang / dge sbyong gi bdag por ma gyur cig/ slob dpon dang bla mar ma gyur cig/ khyim pa'i lus sum
130a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ zhal che gcod pa'i dbang por ma gyur ci ga/ phyug pa dang btsan pa'i bdag por ma gyur / ga/ bdag cag chos kyi bzod pa ma thob par de lta bu'i
130a6(mdo sde): gnas su skyes na/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur zhes bya ba kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos
130a7(mdo sde): la 'phya zhing bskur ba zhes bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba la 'tshe zhing gnod pa bgyi'i// sems can mang po'i ches kyi tshig 'byin par// dkon mchog
130a8(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung gi cod pa'o// sems can tshad med pa la gnod pa dang 'chib bgyid pa'o// de'i dbang gi gdon mi 'tshal bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lu
130b1(mdo sde): ngan song du 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de'i tshe 'khor
130b2(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
130b3(mdo sde): zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mchi ma blags te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thog ma
130b4(mdo sde): ma mchis po nas/ 'khor bar 'khor zhing glen/ ba dang / mi shes pa dang / nga rgyal gyi dbang gis mi dge ba'i las thams cad bskyed de/ lus kyi wa
130b5(mdo sde): mi dge ba dang / ngag gi las mi dge ba dang / yi kyi las mi dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang / gzha na bgyid du stsal pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa la
130b6(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa de dag thams cad deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'dzem pa dang / ma 'chab pa'i sems kyis so sor bshags pas slan chad mi bgyid par yongasu
130b7(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang / ma mchis pa'i dus kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du lan cig lan gnyis lan gsum gyis bar du brjod do// deng slan chad 'khor/ 
130b8(mdo sde): ba'i mthas gtugs kyi bar du rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi phrad pa dang / mi dge ba'i dbang du ma gyur cig/ gal te phrad na yang de'i rje su mi 'jug par bsam pa nges pas
131a1(mdo sde): dam bca' bar 'tshal lo// sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bdag cag yun ring por sdug bsngal myong bar ma
131a2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag rjesu gzung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams
131a3(mdo sde): cad la bka' stsal pa/ legaso legs so// khyed ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa dang / 'dzem pas so sor bshags pa legs so// khyed 'khor ba'i
131a4(mdo sde): chu bo chen po las bsgral ba dang / 'jigs pa me dad pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i daphyir 'di lta bu'i smon lam btab pa leg so// rigs
131a5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
131a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi lus la mi gnas/ phyi rol gyi lus la mi gnas/ byi nang
131a7(mdo sde): gi lus la mi gnas/ 'das pa'i lus la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i lus la mi gnas/ da ltar gyi lus la mi gnas pa ste/ chos dang po 'dis na
131a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
131b1(mdo sde): chen po rnams gang nang gi tsher ba la mi gnas/ phyi rol gyi tshor ba la mi gnas/ phyi nang gi tshor ba la mi gnas/ 'das pa'i tshor ba la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i
131b2(mdo sde): tshor ba la mi gnas/ da ltar gyi tshor ba la mi gnas pa ste/ chos gnyis pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon
131b3(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi 'du shes la mi gnas/ phyi rol
131b4(mdo sde): gyi 'du shes la mi gnas/ phyi nang gnyi ga'id 'du shes la mi gnas/ 'das pa'i 'du shes8 la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes la mi gan
131b5(mdo sde): da ltar gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa ste/ chos ga sum pa 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i
131b6(mdo sde): chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi 'du byed la mi gnas/ phyi rol gyi 'du byed la
131b7(mdo sde): mi gnas/ phyi nang gnyi ga'i 'du byed la mi gnas/ 'das pa'i 'du byed la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed la mi gnas/ da ltar gyi 'du byed la mi gnas// 
131b8(mdo sde): pa ste/ chos bzhi pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu
132a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa la
132a2(mdo sde): mi gnas/ phyi nang gnyi ga'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ da ltar gyi rnam
132a3(mdo sde): par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ chos lnga pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// 
132a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas pa ste/ chos drug pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
132a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ga/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
132a6(mdo sde): gang 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa ste/ chos bdun pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob
132a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'dis na/ byang chub sems dang / 
132a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs
132b1(mdo sde): yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa ste/ chos dgu pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
132b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa ste/ chos bcu pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
132b3(mdo sde): chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon med pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na/ 
132b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong bdun cu rtsa gnyis steng mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod dpa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag
132b5(mdo sde): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyis chos kyi rjes su bzod pa thob pa/ nyan thos tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa nas/ dgra bcom pa
132b6(mdo sde): bar du thob par gyur to// sems can khrag khrig brgya steng snyed sngon ma bskyed pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
132b7(mdo sde): la phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// sems can grangs med tshad med pa snyed sngon sangs rgyas kyi sems ma bskyed pa de sems bskyed par gyur to// gzhan yang sems ca
132b8(mdo sde): grangs med tshad med pa snyed sngon nyan thos kyi sems ma bskyed pa de skyes par gyur to// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/ sems can gang chos kyi
133a1(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa nas/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas par byas te/ nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs la longs
133a2(mdo sde): spyod cing / bdag nyid chen po'i gnas su longs spyod par ngas gnang gi/ sems can gzhan ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
133a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gong chos kyi bzod pa ma thob par rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas te/ nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod pa
133a4(mdo sde): dang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su gnas par gnang ngamang / 'on te gnang ba'i skabs kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gang chos kyi bzod
133a5(mdo sde): pa ma thob kyang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod/ la/ sems can gzhan yang slob du bcug na/ de/ yang ngas rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su
133a6(mdo sde): nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su 'dug cing longs spyod du gnang ngo // sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa yong ma thob la dge ba bcu'i las kyi la
133a7(mdo sde): yang mi spyod de/ sems can gzhan yang slob pa la mi 'dzud la/ dbang chen po dang nan tan gyis rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rgyal po byed de/ nor rin po che rnam pa
133a8(mdo sde): tshogs dang / bdag nyid chen po'i gnas su longs spyod pa dag ni/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su longs spyod pa'i gdol pa can gyi bdag po
133b1(mdo sde): bya ste/ glen pa gti mug can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa/ nga'i dam pa'i chos shin tu zab mo 'jigs par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod cing / dam pa'i chos kyi
133b2(mdo sde): sgron ma med par byed pa nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa/ 'tsheg pa dang / gzhu ba dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / chos gos
133b3(mdo sde): dang lhung bzed dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phrog pa dang / chos gos phrogs te khyim par phab nas/ las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug pa dang / bcings pa dang / brtson du
133b4(mdo sde): bzung ba nas/ 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba dang / nga'i debastan pa dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur pa dang / bar du gcod cing bgegs byed cing / yongasu rgyas par mi byed pa
133b5(mdo sde): dang mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi nor phrogs par byed pa'i gang zag de ni gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ sdug bsngal chen po/ 
133b6(mdo sde): myong zhing ngan song gi gnas su 'khor zhing thar pa'i dus med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa yang ma
133b7(mdo sde): thob/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang mi spyod/ sems can gzhan yang spyod pa mi skul bar dbang chen po dang / nan gyis rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rgyal po bgyid
133b8(mdo sde): cing / nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnasu gnas pa la rgyu gzhan dang / thabs gzhan gyis mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba las gdon cing ngan
134a1(mdo sde): song gzhan gyi sdug bsngal las kyang thar par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyu gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis
134a2(mdo sde): gdon du rung ba yod de/ sems can gang rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por zhugs la/ longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod pa/ chos kyi bzod pa yang ma thob/ dge ba
134a3(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam dang yang mi ldan yang / dad pa'i mthu dang ldan te/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro dang / bsti stang byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i theg pa gsum dang ldan
134a4(mdo sde): pa'i dam pa'i chos la chung ngu na tshigasu bcad pa gcig la yang 'phya zhing skur pa 'am/ bar du gcod pa 'am bgeg/ das mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i
134a5(mdo sde): nye gnas tshul khrims can nam/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ tshul khrims med kyang rung / skra dang kha/ spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig gyon pa thams cad la
134a6(mdo sde): 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / gzhu ba dang / 'tsheg pa dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad phrogs pa dang / chos gos 'phrog te
134a7(mdo sde): khyim par phab nas las byed du bcug pa dang / brtson rar bcug nas 'tshe ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du mi byed la/ mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi nor mi 'phrogs pa dang / ngan pa sdig pa
134a8(mdo sde): can dag rab tu byung ba la 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa byed du mi 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi nor la 'phrog cing spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa gsum dang ldan
134b1(mdo sde): pa'i dam pa'i chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas mnyan cing gzungasu 'dzin pa dang / mnyan te gzungasu bzung nas kyang / ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rjesu brtson 'grus
134b2(mdo sde): dang nan tan byed pa dang / ngas bstan pa theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa'i nye gnas dag la mched pa dang / bsnyen bkur na'ang / bsti stang du bcas pas g.yeg byed pa
134b3(mdo sde): dang theg pa chen po la shin tu bstan pa'i yi dam bcas te/ the tshom dang / phyir ldog pa'i sems mi bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang sems can dag theg pa chen po la dad cing
134b4(mdo sde): yid ches pa dang / gzungasu 'dzin pa dang / slob pa nan/ tan byed du 'jug na/ rgyal rigs gdol pa can 'di dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gdol pa can
134b5(mdo sde): dag ni/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du gnang ngo // gzhan yang grong
134b6(mdo sde): dang grong khyer dang / nor dbyig thams cad la spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas/ ngan song gzhan gyi bar du yang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
134b7(mdo sde): de ni ngas rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du gnang ngo // de ltar grong dang grong khyer la spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar
134b8(mdo sde): ltung ba nas/ ngan song gzhan du yang mi ltung ngo // sems can gang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag mo ma lus par byang bar 'dod na// ngas bstan pa'i dam
135a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan du bslab cing gzung su bzung bar bya'o// gang gis de ltar dge 'dun gyi mngon sum du gyur pa la shin tu 'dzem
135a2(mdo sde): dang ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis sdig pa'i las so sor bshags na/ sngon gyi dus na byas pa'i sdig pa'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus pa dang / yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
135a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po brgyang ba// de'i tshe byang chub
135a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos yang bcom/ da ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun dpa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
135a5(mdo sde): po ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa la gas/ ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zagal 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rang sangs
135a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa ma mchis
135a7(mdo sde): pa lags/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongasu 'phel bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
135a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod ngas/ chos kyi snod ma lags pa yang rung / chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu 'tshal zhing / swa dang kha spu bregs pa thams
135b1(mdo sde): cad la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams
135b2(mdo sde): kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing / 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba
135b3(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'jal cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub
135b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas dang mi 'bral ba da dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'du ngan la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral
135b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ la rab tu brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la sems
135b6(mdo sde): mi ngoms pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
135b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// 
135b8(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul
136a1(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// 
136a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongasu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu chos
136a3(mdo sde): gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa thams cad la 'khrul pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno
136a4(mdo sde): ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams la dbang du
136a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag rngu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang
136a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang / mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mi
136a7(mdo sde): 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms pa dang / sngon gyi
136a8(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci byas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i chos kyi ye shes rdo rje ltar sral rno bas lhag ma ma lus par bcom ste/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ba dang / gas
136b1(mdo sde): du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad mi byed pa dang / skye ba dang / sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun
136b2(mdo sde): nan tan byed pa la skye zhing sgyid lugs pa med pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams 'jil ba la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med par sems can thams cad kyi rten dang / 
136b3(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tshe ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ni/ gar 'gro yang rin po che'i 'khor lo
136b4(mdo sde): thog mar 'gro ste/ rin po che gzhan de'i phyi bzhin du 'bra rang ngo // gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing sems can thams dri kyi lus dang sems kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang bsal te/ 
136b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / sems kyi ba/ de ba yang skye zhing 'phel bar byed do// byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de bzhin du 'gre/ 
136b6(mdo sde): lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul po med pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten dang gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// rig
136b7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ shing rta chen po ni 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan te/ mi mang po'i nang du 'dug nas lam chen por 'gro'o// lam de ni bong ba 'am/ gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma 'am/ 
136b8(mdo sde): rtsa'amashing ngam/ lo ma 'am/ yal ga 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa thams cad shing rta de'i 'khor lo'i 'og tu song na/ thams cad chag cing
137a1(mdo sde): grugs te/ nor du mi rung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang
137a2(mdo sde): sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu bcom ste/ rnam par smin pa mi len par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rnon po ni thang cig 'phangs
137a3(mdo sde): pas pas rgol ba'i dgra'i mgo dang yan lag bcad de de spyod pa'i mthu med par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan
137a4(mdo sde): na rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams cad nga 'joms pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad yongasu bcad de rnam par smin pa len par mi byed
137a5(mdo sde): do rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ me'i bskal pa byung ba'i/ tshe/ nyi ma lnga cig char shar nas/ gling bzhi'i klung / dang / mtsho dang / chu ba dang / chu'i khamasu gtogs pa
137a6(mdo sde): gsher ba thams cad gang yang mi skems pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na/ rgyu ba bzhi dang / nyon mongs/ 
137a7(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar smin pa thams cad yongasu skems par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ rlung gi
137a8(mdo sde): bskal pa byung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung chen po dus cig du langs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na ri bo che chung dang / sa chen po rnams thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar
137b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log bzhi dang / nga rgyal gyi ri thams cad mi shig/ 
137b2(mdo sde): pa gang yang med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
137b3(mdo sde): 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ seng ge'i rgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thang cig phyung bas gcan zan thams cad 'phur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad skrag cing mgul
137b4(mdo sde): mi nus par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po yang 'khor la rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan pa nga'i chos kyi sgra thang cig bsgrags pas mu stegs can dang / log
137b5(mdo sde): par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs gyur pa thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ smra ba'i chog 'khrul zhing 'grib pa dang / rgol mi nus par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ brgya byin
137b6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe/ lha'i dmag la gang gis bskor cing lag na rdo rje thogs te/ g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin thams cad skrag pas ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
137b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ log par lta ba'i mu stegs can thams cad dang log par ston pa sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad skrag nas
137b8(mdo sde): 'bros par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse me la btags na/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ dbul 'dzi
138a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/ rnam pa dag
138a2(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims kyi rgyul mtshan la gnas na/ chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pas sems can tshad med pa thams cad la sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
138a3(mdo sde): mtshan mo'i dus su 'dzag rten kun mun par gyur nas/ 'thom zhing 'brog bslad pa na/ zla ba nya ba shar bas mun pa thams cad bsal te/ 'brog bslad pa rnams kyi lam mtshon par
138a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ra' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ sems can gang ma rig pa'i mun pa'i mun pas 'dongs te
138a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad stor ba rnams la/ byang / chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos bshad de/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba skyes
138a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad mngon du gyur te/ zag pa thams cad nas sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zad par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po/ 
138a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du shar ba dang / lo tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/ me tog dang / lo tog dang / lo ma thams cad rgyas pa dang / mnam zhing brtseg pa thams cad sel ba dang / lo tog
138a8(mdo sde): gi 'bru dang / sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang / gangs kyi ri bo zhubs 'bab chu kun 'brug ste/ rims kyis rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang / 
138b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/ lhag pa'i sbyin pa la gnas shing dul ba'i tshul khrims dang / bde ba'i bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang // 
138b2(mdo sde): rab dang / thabs dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / spobs pa'i yon tan shin tu rgyas shing / sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos ston to// chos de'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis sem/ 
138b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag pa'i lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / lhag pa'i spyod pa dam pa'i me tog dang / lo ma rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i
138b4(mdo sde): las ngan pa thams cad yongasu sel ba dang / mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu yongasu smon par 'gyur ba/  dang / log par lta ba dang / nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing
138b5(mdo sde): 'bab pas yang dag pa'i dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ting / nge 'dzin gyi chu rims kyis 'bab cing / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
138b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho 'gengs pa dang / sems can thams cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
138b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor lo bcu zhes bya ba ni/ chos gzhan la mi gdags kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nyid yin par shes par bya'o// 
138b8(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad
139a1(mdo sde): yid bzhin du rdzogs pa dang / myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i rgya mtsho yang su 'gengs pa dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ye shes kyis skye bo thams cad
139a2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byed cing / thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba yong su thob par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ 
139a3(mdo sde): kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu spangs te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di la yongasu bsngags pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to// de bas na gang gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di
139a4(mdo sde): dag las 'ga' zhig nam 'tsho ba'i bar du ma nyams par srung na/ 'bras bu khyad par can mchog tu 'gyur ba tham das cad thob pa ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi/ 
139a5(mdo sde): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang nam 'tshe ba'i bar du srog gcod pa yongs su spangs/ na/ de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa
139a6(mdo sde): yin te/ sems can de dag la 'jigs shing bag tsha bar mi byed pas/ de'i 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal mi bskyed pa'i dbang gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur
139a7(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba srog gcod pa'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du
139a8(mdo sde): 'jug cing mthong ba dang / thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 
139b1(mdo sde): 'di ltar srog gcod pa yongs spangs pa'i 'khor los de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom zhing brnyil bas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang / 
139b2(mdo sde): mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dog pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus
139b3(mdo sde): dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis ma gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jigs pa gci
139b4(mdo sde): rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khri dmas dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa
139b5(mdo sde): dang 'phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas par shin tu dad pa skye bar 'a gyur ro// yang tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/ 
139b6(mdo sde): dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde
139b7(mdo sde): zhing skyid pa dang / gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjesu slob
139b8(mdo sde): pa dang srog gcod pa yongasu spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / 
140a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad la rims kyis gnos zhing
140a2(mdo sde): shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal 'jug pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshon cha med pa dang / dgra dang 'tshe ba'i ming mi grags pa dang / 
140a3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ rab tu bde ba'i skyid pa dang / nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba'i zhing du sems can de dag skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu
140a4(mdo sde): med de sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /  dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med
140a5(mdo sde): pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// srog gcod pa yong su spangs pa'i
140a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo ste dang po'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// nyan thos kyi
140a7(mdo sde): theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyu ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg
140a8(mdo sde): pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yong su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
140b1(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par
140b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
140b3(mdo sde): gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing rjesu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyu
140b4(mdo sde): thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems da dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi da'abral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge
140b5(mdo sde): 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'a/ bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshe lab dang brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi
140b6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
140b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tshe ba'i bar du ma byin par len pa yongasu spangs na/ de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin te/ yongasu gdung
140b8(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin du rnyed pa'i nor gyis chog shes par gnas kyi/ chos ma yin pa'i nor dang khe la re ba med pa de'i dbang gis dge bI rtsa ba thams cad kyang
141a1(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying bar 'gyur ba yang ma byin par len pa'i dbang gis
141a2(mdo sde): lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las rnams bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing / mthong ba dang / thos pa'i rjesu yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
141a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / rin po che dang / nor la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar ma byin par len pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor
141a4(mdo sde): los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas rnam par smi ngan pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ste/ lus 'di nyid la' dang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing // yid du 'ong
141a5(mdo sde): bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde/ ba dang / nor rin po che thams cad dang ldan par/ 'gyur ro// nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus
141a6(mdo sde): dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ 
141a7(mdo sde): gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing
141a8(mdo sde): yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas pas dad pa skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir me'i nang du skyes te/ dbang po yongs su
141b1(mdo sde): rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / 'jig
141b2(mdo sde): pa lnga dang nor thun mong du mi 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyi dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad// 
141b3(mdo sde): de'i rjesu slob cing ma byin par len pa yongasu spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / theg pa
141b4(mdo sde): chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad yongasu tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa tham cad la rims kyis gzhol ba dang / shin tu yangs pa'i
141b5(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri na po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i
141b6(mdo sde): shing dang / rin po che'i rdzing dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang la sogs pas yongasu gang ba dang / sa bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis bkod pa dang ldan pa'i
141b7(mdo sde): zhing der sems can dag skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las
141b8(mdo sde): 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa'
142a1(mdo sde): chen pos ma byin par len pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ 
142a2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs
142a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon
142a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngun chos
142a5(mdo sde): gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa/ la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i/ chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang
142a6(mdo sde): rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhong 'phel ba dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi
142a7(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
142a8(mdo sde): kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chol/ 
142b1(mdo sde): ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// 
142b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tshe ba'i bar 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spangs na/ de nyid sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i klung gis
142b3(mdo sde): g.yengs pa las 'jigs pa med pa phrag dog med pa/ 'tshe ba med pa/ yongasu gdung ba med pa/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sbyin pa yin te/ bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing / gzhan
142b4(mdo sde): gyi chung ma la re ba med pas de'i dbang gis dge da ba'i rtsab thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i
142b5(mdo sde): rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing
142b6(mdo sde): mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chung ma'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar 'dod pas leg par
142b7(mdo sde): g.yem pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga'
142b8(mdo sde): zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / chung ma lhod pa dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang
143a1(mdo sde): sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdungs shing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed
143a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims deng yin
143a3(mdo sde): tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'bos
143a4(mdo sde): nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/ dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang dang gang du skyes par 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byad gzugs
143a5(mdo sde): bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde// zhing bskyed pa dang / phyir yang shin tu yid du'o// nga ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul
143a6(mdo sde): khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rje su slob cing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos/ 
143a7(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems
143a8(mdo sde): dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad la rims kyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// 
143b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med med pa dang / 'dod chags dang / g.yeng ba med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i sems can dag zhing der skyes te/ de dag thams cad/ 
143b2(mdo sde): rdzus te skye'i mi gtsang ba'i mngal nas skye ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med do// sems can dag la cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// 
143b3(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang
143b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas log/ par g.yem pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo gsum/ pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// 
143b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ 
143b7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gan
143b8(mdo sde): chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen
144a1(mdo sde): po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting
144a2(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba/ 
144a3(mdo sde): dang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun
144a4(mdo sde): la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral/ ba dang / dge ba'i rtsub thams cad tshol ba la brtson/ pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / 
144a5(mdo sde): smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms pa dang / 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa pa zhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
144a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho' ba'i bar du rdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur ba dang / tshig gcig pa tshad mar 'gyur ba dang / tshig
144a7(mdo sde): kun nyan cing gus pa dang dogs pa mi skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
144a8(mdo sde): 'bying ba yang brdzun du smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing / mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes
144b1(mdo sde): yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / tshig gcig pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar brdzun du smra ba yod/ 
144b2(mdo sde): su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par 'gyuraro// lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang
144b3(mdo sde): dogs pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad la gzhan yid ches shing nyan par 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang
144b4(mdo sde): sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin
144b5(mdo sde): tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// / gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ 
144b6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir
144b7(mdo sde): mi'i lus skye zhing dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par tshig gcig pa dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu/ 
144b8(mdo sde): bde zhing skyid pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyi dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjesu srog
145a1(mdo sde): pa dang / brdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad rdzogs pa dang / 
145a2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad la rims kyis gzhol ba dang / shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes
145a3(mdo sde): kyis rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bden par smra ba/ sgyu dang bral ba/ lha'i gsung gis yongasu brgyan pa dang / 
145a4(mdo sde): slu ba med cing sems kyi spyod pa dang drang ba dang / yang dag dpa spyod pa rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'ba' zhig la spyod pa da lha'i gos bsung can gyon pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis bkod
145a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sem/ sa can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston to// yongasu mya
145a6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
145a7(mdo sde): chen po'i brdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med
145a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa
145b1(mdo sde): med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yong su 'phel bar byed
145b2(mdo sde): ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu breg
145b3(mdo sde): pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing
145b4(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur/ zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
145b5(mdo sde): dang phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas man/ nga ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / 
145b6(mdo sde): chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / 
145b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
145b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du phra ma yongasu spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad gzhan gyis mnyan
146a1(mdo sde): pa dang 'dum pa dang dogs pa mi skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsab yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// thog ma med pa'i mtha' mas
146a2(mdo sde): rgyung ltar 'khar bar 'khar ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba yang bram byas pa'i dbang gis lus dang ga dang yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang tham par
146a3(mdo sde): ts+tsha su maM rang ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / 'dum pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur// 'di ltar bram
146a4(mdo sde): tshig yongs spangs pa'i 'khor lom lhag ma ma lus par dang su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do// lus 'di nyid la yang lnga dang mi la migs pa
146a5(mdo sde): dga' dang ming du nga ba dang / dgas pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra/ kha thams cad la nyan cing 'dum par 'gyur// @
146a6(mdo sde): pa 'dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyi gdu dong / yid du 'ong ba'i budang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'ab ba'i dus byed par
146a7(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pa nya mthong bar mi 'gyur// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyi rdul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bas
146a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang pra nga/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang bkur ba sti dang bcas pas shin tu dang bsgre bar 'gyur/ che 'phes nas kyang byer mi'i nang du
146b1(mdo sde): skyes te dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par smra ba'i tshig 'jam zhing 'dum pa dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / 
146b2(mdo sde): rab tu bde zhing bsgying bapa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ 
146b3(mdo sde): de'i rjesu slob pa dang / phra ma'i tshig dang yongasu bral bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa dang / theg
146b4(mdo sde): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang nga chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams ca dang la rims kyis gzhol cing / ye shes kyis rgya mtsho
146b5(mdo sde): la 'jug pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu bar+Na/ na pa sra ba mi shigs pa dang / lha rdzas bzang pos yongs su
146b6(mdo sde): brgyan par 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa mi rtsod pa shin tu dul zhing 'dum pa/ dge ba'i chos tshol ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'dum zhing gus pas dam pa'i chos nyan
146b7(mdo sde): pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i
146b8(mdo sde): chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phra ma yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo// 
147a1(mdo sde): lnga pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg/ 
147a2(mdo sde): pa'i gang zag dag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa
147a3(mdo sde): chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan/ 
147a4(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa
147a5(mdo sde): med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas/ gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i she/ sa rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel
147a6(mdo sde): ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu
147a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod
147a8(mdo sde): ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
147b1(mdo sde): sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tshe ba'i bar du ni
147b2(mdo sde): gcod pa'i tshig thams cad yongasu spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba kun la pha rol po kun dga' zhing nyan pas dogs pa med par 'gyur te/ 
147b3(mdo sde): de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig gi dbang gis lus dang
147b4(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing / mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / 
147b5(mdo sde): sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / shin tu 'dum pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di// ltar zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma
147b6(mdo sde): ma lus par yongasu bcom pa'i dbang gis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang
147b7(mdo sde): sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba dang / snyan par 'gyur ro// nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi
147b8(mdo sde): gdungs shing / nyon mi mongs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bar 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi// shin tu 'jigs
148a1(mdo sde): pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yi 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams
148a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/ dbang po
148a3(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par tshig 'jam par smra ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing snying pa
148a4(mdo sde): dang phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ das kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjesu slob
148a5(mdo sde): padang zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongasu spong ba dang / sdigapa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / 
148a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad rims kyis gzhol zhing / shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho
148a7(mdo sde): la 'jug pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thams cad dang bral te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs
148a8(mdo sde): dang chos kyi spras zhing de yongasu gang ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros su ldan pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shin tu dul ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ba dang / rtag tu tshig 'jam pas gcig
148b1(mdo sde): la gcig bskul bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin chos ston pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang
148b2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe gcod pa'i
148b3(mdo sde): tshig yong su spongs pa'i 'khor lo drug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'dri drang ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par
148b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa/ med par 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la/ 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
148b5(mdo sde): gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// dkon mchog
148b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal
148b7(mdo sde): bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nam
148b8(mdo sde): kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel po dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ni dbyer mi ldeg pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gcin
149a1(mdo sde): dang phrad cing rjesu 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi
149a2(mdo sde): nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
149a3(mdo sde): tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bzha
149a4(mdo sde): pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du rgya dag kyal pa yongasu spangs pas/ sems can thams ca
149a5(mdo sde): kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba tham/ sa cad don tu 'gyur zhing tshig thos pa rnams nyan ci / gus pas dogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de'i dbang gis
149a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang tshig kyal pa smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang
149a7(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / 
149a8(mdo sde): sems kyi sgrib pa dang / don du smra ba la sgribs pas bsgribs par gyur te// 'di ltar tshig kyal ba yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas/ rnams
149b1(mdo sde): smin pa'i 'bras bu mo len par byed do// lus 'di nyid la ltu dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang
149b2(mdo sde): tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor gyis
149b3(mdo sde): yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pi nya mthong bar mi 'gyur// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ 
149b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod namasakyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang se dmas rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcwa
149b5(mdo sde): pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa yan la ga dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par phan pa dang
149b6(mdo sde): don du 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis
149b7(mdo sde): dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjesu slob pa dang / tshig kyal par smra ba yongs su spong ba dang / sdig
149b8(mdo sde): pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang
150a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad rims kyis gzhol zhing / shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyis rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bran
150a2(mdo sde): med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing don med pa'i tshig thams cad dang bral te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gtogs pa chos chen po'i sgra mchog dam pa rnam sa
150a3(mdo sde): mang pos zhing de yongasu khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i smon lam dang / ye shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas chos kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems can de lta bu
150a4(mdo sde): dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs
150a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas/ shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang
150a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig kyal pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo bdun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas/ 
150a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rangs
150a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang bag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang bag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// nan/ 
150b1(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung yong su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdong ngam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngun chas gro
150b2(mdo sde): kyi chal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen por chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / 
150b3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge/ 
150b4(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas
150b5(mdo sde): mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'dra la ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen du/ kur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad
150b6(mdo sde): tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ska ba
150b7(mdo sde): pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du chags sems yongasu spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par
150b8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor gyi
151a1(mdo sde): rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang chags sems kyi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang / yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing / 
151a2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / 'dod sems med pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur
151a3(mdo sde): 'dod sems yongasu spong ba'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la'ang lha dang / mi la sogs pa kun
151a4(mdo sde): dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa med par 'gyurd ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'chi 'phe ba
151a5(mdo sde): dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor gyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par
151a6(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod na/ 
151a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po
151a8(mdo sde): yong su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa med pa dang / byang gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzungs pa dang / rab tu de/ 
151b1(mdo sde): zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi ning yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de rjes
151b2(mdo sde): slob pa dang / chags sems yongasu spong ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / 
151b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad la rims kyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i
151b4(mdo sde): bar du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthil ba bzhin du mnyam la rin po che rnam pa mang pos yongasu gang ra ba dang / rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang
151b5(mdo sde): rin po che'i gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / gser dngul dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / shing
151b6(mdo sde): la sogs pas yongasu gang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong zhing lta na sdug pa/ nga rgyal yongasu spang ba/ byad gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ dbang po ma nyams pa/ sems mnyam pa/ 
151b7(mdo sde): sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ chags sems med pa'i nan tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag
151b8(mdo sde): cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par
152a1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags sems yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o// byang chub
152a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// rang sadra
152a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang
152a4(mdo sde): zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog ga/ sum gyi gdung yong su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gsheg/ dpa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos
152a5(mdo sde): kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal du gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med/ bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar
152a6(mdo sde): zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la
152a7(mdo sde): dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing / de'i rje su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sem/ 
152a8(mdo sde): dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang
152b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsab thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa/ 
152b2(mdo sde): yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mang/ bam po ngas
152b3(mdo sde): b.rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du gnod sems yongasu spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing // bla mar byed pa
152b4(mdo sde): dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// thog ma med pa'i mtha' na
152b5(mdo sde): rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang gno/ da sems kyis dbang gis/ lus dang ngag dang / yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang
152b6(mdo sde): bying du 'dzud cing / mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / gnod sems byed pas
152b7(mdo sde): sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/ lus
152b8(mdo sde): 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus
153a1(mdo sde): byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdungs shing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas
153a2(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon
153a3(mdo sde): tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur bsti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe 'phos
153a4(mdo sde): nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing / dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa/ yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas/ gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing / dri ma dang bral ba
153a5(mdo sde): dang byad gzugs bzang ba dang yid gzhu nges pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul
153a6(mdo sde): khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rje su 'thun par slob pa dang / gnod sems yongasu spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad/ 
153a7(mdo sde): yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon pa
153a8(mdo sde): dang spyod pa thams cad rims kyis gnol zhing / shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshol 'jug pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
153b1(mdo sde): chog pa dang / smye dang / sman dang / khrug rdzas dang / rdu dang / dris dang / mithug pa/ mi mdzes pa/ thams cad dang shAl te/ rin pa tsham pas shem
153b2(mdo sde): ba yid du 'ong ba dang / dargyal dang bral ba/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbang po mnyams pa/ sems rtag tu ni ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/ byams pa dang / snying
153b3(mdo sde): dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas rgyan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag ces 'dul ba bzhin dam pa'i chos ston to// 
153b4(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byung
153b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo dgu pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di
153b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med
153b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// 
153b8(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yong su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngun
154a1(mdo sde): chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du
154a2(mdo sde): 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams
154a3(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub
154a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
154a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna
154a6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam
154a7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i bar du log par lta ba yongasu spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par rtogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang
154a8(mdo sde): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang log par lta ba'i dbang gis lus dang / 
154b1(mdo sde): ngag dang / yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing / mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjesu yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems kyi/ 
154b2(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas/ ni
154b3(mdo sde): par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / 
154b4(mdo sde): sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug pa sngal gyis mi gdungs shing / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 
154b5(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i du sa byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// yid du 'ong ba'i
154b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad delus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang
154b7(mdo sde): bkur bsti dang bcas pas dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa/ yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes
154b8(mdo sde): par sems rnam par dag cing / log par lta ba dang bral ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i
155a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rje su 'thun par
155a2(mdo sde): slob pa dang / log par lta ba'i chos yongasu spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / zag
155a3(mdo sde): ba chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad rims kyis gzhol zhing / shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug
155a4(mdo sde): pa nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// / rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang / rang sang das rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / lha'i bdud kyi 'khor
155a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba dang / mu stegs can gyi'ar thams cad dang bral ba dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tu mdzes pa dang / yang dag
155a6(mdo sde): bar lta ba dang ldan zhing / ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang / rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gi lta ba thams cad
155a7(mdo sde): yongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skyes te/ shin tu tshe ring ba dang / theg pa chen po'i ro gcig pa la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang
155a8(mdo sde): dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / 
155b1(mdo sde): bde ba'i don tu ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongasu rgyas par byed cing / bgegs dang bar chad med par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
155b2(mdo sde): chen po lag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa bcu pa 'di dang ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
155b3(mdo sde): la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
155b4(mdo sde): pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsu
155b5(mdo sde): gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod de// ma/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos
155b6(mdo sde): gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gang du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang
155b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi khyad par can rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang
155b8(mdo sde): rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas
156a1(mdo sde): mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mi 'bral
156a2(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur
156a3(mdo sde): te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med
156a4(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
156a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spangs nas/ thams cadakyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags
