156a6(mdo sde): shing bstod de/ sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / phan pa'i don dang / byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang / 
156a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang / ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab par bya ba dang / khams
156a8(mdo sde): gsum gyi srid pa yongasu gcad par bya ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gcad par bya ba dang / thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong
156b1(mdo sde): lce du mju pa byor/ ngas pa shad pa bzhin du sa dge ba btsu las kyi bras bu ma snang // de bas na rigs kyi thugs te yang dag 'dzas ba bzhin du ge ba btsul la
156b2(mdo sde): 'dra ba sgrubs pa mngon par 'chang du ba 'am/ rlung ngun yang dag pajil ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyil ma 'ga' tsam yang ni srung bar nga ni theg pa chen pa yang dag par byed pa'i na
156b3(mdo sde): nga ni dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'i zhes zer na/ gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
156b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten srub dang / 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba med pa/ stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba/ glen pa srub can yin te/ de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes
156b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam/ mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgom pa 'am/ nan tan bya mi dgos pa
156b6(mdo sde): byang chub dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob du zin na ni/ bskal pa gcig tsam la yud tsam thang cig gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phram
156b7(mdo sde): snyed kyi sems can thams cad byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcul
156b8(mdo sde): las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yin te/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o// rigs kyi bu gal te sems bskyed pa tsam mam/ smin pa
157a1(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba thob
157a2(mdo sde): tu zin na ni/ bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
157a3(mdo sde): chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang / 
157a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na/ phyogs bcu'i sang
157a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bad ga ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te/ 'chang dam/ nyan tam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btag
157a6(mdo sde): kyang byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan
157a7(mdo sde): tan byas pas/ 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze la sogs pas rigs chen po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha nas/ 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi bar du yod pa
157a8(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos kyi zag pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang yod par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu
157b1(mdo sde): las kyi lam la nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'dod na/ dge ba bcu'i la/ 
157b2(mdo sde): kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/ mi dge ba bcu'i sdoms pa la mi gnas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// gang myur du
157b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i spyod yul chud par 'dod dam/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'dod dam/ myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'dod
157b4(mdo sde): na sngar dge bo bcu'i las kyi lam shin tu bsrungs bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan
157b5(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i bzhi dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi
157b6(mdo sde): lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su gcad de gsungs pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsnga/ 
157b7(mdo sde): kun gcod cing // byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa// dge bcu'i 'khor lo nan tan la// le lo ma byed brtson par gyis// theg pa gsum gyi dam chos dang // theg pa rnam gsum gang
157b8(mdo sde): zag dang // rab tu byung ba thams cad la// 'khrul pa med par thob par 'gyur// theg chen spyod la dang mos shing // thams cad 'khor gyi dbugs 'byin pa'i// chos mchog rtogs nas ning // 
158a1(mdo sde): der byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na// kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed// rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring / 
158a2(mdo sde): bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med// skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // myur du bla med byang chub thob// ma byin len/ 
158a3(mdo sde): pa yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed// 'dod chag skye zhing lam kun zhi// 'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu long spyod ldan// sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te/ 
158a4(mdo sde): rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang // yid 'ong sangs rgyas zhing yang thob// 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na/ nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags sred pa'i
158a5(mdo sde): mtsho yang skems// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur thob// sems can rnam pa mang po yang // 'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par 'gyur// theg chen la ni rab bkod nas// 
158a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod du btsud// brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na// 'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes thob// rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'// brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil/ 
158a7(mdo sde): tshig gcig tshad mor gtsugs pas na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // brdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// phra ma'i chog smra yongs spangs na/ 
158a8(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // chad par lta bar yang mi 'gyur// 'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang // rin chen gter gyi gzungs thob cing // zab
158b1(mdo sde): mo'i chos kyi rgya mtsho rig/ myur du bla med byang chub thob// gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te// 'jam zhing gnyen pa'i tshig smras na// sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur// sngam 'am/ 
158b2(mdo sde): dge'i las kyang zhi// 'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes// sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// kyal par smra ba yong
158b3(mdo sde): spangs na// mkhas par bkur zhing bla mar byed// gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun// yon tan rnam lnga thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing // 'phags pa'i lam tshe la spro bar 'gyur/ 
158b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad ma khyen pa myur du 'thob// gal te chags sems yongs spangs te// 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing // ngur smrig rgyan
158b5(mdo sde): la mchod pa byed// theg pa gsum gyi byang chub bsgrub// rtag/ tu rnam dag zhing du skye// ston pa'i gnas su gan/ sa par 'gyur// bla med theg pa la zhon te// rgyal
158b6(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob// gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te// gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgom na// mnyam par gzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'phags pa'i spyod yul mos
158b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// de la gnas na byang chub 'thob// gnod sems thams cad spang bar bya// ngan par lta ba
158b8(mdo sde): yongs spangs te// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na// theg gsum ston la mos byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed// ngan song kun las yongs thar te/ 
159a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// ye shes mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// dge ba bcu yi las ma/ 
159a2(mdo sde): gyis byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang // sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur// bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor lo 'dis// ngan
159a3(mdo sde): song thams cad rab ba tsam nas// sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po// sa'i snying po'i 'khor
159a4(mdo sde): lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ dge ba'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
159a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha che/ na po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod do// byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan ni// 
159a6(mdo sde): thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bskum te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
159a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
159a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / 
159b1(mdo sde): lus kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad ba dang / lpag pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / 
159b2(mdo sde): yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brag la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed na/ lus dang / srog la
159b3(mdo sde): mi lta zhing / bdag gcig pu 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen
159b4(mdo sde): po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems
159b5(mdo sde): bskyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// se mas can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa
159b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// gzhan las spag go snyam pa med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna dang / zhum pa med
159b7(mdo sde): bo'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin no// gang sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung / chung yang rung / chung ngu na zan chang gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
159b8(mdo sde): mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin
160a1(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed do// gang sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung / chung yang rung / chung ngu na zan chang gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang / rnam pa tham
160a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su sngo zhing / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de
160a3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed na/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sang
160a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thamasacad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongasu bsrung
160a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi bdag gi
160a6(mdo sde): dbul ba de spang ba dang / bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad
160a7(mdo sde): kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi dbul 'phongs pa spong ba dang
160a8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las 'don pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig/ 
160b1(mdo sde): gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no// de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing
160b2(mdo sde): chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongasu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin
160b4(mdo sde): pa byed de/ sems can thams cad yongasasu sdud pa'i so dmas dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ci mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad
160b5(mdo sde): kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin
160b6(mdo sde): pa byed do// de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / 
160b7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / bsrung ba byed par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing / 
160b8(mdo sde): byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes
161a1(mdo sde): bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ sbyin pa'i dngos po tshang
161a2(mdo sde): med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin pas/ sbyin pa
161a3(mdo sde): 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no// de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o// gal te 'jig rten
161a4(mdo sde): gyi 'dod pa lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang / snying / rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
161a5(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam lnga la gas pas sbyin pa byed no// bdag nyid kyi lus sku ga bsngal gyi cha chung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na/ sems ca/ 
161a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa bsal ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin
161a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa// mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas// 'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni spangs te// sems can kun la phan dang bde byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir
161a8(mdo sde): gyi rnam smin 'bras bu phyir ni ma yin// smin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang // 'dod pa rnam
161b1(mdo sde): lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags padag gi phyag rgyas ma btab// mnges pa'i tshogs la gnas 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // 'dod pa lnga la mi gnas pa ni// nyan
161b2(mdo sde): thos dang ni rang rgyal ba yi// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la// rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing // sems can kun la bde ba byas na/ 
161b3(mdo sde): yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub
161b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal da pa'i phyir/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
161b5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tha ma sa cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur
161b6(mdo sde): ba dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyuraro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
161b7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig
161b8(mdo sde): rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis/ 
162a1(mdo sde): su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams gzungs
162a2(mdo sde): 'dzin cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do// nam chos ston pa'i tshe na/ phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / 
162a3(mdo sde): ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang / rnyed par mi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang / bdag mi stod pa'i sems dang / bsti bstang dang bcas
162a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen dpo'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems su bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos
162a5(mdo sde): ston cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rangs/ rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
162a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya
162a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston gyi/ dbang po snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to// gang theg pa chen po'i
162a8(mdo sde): sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ram/ nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen
162b1(mdo sde): spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces bskul ba'i skabs ni yod do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la/ 
162b2(mdo sde): nan tan gyis shig ces bskul ba'i skabs kyang yod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung ngu na tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la yang
162b3(mdo sde): shin tu dad cing bkur bsti byed kyi/ de la 'phya ba 'am/ skur ba 'am/ bgegs sam/ bar chad mi byed de/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan pa'i
162b4(mdo sde): 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / gang la chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes ni dang / 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bcad de/ re ba med pas
162b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// byang chub
162b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bstsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i 'di ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham
162b7(mdo sde): cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis
162b8(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen pakur byed par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis den 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mkhas paces
163a1(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa spyod ba dag/ snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston te// theg pa gzhan dag de la sngon mi byed// zas nas de la 'phya zhing srur mi 'gyur/ 
163a2(mdo sde): dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi// dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no// so sor ji ltar ji lta mos pa bzhin// de dang de yi chos ston mgu bar byed// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i
163a3(mdo sde): gang zag la// theg pa chung ngu rnams kyi chos mi ston// bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la// thag pa 'bring dang rab kyis chos ston to// shin tu dad cing gus pas chos mnyan gyi/ 
163a4(mdo sde): de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o// chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed// / kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nang bsal phyir// dam pa'i
163a5(mdo sde): chos kyi sman dag mnyan par bskul// khe dang grags pa shin tu/ ring spangs te// dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing ban/ da par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
163a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed
163a7(mdo sde): nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur
163a8(mdo sde): ba dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag
163b1(mdo sde): bgo cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa'o// de la ji ltar na byung
163b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba gang zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa/ yang na rab tu byung ba so sor
163b3(mdo sde): thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong pa ste/ 
163b4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no// byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis/ sems
163b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ le ga par lta ba sel bar ram/ las kyi sgrib/ pa dang / 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ 
163b6(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
163b7(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcun
163b8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ngo // 
164a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo can
164a2(mdo sde): rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi phyed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongasu srung ngo // khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang
164a3(mdo sde): khong khro ba med pa dang / ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongasu srung ngo // srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnam par rtog pa med pas tshul khrims yod
164a4(mdo sde): su srung ngo // 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrim sa srung ngo // gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs med pa
164a5(mdo sde): khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi gan sa par tshul khrims srung ngo // rnyed pa dang / mi rnyed pa la
164a6(mdo sde): mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'du byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun
164a7(mdo sde): mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 
164a8(mdo sde): 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
164b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// 
164b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa// rang byung so ser thar pa'i tshul khrims// 
164b3(mdo sde): theg pa gnyis dang thun mong pa yin// byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya// mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa// 'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas// srid pa kun la gnas ma yin
164b4(mdo sde): par rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // mtsha na ma spang ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// chags pa med de za dag pa kun med// tshul khrims 'di ltar srung ba dag ni// yang
164b5(mdo sde): dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ba/ zod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang
164b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin
164b7(mdo sde): tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sang rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang
164b8(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis
165a1(mdo sde): te gang zhe na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa gang zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcwa
165a2(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs pa/ len pa dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten te/ bzod
165a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed pa'o// 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ci mi snyam pa med
165a4(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu zhan pa'i bzod pa sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo dang sbyar bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang / 
165a5(mdo sde): sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i ba zod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'a jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan tho/ 
165a6(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mong ba yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / 
165a7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang
165a8(mdo sde): zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / 
165b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang / tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad thams cad yongasu bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa la spyod do// bzod pa/ 
165b2(mdo sde): 'di bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum
165b3(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongasu bcad pas/ bzod pa
165b4(mdo sde): 'di bsgom pa'i tshe/ sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas/ 'di da ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// rigs
165b5(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha/ chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas/ thog/ ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal
165b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
165b7(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ de nas bco ldan
165b8(mdo sde): 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te// mtshan mar bcas dang mtshan mo med pa// mtshan mar bcas
166a1(mdo sde): bzod pa chags yod// mkhas pa dag ni de la mi stod// 'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang // skye mched la brten bzod pa sgom pa// de ni zag pa
166a2(mdo sde): bzod pa yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas// chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing // 'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhe na// bzod// 
166a3(mdo sde): pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing // rtog pa thams cad yongasu spangs te// sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa// bzod pa 'di la thams
166a4(mdo sde): cad stod 'gyur// thams cad chos la ro gcig 'dun bar// stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i zhi ba// sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags// bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher
166a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems de/ pa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha che/ na po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166a6(mdo sde): chen po gang 'khor lod dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
166a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji
166a8(mdo sde): ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar
166b1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi lnga kyi dngos po rnam pa gsu
166b2(mdo sde): la nan tan byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams kyi las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams
166b3(mdo sde): byed pa'i las so// las 'di dag byed pa ni/ brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnam pa 'di dag ni/ sems can 'di dag ni dmigs pa/ zag pa dang bcas pa/ 
166b4(mdo sde): nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bra/ sa bu la brten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus
166b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sogs dang thun mong yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa'
166b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten
166b7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyi/ 
166b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i las dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rten dang / 
167a1(mdo sde): gnas med de/ brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang
167a2(mdo sde): dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom me// khams gsum gyi
167a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de/ sme ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu
167a4(mdo sde): 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsomo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod
167a5(mdo sde): pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus/ dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i/ 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i kham
167a6(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa kun la mi gan pa'i
167a7(mdo sde): 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i
167a8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
167b1(mdo sde): dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po
167b2(mdo sde): 'khor long dang ldan na/ theg ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
167b3(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
167b4(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gas dal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa// dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i// bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyi
167b5(mdo sde): ba shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur// sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas la// len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom/ 
167b6(mdo sde): na yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni// chags pa thams cad ring du spungs te// sems ni ci la'ang mog na
167b7(mdo sde): mi chags// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing // phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te// thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba// 'di ni byang chub
167b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus tsam pa'i mthar byin/ 'khor la 'dis ni yongasu bcam pa/ rgya ba kun nas nyon mangs bcings par// rigs kyi rje
168a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'ang/ 
168a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsad
168a3(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bas gtan
168a4(mdo sde): gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chu/ ba sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'ji/ garten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na
168a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bas ma gtan bsgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam
168a6(mdo sde): gtan bsgom pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas pas
168a7(mdo sde): gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gan
168a8(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
168b1(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan skom pa dang / gnas lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
168b2(mdo sde): gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams
168b3(mdo sde): la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas
168b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la ga/ nus nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gan
168b5(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tsher ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lagan
168b6(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan skem pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med/ 
168b7(mdo sde): 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dug
168b8(mdo sde): chung ngul gnas nas bsam gtan skom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan skem pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni
169a1(mdo sde): zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ chag pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// 
169a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes bya ste/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan
169a3(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ 'di lta/ 
169a4(mdo sde): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar dbasam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar/ bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral bar bas
169a5(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
169a6(mdo sde): khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar
169a7(mdo sde): gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
169a8(mdo sde): pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang
169b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 
169b2(mdo sde): me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par
169b3(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 
169b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam dmakha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
169b5(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes
169b6(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
169b7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
169b8(mdo sde): pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa/ zag pa zad pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
170a1(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan
170a2(mdo sde): gyi ga cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ theg ma sems skyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / 
170a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
170a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'dangs kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigs
170a5(mdo sde): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni// dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom te/ bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod// yang dag
170a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin// snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang // tshu rol pha rol mu la gnas na// sems can dag la phan
170a7(mdo sde): don byed min// sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir// ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spangs te// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba// de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan
170a8(mdo sde): nyid/ sems can thams cad sim par byed phyir// mi gnas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa// de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya// srid pas
170b1(mdo sde): bcings pa thams cad bkrol te// 'jigs pa med pa'i grong du gzung byir// rab tu ni pa'i ting 'dzin parnam pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// 'dus pa chen 'o// 
170b2(mdo sde): las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / 
170b3(mdo sde): bam po bcu pa/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa
170b4(mdo sde): chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing // 
170b5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nam// sa kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang // / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
170b6(mdo sde): dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni rnam pa gnyis
170b7(mdo sde): te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum
170b8(mdo sde): gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang / pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la brten te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig
171a1(mdo sde): ba'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg
171a2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i chos shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag
171a3(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam
171a4(mdo sde): du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do// de bzhi na gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i
171a5(mdo sde): chos la brtson 'grusu klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i
171a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs
171a7(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan
171a8(mdo sde): byed de// de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya/ 
171b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham
171b2(mdo sde): cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub
171b3(mdo sde): kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa na/ ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyu
171b4(mdo sde): bapar ston cing 'chad kyang / de la dmig su med pa'i spyod pa/ la gnas te/ mi g.yo ba dang / mi rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / na mkha' lta bu'i sems dang / rab tu
171b5(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa'i sha sa rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang / 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog
171b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems dang / rnam pa
171b7(mdo sde): mi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / 
171b8(mdo sde): mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa la chags pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'ji
172a1(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i
172a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs
172a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa
172a4(mdo sde): dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod
172a5(mdo sde): de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'a khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya
172a6(mdo sde): thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis/ 
172a7(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
172a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
172b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyi ga'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing / bzo dang rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don
172b2(mdo sde): yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 
172b3(mdo sde): pha dang ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na/ shin tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing / bsdu ba'i/ 
172b4(mdo sde): dngos po rnam bzhis sems can yongasu smin par byed do// // byang chub sems dpa' de bdag theg pa chen po la/ gnas pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs
172b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongasu ma smin pa la/ shin tu phra la zab pa/ dam pa'i chos
172b6(mdo sde): ston te/ slob tu gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan byed du gzhug go/ gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te/ nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / 
172b7(mdo sde): phyin ci log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
172b8(mdo sde): dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
173a1(mdo sde): pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu
173a2(mdo sde): smin par byed do// sems can gang khe dang / grags pa dang / longs spyod lags te/ dbang po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa la ni/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / 
173a3(mdo sde): ma mo klog pa 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa/ rnam par grol ba dang 'thun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste/ yongs su
173a4(mdo sde): smin par byed do// sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni/ rin po che dang / nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongasu smin par byed do// 
173a5(mdo sde): sems can gang gtum pa/ mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu bskul ba dang / sem sa can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang / 
173a6(mdo sde): sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yongs pa la ni bsam gtan sgom par skul ba dang / sems can 'chal ba'i shes
173a7(mdo sde): rab can la yang dag pa'i chos ston pas/ bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mkhas pas yongasu smin par byed do// sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon
173a8(mdo sde): bar ma dad cing mi gnas pa la mi spod pa can la ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang / bsnyen
173b1(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sdom pa bslab pas yongasu smin par byed do// gzhan yang gzo dang / rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongasu smin par byed do// de la sogs pa byang / 
173b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo // de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang / 
173b3(mdo sde): rgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de
173b4(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas
173b5(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs ma/ khas pa spyod pa'i gnasu gyur pa/ shin tu thabasamakhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa/ phyir ldog
173b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i cho su gyur pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi sten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs
173b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyuraro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thab/ 
173b8(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// shin tu thabs mi mkhas pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang / 
174a1(mdo sde): spyod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la yang rmongs par 'gyur bas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
174a2(mdo sde): pa dang theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/ gang theg pa chen po'i
174a3(mdo sde): chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang rang
174a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can da la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/ gang nyan thos
174a5(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang / dga' bar ston te/ 'khor/ ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to// gzhan yang shin/ 
174a6(mdo sde): tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas/ de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/ de
174a7(mdo sde): la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing / sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong la skye zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston to// gzhan yang
174a8(mdo sde): shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du bcug go/ sems can gang bzod pa skem par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba sten
174b1(mdo sde): cing tshul khrims srung du bcug go/ sems can gang brtson 'grus rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing bzod pa spyod du bcug go// sems can gang bsam gtan sgom
174b2(mdo sde): par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spang bar ston cing / brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcugo/ sems can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa lan shes rab spong ba ston cing / bsam gtan sgom
174b3(mdo sde): du bcug go// de ltar byang chub sem dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed mi nus te/ sems can bam/ 
174b4(mdo sde): cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabs mkhas pa dadi ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs
174b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub
174b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i
174b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang / rgyu rtsal rnam
174b8(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas/ yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pa dang
175a1(mdo sde): ma la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / 'ongs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang sgrub med pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa
175a2(mdo sde): mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rno pa bzhis sems can yongasu smin par byed de/ ci la mos pa dang dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos
175a3(mdo sde): ston to// gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob cing / nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan
175a4(mdo sde): byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang / rang sad des rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa la ni/ 'khoraraba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyi skyo ba ston cing / 'khor bas sku
175a5(mdo sde): ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar sku'o// sem sa can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa nas/ log pa ra lta ba'i bar du chags pa la dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji
175a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye ba 'di dang / pha rol sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong ba bstan te/ mi dge ba'i chos kyis
175a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// 
175a8(mdo sde): cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag pa bstan te/ khad kyis slob tu 'jug go/ sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par gyur pa rnams la ni/ tshul khrims rnam par
175b1(mdo sde): dag pa'i mchog srung bar ston pa de bzhin du/ rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyur pa la ni/ zag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes
175b2(mdo sde): rab blan med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
175b3(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na// 
175b4(mdo sde): thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu dbastsal pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs
175b5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
175b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu gcad/ 
175b7(mdo sde): de bka' stsal pa/ thabs mkhas nan tan rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das// chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas// chags med pa ni 'jig rten 'das// shin tu
175b8(mdo sde): thabs mkhas nan tan ni// khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas// dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas// dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das// gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa// de ni leg
176a1(mdo sde): bar chos stan min// bdag kyang yongasu mi smin na// gzhan gyi don tu ga la 'gyur// gcig tu mi dge sems can la// theg pa gsum gyi
176a2(mdo sde): chos ston na// de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste// byang chub chen po de ma yin// theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing // yang dag pa'i chos 'dod la// 'khor bar spro ba'i chos ston na// mkhra/ 
176a3(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin// rtse gcig blo yis rab brtags te// 'dod dang mos pa bzhin du ste// de ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas// mkhas pa rnams kyi de la bsngags// sems can
176a4(mdo sde): sdig pa dag spyod kyang // theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na/ da dbang po snod bzhin chos bstan te// sdig pa kun las dgrol bar byed// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
176a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ theg ma sems
176a6(mdo sde): bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen
176a7(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i 'khor
176a8(mdo sde): lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dmigs
176b1(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po 'go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems/ 
176b2(mdo sde): can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems
176b3(mdo sde): can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed do// rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag gi sgrib pa bstsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa
176b4(mdo sde): gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'gru das la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di
176b5(mdo sde): ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yin// chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / thun mong ma yin gyi
176b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / 
176b7(mdo sde): bde ba'i don du brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad rab tu
176b8(mdo sde): zhi ba'i yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongasu gcad pa'i phyir/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed do// de
177a1(mdo sde): bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa
177a2(mdo sde): ni phung po la mi gnas/ skye mched la mi gnas/ khams la mi gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so// 
177a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas// tshu rol
177a4(mdo sde): gyi mu la mi gnas/ pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ dmigs da pa la mi gnas/ mi dmigs pa la mi gnas/ de da ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la
177a5(mdo sde): nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni byang chu ba sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha/ 
177a6(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga
177a7(mdo sde): yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / 
177a8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ 
177b1(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba// sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa// sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing // bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol/ 
177b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can thams cad kun gyi phyir// thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgom// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dri ma bcu gsum
177b3(mdo sde): rab spangs nas// byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed// chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms na// bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min// bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na/ 
177b4(mdo sde): sems can kun las shin tu 'phags// ji ltar seng+ge'i rgyal po de// ri dgas kun las 'phags pa bzhin// bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu btul// rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin
177b5(mdo sde): spangs// sems la cis kyang mi gos na// myur du bya// nga chub chen po 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ge
177b6(mdo sde): cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bstsal te/ nyan thos dang
177b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams
177b8(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de ji lta zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
178a1(mdo sde): don gyi phyir/ snying rje la spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba 'don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sem
178a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni bdag 'ba' zhig la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed// 
178a3(mdo sde): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
178a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rangs nga rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur/ 
178a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can tham sa cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongasu smin par byed do// stong
178a6(mdo sde): rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa yongasu bsdud pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang / bran dang / las
178a7(mdo sde): byed pa'i mi dang / yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / lus dang / sreg gi bar du yongasu gtong ba la ser sna med de/ mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems
178a8(mdo sde): can yod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byed par mi mthong / len par mi mthong / nor gyi dngos por mi mthong / sbyin pa spyod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur mi mthong ba nas/ ming mim
178b1(mdo sde): pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po bskyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngag bstan pa don bsgrub pa dang / don 'thun pas ci dang cis 'dul
178b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ mi dmigs pa yang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang / 
178b3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad med pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sems kyis/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba
178b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa la skyo ba med do// de ltar na byang chub sems
178b5(mdo sde): dpa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ba ma yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
178b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongasu bstsal to/ byang chub sem dpa' sos dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sang+yas
178b7(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyu tha~Md kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur
178b8(mdo sde): byed par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag/ snying rje chen po'i gzhi
179a1(mdo sde): ni de 'gyur// shin tu dpag dka' na mkha' 'dra ste// gnas pa medo gzugs kyang med de// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan
179a2(mdo sde): chen po dang ni ldan te// rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos// dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur// mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas/ 
179a3(mdo sde): bcings pa// snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te// sems can rnam par grol bar byed de// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje skyed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de// nyan thos theg/ 
179a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor rnams dang ni// rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma de yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can// dngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba// snying rje chen po'i chu yis
179a5(mdo sde): bkrus te// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po// tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ na mkha
179a6(mdo sde): dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad te/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan
179a7(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu
179a8(mdo sde): bstsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sa
179b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig
179b2(mdo sde): pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / 
179b3(mdo sde): shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shin tu rtog pa ni/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam
179b4(mdo sde): mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems mnyam pa dang du gyur pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rten pa med pa/ mi gnas pa/ gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang
179b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ mig dang gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral
179b6(mdo sde): ba sems kyi spyod pa med pa las/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba
179b7(mdo sde): yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa med do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / a rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par
179b8(mdo sde): shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang
180a1(mdo sde): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par se
180a2(mdo sde): pa dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med// sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tsher ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / 
180a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa medo// dus gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
180a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o// gang ji snyed khams gsum dang / 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum dang / tsher ba gsum dang / 
180a5(mdo sde): dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / sdom pa gsu/ ma dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de/ dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/ gnas pa med pa/ 
180a6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa/ len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas// gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / 
180a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ rab tu zhi bar gnas// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
180a8(mdo sde): dang dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// 
180b1(mdo sde): gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas// gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye
180b2(mdo sde): shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes
180b3(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung ngu dang
180b4(mdo sde): chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / byed pa dang / mi byed pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du mi sto/ na pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la sems kyi spyod pa med par rab
180b5(mdo sde): tu zhi bar gnas// gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can smin par byed pa nas/ bsrung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang // 
180b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/ sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnaso// byang chub
180b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongasu bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongasu zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i
180b8(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongasu spong bar 'gyu ro// gzhan yang ji snyed na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo
181a1(mdo sde): yang 'dren par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo de la gnas pas/ gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnye
181a2(mdo sde): te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma lus par yongasu bstsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi
181a3(mdo sde): myong bar byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag pos na mkha' thams cad yog pa na/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub
181a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa na mkha'i dpying das dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi tshe
181a5(mdo sde): thams cad de/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang / grub cing 'dran par yang 'gyuraro// gzhan yang na mkha'i mig
181a6(mdo sde): dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pas/ dpag tu med pa na mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun
181a7(mdo sde): pa yongasu bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las tham
181a8(mdo sde): cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 
181b1(mdo sde): sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du ni mi 'gro zhing rje su mi spyod pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ 
181b2(mdo sde): dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du
181b3(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad de/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam du yang bar chad med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig / 
181b4(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pas/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ra ba dang ldan pas/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ 
181b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par/ 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bas
181b6(mdo sde): gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa
181b7(mdo sde): dang 'du shes 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum po yongasu bcad de/ mngon par 'du
181b8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin 'di
182a1(mdo sde): la gnas na zhag gcig gam/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing
182a2(mdo sde): lhan ner gnas par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtags pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/ sems rab tu mnyam pas
182a3(mdo sde): na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa dang / lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zol dngar gyi thigs pas skar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas/ kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yongasu gdung ba
182a4(mdo sde): thams cad sel bar 'gyu ro// ting 'dzin de las lang nas/ yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dga' ba khyad dpar can gyi lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras pa
182a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'ju ga na/ lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong bzhin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la
182a6(mdo sde): bde ba reg pa sangs rgyas rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba med// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig
182a7(mdo sde): yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi/ 
182a8(mdo sde): sku chung ngu mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku
