182b1(mdo sde): tshad med par mthong ngo // gal te bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo // 
182b2(mdo sde): gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin
182b3(mdo sde): pa dang / ji snyed gzugasu gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugasu gtogs pa thad
182b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi/ gzugasu mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad
182b5(mdo sde): ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gi/ tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la sogs/ pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcad snyam na/ 
182b6(mdo sde): 'gog pa'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongasu bcod de/ ting 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'tsho'o// gal te zhag
182b7(mdo sde): bdun nam/ zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ gal te na bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bA
182b8(mdo sde): du ci nus su gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o// tingange 'dzin de las langs nas/ sems rab tu zhi bas ci la yang mi chags te bde bar gnaso// gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs
183a1(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin du zhugs na yang sngar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas/ chos thams cad dang gzugs thams cad sbrur
183a2(mdo sde): dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du chud par byed// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang
183a3(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs thams cad dang / shin tu
183a4(mdo sde): brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya/  ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting / 
183a5(mdo sde): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs thams cadalhag ma ma lus par spangs te/ rnam par smin pa/ 'i 'bras bu len par mi byed// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta
183a6(mdo sde): ste 'jig rten gyi khamasu mes 'jig pa 'byung du nye ba na/ nyi ma lnga cig car shar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing bu dang / rdzing chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / ma
183a7(mdo sde): dang / mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam
183a8(mdo sde): pa tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod
183b1(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngon par 'dren to// gzhan yang na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang
183b2(mdo sde): gnas shing 'dren par 'gyuraro// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams la 'khor ba
183b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu skams te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten chu yis 'jig pa
183b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha dmas 'di'i khams chung gling chen po bzhi dang / gling phran brgyad dang / ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phran thams cad chus
183b5(mdo sde): bkrus te zhig nas/ lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so// so yang dag par rig pa/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa
183b6(mdo sde): tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod
183b7(mdo sde): pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// na mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la
183b8(mdo sde): gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur bas/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar
184a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i las la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang gnas par 'gyuraro// 'khor lo 'di la gnas pas/ dpag tu med pa na mkha' lta bu'i ye she
184a2(mdo sde): kyi nyi ma byung bas/ rang gi lus la phyin ci log bzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongasu sel bar 'gyuraro// 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer
184a3(mdo sde): ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnamasu 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongasu sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang myong ba
184a4(mdo sde): mi byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal te/ nyan tho
184a5(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad/ kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
184a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'da' dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba
184a7(mdo sde): dang phyir mi ldog pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas
184a8(mdo sde): mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms te/ 
184b1(mdo sde): mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni/ chung ngu rmi lam na yang 'bral bar mi byed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod
184b2(mdo sde): nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyang yongasu rdzogs pa dang / ring po mi thog par rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgya
184b3(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba mtshan dang / gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/ nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba/ theg pa chen
184b4(mdo sde): po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag go// de nas bcomaldan 'das kyis den de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ tshigasu gcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi snod du 'gyur
184b5(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa dag/ nyon mongs thams cad yongasu gcad par bya// yang dag stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs na// dngos po gang yang bya bar dka' ba min// srid pa
184b6(mdo sde): bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir// snyoms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya// ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang ldan pas na// gdon mi za bar dpag ka'i shes rab 'thob// 
184b7(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan rab bsgom zhing // 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong pa nyid brtags na// sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo mchog rab skye ste// sdig pa thams cad yongs
184b8(mdo sde): zad 'gyur ro// yod dang med pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni// yang dag stong pa nyid du brtags pas bcom// ngan par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams yongs bsal nas/ 
185a1(mdo sde): rtag du sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// yang dag stong pa nyid la rab sgoms pas// dge ba'i chos gzhan kun la brtson bya ste// sangs rgya
185a2(mdo sde): thams cad kun la rab mchod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems can kun gyi dge ba'i grogs bya ste// kun nas nyon mongs pa yi ni de bsal na// rnam dag sa
185a3(mdo sde): rgyas zhing du myur du skye// mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob// sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sems can dag/ sangs rgyas zhing der yong su gang bar 'gyur// thams cad sangs rgyas
185a4(mdo sde): theg la 'dun pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongasu spong / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khorar le bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid
185a5(mdo sde): kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe sa chen po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil
185a6(mdo sde): 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyasu dran pa la goms pa dag/ deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis
185a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rje su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo thob// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas/ 
185a8(mdo sde): tingange 'dzin gyis 'tshe ba me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas// dpa'
185b1(mdo sde): bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la rten pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgom thams cad thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ chos la sgyur ba
185b2(mdo sde): 'od snang ba la rten par byed pa rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa thams cad thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ rdul dang dri ma dang bral
185b3(mdo sde): te/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas
185b4(mdo sde): lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// gzhan yang sems da can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das dkyis bshad pa thos nas/ lan cig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu
185b5(mdo sde): thob bo// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// sems can tshad
185b6(mdo sde): med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ khams gsum gyi brtson ra nas 'byung bar rtsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das la brten cing rab tu byung bas yang dag pa'i
185b7(mdo sde): chos la zhugs par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing / nyan thos kyi theg par sems skyed
185b8(mdo sde): pas phyir mi ldog par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ nam 'tshe'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gan+da
186a1(mdo sde): nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das
186a2(mdo sde): kyis bshad pa thos nas/ nam 'tshe'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lnga
186a3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te/ yang dag
186a4(mdo sde): par lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / kun na das nyon mongs pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/ mtho risu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / yang dag pa'i smon
186a5(mdo sde): lam dang / dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs me// da pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ dkon
186a6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabasu song ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang / chos thos po la dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed pa la mos te/ 
186a7(mdo sde): nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems par tshad med par gyur to// gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas/ log pa la phyogs
186a8(mdo sde): pa dang / blo gros ngan pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad yongasu spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa thob nas/ khyim na gnas pa'i chos yong su spangs te/ rnam par dag
186b1(mdo sde): pas rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bungs sa'i snying po'i 'khor
186b2(mdo sde): lo bcu pa zhes bya ba brda sprod pa chen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis khyod kyis gzungs su zung la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig/ sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
186b3(mdo sde): klog gam/ 'don tam/ yid la byed dam/ gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus bsrungs te/ yun ring por phan pa
186b4(mdo sde): dang bde ba'i don thob par gyis shig/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i thabs dang bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te/ nyam par mi bya ba dang / gnod pa thams cad
186b5(mdo sde): las srungs te/ gnod pa med par bya ba dang / log par/ lta ba dang / log par phyogs pa las bsrungs te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spangs par bya ba dang / de'i lus
186b6(mdo sde): la gnod pa thams cad bsrungs te/ med par bya ba dang / 'phya ba dang / skur pa thams cad las bsrungs te/ med par bya ba dang / tshul khrims dang / spyod pa thams cad nyams par mi 'a
186b7(mdo sde): bar bsrungs pa dang / de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / 'byung ba chen po 'khrugs pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i nad dang / rga ba thams cad yongasu sel bar srung ba dang / de la dus ma
186b8(mdo sde): yin pa/ tshul ma yin pa/ ltas ngan dang / rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung ba dang / de la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar srung ba dang / de tshe 'phos nA
187a1(mdo sde): kyang nga bde 'gror skye ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i don thob par yongasu bsrung bar byed do// rigs kyi bu sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang / 'don
187a2(mdo sde): pa dang / don yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad dam/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin tu srung zhing byin gyis brlabs te/ chos na/ 
187a3(mdo sde): pa 'di bcus yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
187a4(mdo sde): de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungasu 'dzin cing / shin tu rgyas par ba dgyi'o// sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog
187a5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'don pa dang / don yid la bgyid pa dang / pha/ rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la/ bdag gis chos rnam pa 'di bcus
187a6(mdo sde): shin tu srungs te/ yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
187a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
187a8(mdo sde): chen po rigs par the tsom 'dri ba dang / tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
187b1(mdo sde): dang mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o// 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor
187b2(mdo sde): lo bcu pa las/ bde ba'i don thob pa yongasu gdams pa zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho// / ban d+he rnam par mi rtog pas rgya las sgyur ba'o// mdo 'di skad gsar chad kyis gtan la ma
187b3(mdo sde): phab pa'i 'gyur rnying pa zhig gda'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA/ 
187b4(mdo sde): na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di
187b5(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lo bcu bani/ sa pa dang / shin tu tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rgyal po'i khab na/ 
187b6(mdo sde): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po che'i gdugs kyi khang bzangs tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
187b7(mdo sde): chen po phal cher dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes
187b8(mdo sde): pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rje su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam
188a1(mdo sde): par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
188a2(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa bku la dang / tshe dang
188a3(mdo sde): ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
188a4(mdo sde): bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tshe dang / 
188a5(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bu ma du tshang ba dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad
188a6(mdo sde): pa nas 'dus pa/ gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
188a7(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ gang dag gis ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sen
188a8(mdo sde): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches kyi blo gros dang / seng+ge'i blo gros dang
188b1(mdo sde): stag gi blo gros dang / don gyi blo gros dang / rin po che'i blo gros dang / rab mchog blo gros dang / zla 'od dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po dang / 
188b2(mdo sde): rnam par gnon pa dpag med dang / rnam par gnon pa mtha' yas dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras
188b3(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug dang / spos kyi glang po dang / spos dga' dang / spos dga' ba'i dpal dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / tog dang / tog chen po dang / tog dri ma med pa
188b4(mdo sde): dang rin chen mtha' yas dbyu gu dang / rin chen dubya dgu 'dor dang / rin chen dri med dbyugu dang / mchog tu/ dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / rtag tu rab dga' dang / lag na rin poche
188b5(mdo sde): dang na mkha'i mdzod dang / ri baM dang / ri rab dang / ri bo chen po dang / yon tan rin chen snang dang / gzung kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can thaMd
188b6(mdo sde): kyi nad sel dang / rab tu yid dga' dang / yid skye dang / skyo med dang / 'od byed dang / tsan+dan dang / g.yo ba zlog dang / dpag med mngon bsgrags dbyangs dang / byang chub kun nas
188b7(mdo sde): bslang dang / mthong ba don yod dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag
188b8(mdo sde): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed dang yang thabs gcig/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
189a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs gcig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
189a2(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ 
189a3(mdo sde): rim gror byas shing mchod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid du yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to// de nas sangs
189a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus/ tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de la sa pad+ma mdab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum yod pa/ tsha dra shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ kha ma bye ba bye/ 
189a5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/ de dag steng gi na/ mkha'i bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ thams ca// de dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khebs par gyur te/ 
189a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i bla re bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to// pad+ma'i snying po re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs shing / 'od zer 'bum dag
189a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/ pad+ma de dag thams cad kyang shin tu kha bye bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ pad+ma de dag gi mdab ma de dag thams cad kyang mog mog po dang / nog
189a8(mdo sde): nog po dang / dri nga ba dang / smad par 'os pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin par gyur to// 'on kyang pad+ma'i snying po de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ 
189b1(mdo sde): bzhugs shing / 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang // de bzhin gshegs pa pAd+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par
189b2(mdo sde): gyur te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi yang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' bar
189b3(mdo sde): gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mthong nas the tsom du gyur to// gang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gi mdab ma rnams 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing
189b4(mdo sde): chung ba rnams kyang kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os su gyur te/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / pad+ma'i snyi dang po de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re skyil mo kru
189b5(mdo sde): bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed pa sa shin tu mdzes par kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin snyamo// de nas thams cad deng ldan pa'i byang
189b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / 'khor bzhi po the tshom du gyur pa rnams 'dong bar bya ba'i mtshan ma byaso// de'i tshe tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dag/ 
189b7(mdo sde): chen po rdo rje blo gros shes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos can
189b8(mdo sde): gyi gtam las rtsoms te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongasu zhu bar spobs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo
190a1(mdo sde): rje blo gros/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi po dag
190a2(mdo sde): gi the tshom gyi zug rngu rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pad+ma kha dog ngan cing dri mi bda' ba 'di lta bu bye ba khrag khrig
190a3(mdo sde): phrag 'bum 'di dag gis khebs pa dang / de dag gi dbus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs te/ 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu gda' ba dang / 
190a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang / srog cha gas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tsha la ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de nas de'i tshe byang
190a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag/ gsol to// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mi g.yo bar// / pad+ma dag gi dbus na bzhugs par ni// khyod kyis 'di 'dra
190a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul ston mdzad pa// bdag gi sngan chad nam yang 'di ma mthong // 'od zer stong rnams rab tu 'gyed mdzad cing // sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khebs par mdzad// ngo mtshar chos kyi rnams
190a7(mdo sde): la rol mdzad pa'i// 'dren pa rnams kyis bar chad ma mchis mdzes// mdab ma dag dang chu ba smad 'os la// kha dog ngan pa'i pad+ma rnams dbus der// de dag rin chen rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs
190a8(mdo sde): pa ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul 'di dag sprul// bdag gis sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye snyed mthong // de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste// de ring gda' ba'i rnam sprul ci 'dra ba// sngon chad
190b1(mdo sde): nam yang 'di 'dra 'di ma mthong // rkang gnyis gtso bo lhas ni bstan du gsol// rgyu gang rkyen gang lags pa bshad du gsol// 'jig rten don mdzad thugs brtse gsung du gsol// lus na/ 
190b2(mdo sde): kun gyi the tsho dgum du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la
190b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo shin tu rgyas pa yod de/ de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas snang ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di byas// 
190b4(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang nga dbashad// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sem+ba da'i
190b5(mdo sde): tshogs des/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji
190b6(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad+ma kha dog ngan pa/ dri nga ba/ smad par 'os pa/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/ 
190b7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pad+ma'i snying po 'di dag la dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'khod de/ 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed cing 'khod pa de dag kyang rig nas/ lha dang mi rnams
190b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing / mchod pa'i las kyang byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang / rang gi shes rab dang / ye shes
191a1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can srog chagasu gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mo
191a2(mdo sde): pabye ba phrag 'bum gyi skyabasu gyur pa thams cad dang / rigs kyi bu dag sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbub su gyur pa de dag gi nang na/ nga 'dra bar ye shes dang ldan pa/ mig dang ldan pa'i de bzhin
191a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mang po 'khod cing dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ mi g.yo bar 'khod pa mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa de dag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshes
191a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos nyid mi g.yo zhing / srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma dgos pa dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni nga dang 'dra'o zhes smra'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin
191a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyan ni de ltar mdzes pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa spun des sems can thams cad de bzhin gan gas pa'i snying por mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste da/ 
191a6(mdo sde): nang skyes bu lha'i mig can la la zhig gis/ lha'i mig gis 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing / 'di ltar dring ba'i pad+ma kham bye zhing / mgyes pa dag la bltas te/ de'i dbus na pad+ma snying po la de/ 
191a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs blta bar 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag par sbyangs pa'i phyir/ 
191a8(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mdab ma kha dog ngan cing dri nga la/ smad par 'os pa de dag 'byed cing sel ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can thams cad
191b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong nas/ sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs dbye ba'i phyir chos
191b2(mdo sde): ston te/ de sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yang dag pa nyid du gnaso// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung // ma
191b3(mdo sde): byung yang rung / sems can 'di dag ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/ rigs kyi bu dag smad par 'os pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs rnams kyis yog pa/ de dag gi
191b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sbubs gzhig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs dpa'i ye shes kyang yongasu sbyangs pa'i phyir/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
191b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston te/ bya/ ba 'di la yang mos par byed do// de la byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la mngon
191b6(mdo sde): pabar brtson por gnas pa de dag gang gi tshe/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye bar nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
191b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
191b8(mdo sde): ji ltar pad+ma smad par 'os gyur pa// de'i mdab ma sbubs gyur ma gyes la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mgos te/ mi 'ga' la las lha yis mig gis mthong // 
192a1(mdo sde): de ni de'i mdab ma 'byed pa na// dbus na rgyal ba'i sku ni mthong gyur nas// rtul ba nye ba'i nyon mongs phyir mi 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten kun tu rtsa
192a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// de bzhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi// dkyil der gnas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi lus// ji ltar smad 'os pad+ma'i sbubs 'dra ba'i// nyon mongs stong phrag bye bas khebs
192a3(mdo sde): bathong // nga yang de dag gin bsal ba'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu chos ston te// sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// rgyal ba'i phyir ni nyon mongs rnam par spyong / 
192a4(mdo sde): nga yi sangs rgyas spyan ni de 'dra ste// nga yis rgyal ba'i lus/ gnas pa yi// sems can de dag thams cad mthong gyur te// de dag rnam par sbyang phyir chos smrar// rigs kyis
192a5(mdo sde): dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ snang tshang zlum po shing gi/ yal ga la 'phyang ba/ bung ba 'bum gyis kun tu bsru shing / sbrang rtsis yongasu gang ba zhig yod la/ de nas
192a6(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas bskrad nas/ sbrang rtsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed do// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad
192a7(mdo sde): kyang sbrang tshang dang 'dra ste/ de la sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis shin tu bsrungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig go/ 
192a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar sbrang tshang gi nang na/ sbrang rtsi bung ba bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrung ba yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes pas rig pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams
192b1(mdo sde): cad la yang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu srungs pa yod par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig ste/ rigs kyi bu dag
192b2(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang thabs la mkhas pas bung ba bsal ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa
192b3(mdo sde): dang 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / drag dog dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsal nas/ ji ltar sems can
192b4(mdo sde): de dag la yang nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de/ dag gis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba dang // gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// de bzhin
192b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba de rnam par sbyangs nas/ 'a jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed de/ rig sa kyi bu dag nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan yongasu dag
192b6(mdo sde): pa des ngas sems can thams cad de ltar mthong ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar 'di na sbrang tshang yod pa la// bung
192b7(mdo sde): bas kun tu bsrungs shing sbas gyur pa// mi gang sbrang rtsi 'dod pas de mthong na// de ni bung ba rab tu skrod par byed// de bzhin 'dir yang sbrang tshang lta bu ni// srid pa gsum gyi sems
192b8(mdo sde): can thams cad de// de dag nyon mongs bye ba mang ba ste// nyon mongs dbus na de bzhin gshegs 'dug mthong // nga yang sangs rgyas rnam par spyad don tu// bung bskrod pa lta bur can/ 
193a1(mdo sde): mongs sel// gang gis nyon mongs bye ba gnod 'gyur ba// chos rnams 'dir ni thabs kyis rab ston te// de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs gyur la// 
193a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu bya ba byed 'gyur cing // spobs ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yi// snod 'dra'i chos ston 'gyur bar bya phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bras sa lu
193a3(mdo sde): 'am nas sam/ ci ce'am/ 'bru rnams ni snying po phub mas yongasu bsrung ba yin te/ de rang gi phub ma las ma byung gi bar du bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba'i bya ba mi byed kyi/ 
193a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag skyes pa'am/ bud med gang dag bza' de ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa zas skom gyi bya ba 'ang/ dad pa de dag gis brngas shing brdungs te/ phub ma'i sbubs
193a5(mdo sde): dang phyi shun sel to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhi na gshegs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spun gyi se mas can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ sangs
193a6(mdo sde): rgyas nyid rang byung nyid/ nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pas dkris shing gnas par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa bsal
193a7(mdo sde): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongasu spyang ba dang / sems can 'di dag ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa thams cad las grol te/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
193a8(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangasu 'gyur snyam nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
193b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// ji ltar 'bru 'ams lu'i 'bras kyang rung // ci ce'am ni 'on te nas kyang rung // ji srid bar du de dag phub bcas pa// de srid par du bya ba mi byed de// de dag gis ni brdungs
193b2(mdo sde): nas bub bsal na/ bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed// snying po phub ma ldan pa de dag ni// sems can rnams la bya ba mi byed// de bzhin sems can kun gyis sangs rgyas so// nyon
193b3(mdo sde): mongs rnams kyis khebs par ngas mthong nas// ngas ni de dag rnam par spang ba dang // sangs rgyas myur thob bya phyir chos ston to// sems can kun la 'dra'i chos nyid ni// nyon mongs brgya
193b4(mdo sde): yis dkris nas gang yod pa// de ni rnam sbyangs thams ca da ji lta bur// rgyal bar myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to// / rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ rul pa dang
193b5(mdo sde): nyal nyil gyi gnas gshang gci dri mi zhim pas kun tu/ gang ba zhig tu/ mi gzhan gseb lam nas song bzhi/ ga gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po zhig ltung bar gyur la/ bshad
193b6(mdo sde): gci dri nga bas kun tu gang ba/ rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas der mi gtsang ba gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis brnan pas/ bltar mi snang bar gyur cing der de lo bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am
193b7(mdo sde): sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong du mi gtsang bas chud mi za ba'i chos can de sems can gang la yang phan pa mi byed do// rigs kyi bu dag de
193b8(mdo sde): nas lhas lha'i mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po de la bltas nas/ mi zhig la kye mi khyod song la 'di na/ rin po che'i mchog gser rul ba dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pas non pa de byidang
194a1(mdo sde): gyis la gser gyi bya ba gyis shig ces bskon rigs kyi bu dag rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna chog
194a2(mdo sde): kyi tshig bla dgas so// gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de ni chud mi za ba'i chos can gyi tshig bla dag so// lhas lha'i mig ces bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
194a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / sems can thams
194a4(mdo sde): cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid chud mi za ba yod dpa'i nyon mongs pa rul pa dang / 'dam rdzab lta bu rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la
194a5(mdo sde): chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshi/ su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar mi mr-i gser gyi gar bu ni// nyal nyil rnam pa'i nang du lhung
194a6(mdo sde): gyur la// der de lo ni mi nyung ba zhig tu// de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can no// lha yis lha yi mig gis de mthong nas// rnam par spang phyir gzhan la smras pa ni// 'di na
194a7(mdo sde): rin chen mchog gi gser yod pa// rnam par sbyongs la des ni bya ba gyis// de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang // nyon mongs rnams kyi yun ring rtag non mthong / 
194a8(mdo sde): de dag gi ni blo bur nyon mongs shes// rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ dbul po zhig khyim gyi nang gi mdzod kyi
194b1(mdo sde): 'og gi sa la gter chen po dbyig dang gser gyis rab tu gang ba/ mdzod kyi tshad tsam zhig mi bdun srid kyi sas yog pa'i 'og na yod la/ gter chen po de mi dbul po de la 'di skad du
194b2(mdo sde): kye ming ni gter chen po ste/ sas yog cing 'dugo zhes ni mi smra ste/ 'di lta ste/ gter chen po ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can ma yin pa'o// mi dbul po khyim gyi bdag
194b3(mdo sde): po de ni dbul po sems kyis rje su sems shing de nyid kyi steng na rnam par rgyu yang / sa'i 'og na gter chen po yod pa de ma thos mi shes ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du
194b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa'i yid la byed/ pa khyim lta bur gyur pa'i 'og na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres
194b5(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi ga/ ter chen po yid kyang / sems can de dag gzugs/ dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa la chags
194b6(mdo sde): pas sdug bsngal bas 'khor ba na 'khor te/ chos kyi gtor chen po de ma thos pas thob par ma gyur cing yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir brtson pa yang mi byed do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas de ban
194b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i nang du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter chen po yang dag par rab tu ston to// de dag kyang chos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas rko ste/ 
194b8(mdo sde): de'i phyir 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes bya ste/ chos kyi gter chen po lta bur gyur nas/ sems can rnams la sngon ma
195a1(mdo sde): byung ba 'am/ sngon ma byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang / dpe dang / byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang / bya ba rnams ston pa gter chen po'i mdzod kyi sbyin
195a2(mdo sde): bdag chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan zhing / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs
195a3(mdo sde): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig shin tu yongasu dag pas/ sems can thams cad de lta bur mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shwe
195a4(mdo sde): dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyasakyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mdzod yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to// de nas de'i
195a5(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsa la to// ji ltar dbul po'i khyim gyi 'og logs na/ dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa// de la g.yo
195a6(mdo sde): 'am rlom sems yod min te// nga ni khyod kyi yin zhes de mi smra// de yi tshe na sems can khyim bdag de// dbul bar gyur la rnam par mi shes shing // sus kyang de la bsnyed pa med pas na// dbul
195a7(mdo sde): bdan de yi steng na 'dug/ de ltar ngas ni sangs rgyas mig gis// sems can de dag zad dbul 'dral// de dag rnams la gter chen yod pa dang // g.yob med cing bde gshegs lus mthong // ngas ni/ 
195a8(mdo sde): des nga byang chub sems dpa'al// khyed kying yi ye shes mdzod zung la// dbul ba med cing 'jig rten mgon gyur dang // bla med chos gter 'gyur bar gyis shes bstan// gang dag sa bstan pa la mos gyur pa/ 
195b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag kun la gter yod do// gang dag mos nas bdag nyid rtsol byed pa// de dag myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ shinga.a mra'i
195b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu 'am/ 'dzam+bu'i 'bras bu 'am/ ta la'i 'bra sdu 'am/ spa'i 'bras bu yang rung ste/ byi shun gyi sbubs kyi nang na/ myu gu'i sa bon chud mi za ba'i tshes can yod pa gang gis sa la btab na/ 
195b3(mdo sde): shing gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'jig rten gnas pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i
195b4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i phyi shun gyi sbubs kyis kun tu dkris par mthong // de la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang na snying
195b5(mdo sde): por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de ni seMn zhes bya ba'i ming du chag so// de la gang gsal bar gyur/ ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs
195b6(mdo sde): pa'i sbubs yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogasu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnyed pa'i// sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs pa de ni/ de bzhi/ 
195b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du smra bar lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes byed// rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
195b8(mdo sde): de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i byor don den par ston to// de nas del cha bcom ldan
196a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar spa yi 'bras bu thams cad ni// nang na spa yi myu gu yod pa ste// ta la dang ni 'dzam+bu kun la'ang yod// nang na yod pa/ 
196a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu bskyed na skye// de bzhin chos kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa yang // sems can thams cad spa yi sa bon 'dra// de kun nang na bde gshegs lus yod par// zag med sangs rgyas mig gi dam
196a3(mdo sde): pas mthong // sbubs bshig ma gyur de ni sems can brjod// mi shes nang na gnas kyang rlom sems med// ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste// de la g.yo ba ci yang yod ma yin// 
196a4(mdo sde): dper na sdong chen sa bon las byung ltar// sems cana'// de dag ji ltar 'tshang rgya zhing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes// yongasu sbyang ba'i don tu chos gta/ 
196a5(mdo sde): smrar rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ skye sa bu dbul po zhig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ga zugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ lag mthil tsam
196a6(mdo sde): zhig yod la/ de nas skyes bu dbul po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te/ 'brog dgon pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod par gyur nas/ ci nas kyang de gzhan gyis
196a7(mdo sde): mi tsher zhing / rkun pos mi khyer bar bya ba'i phyir/ des de ras rul pa dri mo zhim pa'i dum bu du ma dkris te/ de nas skyes bu de 'brog dgon pa de nyid du nyes pa gang gis kyang 'chi
196a8(mdo sde): ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/ de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa/ ras rul ba'i dum bus dkris pa yang rdog lam de na 'phyan cing 'dug pa dang
196b1(mdo sde): 'dron po rnams kyis ma shes nas/ 'goms shing 'goms shing dong la/ ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu'i thum bu kun tu 'dril ba 'di gang nas rlung gi bangs shes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang
196b2(mdo sde): 'brog na gnas pa'i lhas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas nas/ mi gzhan dag cig la bstan te/ kye skyes bu dag ras kyi dum bu'i thum bu 'di'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin pa
196b3(mdo sde): che las byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyis phye zhig ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i
196b4(mdo sde): dkri bas dkris te/ smad pa'i 'os gyur cing / yun ring por da'akhor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na kun tu 'khyam par mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu dag tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba rnams kyang
196b5(mdo sde): rung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi dkri bas da kris par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus nga ci 'dra ba yod pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag
196b6(mdo sde): del de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / yongasu dag par gyur la/ ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyas
196b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur snyam nas/ nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad
196b8(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar dri nga smad par 'os rnams kyis// yongasu dkris pa bde bar gshegs kyi gzugs// rin chen byas pa ras dum dkris pa de// lam gyi bar na bor te 'khya
197a1(mdo sde): gyur pa// lha yi mig gis de ni mthong nasu// lha des gzhan zhig la ni rab smras pa// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yod// ras dum thum bu 'di ni myur du phye// de bzhin
197a2(mdo sde): nga yi lha mig 'di 'dra ba// des ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang // nyon mongs dkribs dkris nas rab sdug bsngal// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni rtag gtses mthong // ngas ni nyon mong/ 
197a3(mdo sde): dkris pa'i nang dag na// rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam par gzhag gyur la// de ni g.yo ba med cing mi 'gyur yang // de yongs thar byed gang yang med pa mthong // ngas mthong de nas skul ma btab pa ni// 
197a4(mdo sde): byang chub mchog tu gang dag zhugs pa nyan// de ltar sems can chos nyid 'di 'drar rtag/ 'di na yongasu dkris pa'i rgyal ba bzhugs// bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yongs
197a5(mdo sde): dkrol nas// gang tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi pa// de tshe 'a di ni sangs rgyas ming thob ste// lha dang mi rnams sems ni rab tu dga'// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper
197a6(mdo sde): na/ bud med mgon med par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ smad par 'os pa/ 'jig su rung ba/ blta na mi sdug pa/ 'dre mo 'dra ba zhig mgon med pa'i khang par zhugs nas gnas
197a7(mdo sde): de der gnas pa dang sbrum mar gyur te/ gang gis gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de 'dra ba zhig de'i mngal du zhugs kyang / bud med de mngal na 'dug pa'i
197a8(mdo sde): sems can de la bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can 'di ci 'dra ba zhig snyam du yang yid la mi byed/ bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/ ma zhugs snyam pa yang de de na yid la mi byed kyi// gzhan
197b1(mdo sde): du na de dbul ba'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / dman pa dang / khong ru chung ba snyam pa'i sems rje su sems shing / mdog ngan pa dang / dri mi zhim pa nyid kyis mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas te/ 
197b2(mdo sde): dus 'da' bar byed// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang mgon med par gyur cing / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses par gyur la/ srid par skye ba'i gnas mgon med pa'i
197b3(mdo sde): khang pa na gnas// de nas sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhugs te/ khong na yod kyang sems can de dag gis khong du ma chu do// rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gsheg pa ni/ 
197b4(mdo sde): sems can dag bdag nyid la khyad du mi gsad par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed bdag nyid srog shi bar ma byed pa khyed brtson 'grus brtan par gyis shig dang / khyed la de
197b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pa yod pa dus shig na 'byung bar 'a gyur te/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa'i grangasu 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can zhes bya bar ni ma yin no// 
197b6(mdo sde): der yang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'i/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ni ma yino zhes chos ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar
197b7(mdo sde): bud med mgon med gyur pa zhig/ kha dog ngan cing gzugs ni mi sdug la// byis pa yin te mgon med khang par gnas// re zhig dus na de ni der sbrum gyur// de yi mngal du gang zhig nges par ni// 23
197b8(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che ba nyid// rin chen rnams kyis 'phags pa'i gling bzhi yi// bdag po byed par 'gyur ba de 'dra zhugs// bud med byis pa de ni 'di lta bur// mngal du zhugs sam ma zhugs
198a1(mdo sde): mi shes la// mgon med khang pan ni gnas byed de// dbul bsnam du sems shing dus dar byed// de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang // mgron med/ 
198a2(mdo sde): gyur la sdug bsngal chos kyis nyen// khams gsum pa yi bde ba chung la gnas// nang na chos nyid mngal 'dra yod par mthong // de 'dra mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la// 'jig rten pan
198a3(mdo sde): par byed pa mngal/ gnas na// sems can kun gyis chos nyid ma shes kyis// bdag dman 'du shes ma bskyed cig ces bstan/ khyed cag brtson 'grus brtsam pa brtan gyis dang // rang // 
198a4(mdo sde): lus ring por mi thogs rgyal bar 'gyur// dus shig byang chub snying po thob gyur nas// srog chags stong phrag bye ba dgrol byed 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste
198a5(mdo sde): dper na/ spra tshil las rta'i gzugs sam/ glang brisache'i gzugs sam/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skye sa pa'i gzugs dag cig byas te/ 'jim pa'i nang na
198a6(mdo sde): bcug nas g.yog la bzhu ste/ zags par byas la gser bzhu ste/ zhu bar gyur pas bkang na/ rims kyis grangs par gyur nas/ mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i gzugs de dag thang phyi
198a7(mdo sde): rol gyi 'jim pa gnag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang / nang gi rnams ni gser las byas pa dag go/ de na mgar ba 'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma zhig gis/ de las gzugs gang dang gang dag
198a8(mdo sde): grangs par gyur par mthong ba de dang de dag gi phyir rim gyi 'jim pa thobs bkogs na/ de nas skad cig de la nang na gser las byas pa'i gzugs yod pa dag yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// rigs kyis
198b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis son thams cad 'jim pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la/ phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs
198b2(mdo sde): kyi nang gi sdu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gang ste/ zag pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par 'dug pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
198b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song ste/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnam grangs 'di dag yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 
198b4(mdo sde): chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsal bar gyur pa de dag gi de bzhin pa/ gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rdo rje'i tho bas phyi rol gyi nyon mo
198b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'gogaso// rigs kyi bu dag mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dag so// / gas kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
198b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas/ nyon mongs de dag las thar par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rab tu 'god pa'i/ 
198b7(mdo sde): phyir ston to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ji ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs// nang ni sbu gu yod cing gsog yin pa// rin che
198b8(mdo sde): bzhugs pas rab tu bkang na ni// brgya stong phrag ni mang por 'gyur ba yin// mgar bas shin tu grangs par gyur shes nas// 'di ltar rin chen las ni byas pa 'di// rnam dag gzugs 'gyur la/ 
199a1(mdo sde): gang bya snyam ste// gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa 'gogs par byed// de bzhin ngas ni sems can tham cad kyang // gser gzugs 'jim pas g.yogs pa/ 
199a2(mdo sde): 'dra ba ste// phyi rol shun pa nyon mongs sbubs yin la// nang na sangs rgyas ye shes yod par mthong // de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni// zhi zhing shin tu bsil bar gyur pa dag/ gang gi/ 
199a3(mdo sde): de dag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin// chos kyi lag chas de la 'gogs par byed// rin chen gzugs ni blta na sdug pa ltar// rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir ni dag gyur pa// stobs bcu dag gis lus// 
199a4(mdo sde): rnams yongs gang ste// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di na mchod par 'gyur// ngas ni srog chags thams cad de ltar ma dathong // byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ngas ni de ltar mthong // de
199a5(mdo sde): ltar dag pa bde bar gshegs 'gyur te// bde gshegs da ga ni sangs rgyas tshul ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ 
199a6(mdo sde): rdo rje'i blo gros rigs kyi bu mo khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
199a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'jog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sa
199a8(mdo sde): dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa'i phyir brtson par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thaMd la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs
199b1(mdo sde): nas 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma pas kyang mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
199b2(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs shing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa/ dus su bde ba/ rgyar
199b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad tsam la/ 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ lha'i dri zhim po dang ldan pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ longs spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa
199b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa/ 'bum brag gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i dbye ma snyed nyin re zhing phul te/ bskal pa 'bum du tshang da ba'i bar du 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byed pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'i
199b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grang / sa 'di las dpe cig tsam lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bdu
199b6(mdo sde): gnas par byed na/ rdo rje'i blo gros de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga mas brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / 
199b7(mdo sde): cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyar yang mi bzod do// rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu tshol bas/ sangs rgyas
199b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du/ shing man+da ra ba'i me tog khal bzhi pa 'bum 'thor la/ rdo rje'i blo gros dge slong ngam/ 
200a1(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen ma zhig gis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ thal mo lan cig
200a2(mdo sde): sbyar te/ rje su yi rangango zhes tshig gcig smras na/ rdo rje'i blo gros bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba de la me tog phreng phul ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
200a3(mdo sde): pa la gzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des/ brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe
200a4(mdo sde): yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag bka/ da' stsal to// sems can la la gang zhig byang chub la/ 
200a5(mdo sde): mos pa bskyed nas 'di nyan 'dzin pa 'am// yi ger 'dri 'am gle gas bam gzhag byed cing // gus dang bcas pas tshig sa bcad gcig bshad dam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
200a6(mdo sde): snying po 'di thos nas// gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di tshol byed na// bsod nams phung po ji tsam skyed 'gyur ba// de yi phan yon 'dir ni mnyan par gyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog 'di la gan
200a7(mdo sde): nas// dpa' bo bskal pa dag ni stong bar du// phyogs bcu rnam su mi yi gtso bo dag/ nyan thos bcas pa rnams la bsti stang byed// ji ltar gang+gA stong mang byi ba bas// de bas lhag pa bsam
200a8(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i// gnal med khang mchog rin chen las byas pa// 'jig rten slob dben re re la yang phul// de dag 'bang du dpag tshad bcu yod la// mchu dang rgyar ni dngag chad gcig yod/ 
200b1(mdo sde): pa ra spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la// de na rin chen las byas khri bshams shing // dar dang bcos bu ras ni brgya bting ba'i// khri dag dang ni khri stan gzhan rnams kyang // ji ltar gang+gA'i klung
200b2(mdo sde): bzhin dpag med pa// rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la// rgyal ba gang dag 'jig rten khams zhugs pa// ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma bas mang ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la de ltar phul// kun la
200b3(mdo sde): gus par mchod pa byed pa bas// mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas// dpe gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dam// bzung nas mi 'ga' zhig la 'chad byed na// de ni de bas bsod nams
200b4(mdo sde): phung po mang // dpa' bos bzung ba'i bsod nams 'di la ni// cha dang dper yang de ni nyer mi 'gro// srog chags dag ni kun gyi skyabs 'gyur zhing // de ni myur du byang chub mchog
200b5(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya// de bzhin gshegs kyi snying po 'dra yod pa// sem sa can dag ni kun gyi chos nyid 'di// byang chub sems dang / 'a mkhas pa gang sems pa// de ni rang byung sangs rgyas myur du/ 
200b6(mdo sde): 'gyur// rdo rje'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i gces spras/ 
200b7(mdo sde): byed par rig par bya'o// rdo rje'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa/ shin tu rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ brjod du med pa/ 
200b8(mdo sde): de'i pha rol pas kyang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
201a1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
201a2(mdo sde): byung // rdo rje'i blo gros ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de rtag tu 'di zer gtong zhes bya zhe na/ rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'od zer gtong de byang chub sems dpe
201a3(mdo sde): gyur pa na/ ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu de ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung ste/ shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
201a4(mdo sde): dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang // 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig
201a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od dga' bar 'gyur ba/ sdug
201a6(mdo sde): pa/ mchog tu dga' ba byed pa/ mgu bar 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag de snyed snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to// rdo rje'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa
201a7(mdo sde): de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag tu sems can gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / blo gros
201a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / rtog pa dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
201b1(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' do'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro ba dag nas shi 'bos te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na
201b2(mdo sde): skyes// de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// yang phyir mi ldog par gyur to// yang phyir mi ldog pa gang dag 'od des reg pa de dag
201b3(mdo sde): reg ma thag tu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// yon tan lnga brgya pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi/ 
201b4(mdo sde): 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad bai DUr+ya las grub par yongasu gan nges par gyur te/ gser gyi skud pas mig mangs ri su bres par
201b5(mdo sde): gyur la/ mig mangs ris thams cad nas kyang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dri dang / kha dog dang ldan pa rnams 'thon par gyur to// rin po che'i shing
201b6(mdo sde): de dag gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang / 
201b7(mdo sde): dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / tinge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu 'di dag byung // rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i sgra des
201b8(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum po de dag thams cad na/ sems can rnams dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas gnaso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / 
202a1(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams med par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de yang sems can de dag
202a2(mdo sde): thams cad la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang bar gyur te/ mngal na gnas pa nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thal mo sbyar ba'i las byaso// rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dngapa / 
202a3(mdo sde): de btsas pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya/ 
202a4(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to// tshul de bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das de'i lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung ba/ 
202a5(mdo sde): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ ring bsrel mchod rten la gnas pa'i tshe yang lus kyi 'di de rtag tu byung bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i blo gros de'i phyir bcom
202a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya bar lha dang mi rnams kyi mtshan gsol to// rdo rje'i blo gros yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
202a7(mdo sde): rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong de dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros
202a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong di la/ de bzhin gshegs
202b1(mdo sde): ba'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongasu dris// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong des
202b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag rje su gzung ba dang / yongasu gzung ba'i phyir stan cig la 'dug bzhin du/ bskal pa chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag
202b3(mdo sde): par rab tu bshad de/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshig rnam par shes par bya bas/ chos bsgrub pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / dpe 'bum phrag du mas byang chub sde
202b4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad pas phyogs bcu rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu yang tshegs chung ngus go bar gyur to// 
202b5(mdo sde): rdo rje'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis de da zhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di than/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa de dag
202b6(mdo sde): thams cad mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin nas/ yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ byang chub sems
202b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi ni ma gtog so// rdo rje'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod seman/ 
202b8(mdo sde): de de ltar mi lta ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros khyed nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la gang dgad dung yang
203a1(mdo sde): // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'a/ 
203a2(mdo sde): dpal dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi'o// rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di / 
203a3(mdo sde): pa tsam gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pas don che ba yino// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka'
203a4(mdo sde): stsal to// 'dus pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na// / bcom ldan 'od zer ga tong zhes bya ba byung // de'i da lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byung bas// zhing rnams bye ba
203a5(mdo sde): stong dag snang bar gyur// rgyal ba dang po mngon rdzogs sa ngas rgyas rig/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mahA 'ayas kyis// de tshe bde gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus/ 
203a6(mdo sde): mdo 'di rtag tu yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rgyal de'i bstan las mdo sde 'di// 'dren pa las ni mngon sum thos gyur pa// de kun myur du byang chub dam pa thob// byang chub
203a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' bzhi ni ma gtogs te// mthu chen thob dam spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gsum pa ste// rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yin/ 
203a8(mdo sde): de tshe de dag gis ni mdo 'di thos// byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas pa// de tshe gang gis rgyal la zhus byung ste// de'i dbang byas bde gshegs sras po ni// de na rje rje blo gros
203b1(mdo sde): khyod nyid yin// nga yang sngon ni spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// bde bar gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan las// mdo sde 'di yi ming ni thos par gyur// gus par byas te thos nas thal mo sbyar// da ni
203b2(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i las de yis// byang chub dam pa myur du thob par gyur// de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis// rtag tu mdo mchog 'di ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje'i blo gros rigs
203b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ lung nod dam/ kha ton byed dam/ ston kyang rung chos kyi
203b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bye dra pa dang / rab tu 'chad pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag la tshegs chung ngus chos de dag kyang mngon sum du 'gyur// las
203b5(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa de yang byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// // bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang las
203b6(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par mi 'gyur zhing / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snye da cig las mang du thos pas bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar
203b7(mdo sde): 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun tu bzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba dag kyang
203b8(mdo sde): yod do// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / steng dang / nyis stong dang / sumi stong dang
204a1(mdo sde): bzhi stong dang / lnga stong dang / drug stong dang / bdun stong dang / brgyad stong dang / dgu stong dang / khri dang / sangs rgyas 'bum nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bruH
204a2(mdo sde): bar dag gi chos bstan pa kun tu bzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
204a3(mdo sde): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis deng nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ 
204a4(mdo sde): de ni ji ltar da ltar bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du ba ces pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang / mchod dpa'i 'os yino// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu
204a5(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' mdza/ sde 'di thos nas// bdag gis byang chub dam pa thob par bsam// gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa// de ni nga ltar
204a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os// de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam par 'dren// khri byed rnam par khrid byed bsngags pa'i 'os// gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa// de ni de ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gi
204a7(mdo sde): lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa// mi yi khyu mchog chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin// de ni nyi zla lta bur blta ba'i 'os// 'jig rten mgon po lta bur phyag bya'i gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
204a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / 
204b1(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// / rgyas
204b2(mdo sde): gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ 
204b3(mdo sde): tsatu ra dA ra ka sa mA d+hir ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thang
204b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gci dag na/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba de nyid kyi dus kyi tshe/ ku sha'i grong khyer na/ gyad rnams dang
204b5(mdo sde): nye ba na yod pa shing sa la zung gi bar na bzhugaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar
204b6(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par rtog cing 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ go'u tu ma'i bu khyed ci'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
204b7(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzum par rtog par byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan
204b8(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i lnga ltas/ g.yar lam 'jigs pa chen po'i 'jig su rung ba/ spu zing zhes bgyid pa zhig rmis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yar lam de rmis nas/ bcom ldan 'das shi
205a1(mdo sde): tu myur bar yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur lags grang snyam nas/ de'i slad du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bar 'gyur lagaso// 
205a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ma'i bu khyod kyi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas 'jigs pa ji lta bu zhig rmi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
205a3(mdo sde): tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa/ sa la'i tshal khrod 'di nyid du// 'jig rten mgon po'i lta su ni// khyod kyi rmi lam ci rmis pa// dris pa de ni ngal smos// de nas bcom
205a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ mdang gsum bdag gi g.yar lam na/ 'jig su rung zhing sdang bgyid la// spu zing bgyid pa rmis gyur pa/ 
205a5(mdo sde): de ni mi mchog gsan du gsol// 'jig rten khams 'di ra ldon pa'i shing // rtag tu me tog 'bras bu rtag/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan la// yid ni dga' bar bgyid pa
205a6(mdo sde): 'khrungs// 'jig rten khamasu ljon mchog de// grib ma bsil bas sems can rnams// rab tu dga' bgyid bro nad dang // mya ngan dag kyang sel bar bgyid// yonan mtha' yas phun tsheg
205a7(mdo sde): shing / srid rtse'i bar du mtho bar 'phags// de mthong bas ni mig dag cing // thos pas rna ba rnam dag 'gyur// de las rab 'jam don ldan zhing // shin tu rigs shing chos ldan la// son
205a8(mdo sde): kun la bde skyid pa'i// sgra skad dag kyang nges par 'byung // de las gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'od zer dag ni 'byung 'gyur zhing // de dag snyed kyi zhing rnams kyang // ljon shing chen pos bsal bar 'gyur// 
205b1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi mi// mtha' yas dpag tu ma mchis pa// gang dag 'od kyis reg gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi don kyang bgyid// phyogs su 'jig rten khamasu ni// de las dris
205b2(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag de yi dri snom pa// de dag ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur// de dag dmyal bar mi mchi zhing // dud 'gro'i skye gnas sdig can dang // yi dgas lha min ris mi mchi// de dag bzang
205b3(mdo sde): mche bar 'gyur// son kun la bde skyed pa// de 'dra'i ljon shing chen po de// gyad kyi dog sar chags nas ni// sa la 'i tshal gyi gseb du skyel// ljon mchog chag pa mthong gyur nas// de nas srog
205b4(mdo sde): chag stong phrag ni// bsam yas dpag tu ma mchis pa// tshenges 'debs shing smre sngags 'don// de tshe sgra de mi grag cing // dri yang gda' bar ma gyur la// gdeg pa'i rdo yang ma thog nas// 
205b5(mdo sde): de ma thag tu bdag kyang rgyal// de ltar 'jig su rung ba dang // spu/ yang zing zhes bgyid pa yi// g.yar lam mdang sum rmis pa/ de// spyan dang ldan pas bdag la gsungs// de nas gnas cung
205b6(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag so sor gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs
205b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i snga ltas mthong nas/ rang rang gi 'khor lha'i bu khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu lhag tsam gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ 
205b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sgra skad 'thun par nyam thag pa'i nga ros ngu zhing mya ngan byed la smre sngags 'don bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras
206a1(mdo sde): kye ma'o sdug bsngal mi bzad che// sa la 'i tshal khrid dga' bar ni// de ring mgon po mya ngan 'da'// kun dga' khyod kyis mi shes sam// gang zhig snang med rnams kyi sgron/ 
206a2(mdo sde): skyab dang dpung gnyen gang yin pa// de ni zhi ba len med par// de ring mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tha~Md dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de/ 
206a3(mdo sde): dag la tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mthong ba gzhan min te// de rings la'i tshal khrod du// nga ni mya ngan 'da' 'gyur gyis// mya ngan ma byed brtan par gyis// kha dog ldan zhing bsam byas la/ 
206a4(mdo sde): 'od dang dri bsung phun tshogs pa'i// ljon shing ljon pa chen po de// sa la'i tshal khrod chag gyur pa// ljon shing ci 'drar ston dab ni// de ring sa la'i tshal khro du// ji ltar me la chus btab bzhi
206a5(mdo sde): len med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// shes rab rdzu 'phrul ma thar phyin pa// nye rgyal bang nas skyes dag bzhin// mi ma cho ga nga yang 'da' 'gyur bar// kun dga' khyod kyis mi shes so// 
206a6(mdo sde): 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste// skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin// ston pas de dag rab mkhyen nas// dge slong rnams la de yang bshad// kun dga' tshur shog khyod song la// nga'i nyan thos
206a7(mdo sde): rnams la smos// lha yi mig gi mthar phyin pa// gnas brtan chen po ma 'gags dang // gnas brtan chen po ka t+ya'i bu// gnas brtan gang po rab 'byor dang // gsus po che ni chen po dang / 
206a8(mdo sde): ba lang bdag dang dga' byed dang // gro zhon don yod rgyal po dang // chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba dang // dga' bo dang ni sgra can bzang // nga yi nyan thos gzhan rnams dang // slob dang mi slob gnas rten/ 
206b1(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang so so'i skye bo dag/ nga ni mya ngan 'da' 'gyur gyis// thams cad shin tu myur bar smon// slob dang so so'i skye bo yis// ma mthong sdug bsngal skye 'gyur bas// mya ngan 'das kyi/ 
206b2(mdo sde): 'og tu ni// mya ngan zug rngus gzir ma bya// mya ngan ma byed 'du byed rnams// mi rtag rmi lam lta bu zhes// ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid kyis// de dag rnams ni dbugs dbyung bya// de skad ces pa
206b3(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshig su bcad gsol pa/ mgon po sangs rgyas mya ngan las// 'da' bar 'gyur ba thos nas bdag/ phyogs bslad bdag
206b4(mdo sde): ni lus rma zhing // bdag ni g.yar ngan shin tu che// lu das nyams bde ba ma mchis shing // sems nyams bde dba'ang ma mchis la// chags bral nyams bde'ang ma mchis
206b5(mdo sde): na/ spyan ldan bdag ni ji ltar mchi// bdag gi skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang // 'jig rten rnam 'dren gang lag sa pa// deng mthong slad kyi mi mthong zhes// gnas brtan
206b6(mdo sde): rnams la ji skad bgyi// mya ngan gyur cing sdug bsngal bas// ji ltar mya ngan brjod par bgyi// bdag cag rnams kyi 'jigs chen 'di// gnas brtan de dag ji ltar nyan// gang dag slob
206b7(mdo sde): dang skye bo yi// dge slong mya ngan zug rngu yis// kun nas zug pa ji ltar gnas// mi mchog bskal par bzhugasu gsol// 'khor bzhi'i nang du mchis nas ni// ston pa mya ngan 'da'
206b8(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes// ji ltar brjod kyi mi'o mchog/ thub chen bskal par bzhug su gsol// sgron ma chen po 'jig rten du// shin tu myur bar nub 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag rab myur la// 
207a1(mdo sde): ldongs pa nyid du 'gyur lag so// mi mchog dag ni g.yar ngan 'di// dge slong rnams la smrar mi spro// gang lagayang ngan ma mchis pa// gzhan zhig mngag par ba
207a2(mdo sde): stsal stsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u tu ma'i bu 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin gyis/ mya ngan ma byed par song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
207a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la phyir tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa/ bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams kyis// de ring sangs rgyas 'da' thos nas// gzhal med khang dag spangs nas ni// mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don// nga/ 
207a4(mdo sde): 'das phyin dge slong dag/ ma mthong mya ngan byed ma bzhugs/ 'di ni rim gro byed pa'i las// song la dge slong rnams dang sgron// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa ri rab kyi spol su
207a5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing 'dug/ tshe dang / na pa ma 'gag pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas/ lha'i bu dbang che ba dbang che bar grags
207a6(mdo sde): brnams rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag nas mi snang bar gyur pa mthong zhing / lha rnams kyi smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra chen po dag kyang thos/ rang gi 'khor rnams kyang srab par mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa
207a7(mdo sde): ma 'gags pas de'i tshe bsams te/ lha'i mig gis lha'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa de dag yi chad cing rang rang gi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dag spangs te rings pa rings par gang du dong zhing 'dong bar byed ces 'jig rten
207a8(mdo sde): la rnam par bltas// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo las dpag tshad brgya tsam dag chad pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo las dpag tshad nyis brgya tsam dang / 
207b1(mdo sde): mo las dpag tshad sum brgya tsam dang / rtse mo las dpag tshad bzhi brgya tsam dag chad pa dang / rtse mo las dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam dag chad cing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung ba dag kyang mthong ste/ sems
207b2(mdo sde): can 'ga' tsam la yang gnod pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed na/ srog gi bar chad byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di ltar ri rab kyi rtse mo de dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab la rten cing gnas pa'i lha
