258a4(mdo sde): nga'i nye gnas rnams bags kyis mi dge ba'i chos spyod do// phrag dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras
258a5(mdo sde): bu 'thob bo// lo lnga brgya phan chad brgyad brgya tshun chad nga'i/ nye gnas rnams khyim pa'i gos gyon nas/ ba lang da nga lug dang / byil dang bong bu dang rtagaso zhing 'bru mang po bsogs te/ 
258a6(mdo sde): rang gis lag dar zhing rang za ba dang / bran pho dang bran mo yang gso bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe stong phrag stong la stong phrag gcig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyuraro// li brgyad brgya phan
258a7(mdo sde): chad nas lo stong tshun chad ni/ nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos slob te/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag la grogs por sten cing / phan tshun tha na phrin gyis
258a8(mdo sde): 'drul zhing / zhing rmo brko byed de/ 'bru bzan mang po dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna bdun sog cing sha za zhing chang 'thung ste/ chen po bzhi gsos shing rtas par byed pa dang
258b1(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma ltar gos sdug gu gyon zhing 'drid pa dang / bslu ba'i las byed de/ de la 'bum phrag khri la brgya tsam zhig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob bo// lo stong phan chad sum brgya tshun
258b2(mdo sde): chad ni che thang du 'khrugs te/ nga'i nye gnas rnams lus la chos gos gyon yang shing kha la phan snying brtags dang 'dra ste/ gzi byin mod khyim pas mthong na yang bkur bsti yang mi byed pas shan
258b3(mdo sde): ba dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// de'i dus na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te/ gcig la gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / gaN+DI
258b4(mdo sde): la gcig dgra byed de/ byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyang med pas/ bza' ba dang btung bas nyon mongs tre/ khyim thab med pa dang / chung ma med pa dang / bu pho med pa
258b5(mdo sde): dang bu mo med pa dang / long ba dang / 'on pa dang / lkug pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / bran mod/ nga bros pa/ yul khams phyung bar byed pa/ 'tshe bas rang mi
258b6(mdo sde): sos pa dag nga'i chos la zhugs nas/ khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rngon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste dper na/ lha'i glang ngam/ rta rgod dam/ ban glang myos pa ltar gdul dka' ba rang dga' yang 'gro ba
258b7(mdo sde): slob dpon dang / slob ma yang mi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste/ 'dod chags la bag med par spyod cing / bla ma dang 'og ma'i rim pa yang med/ babang ngan gyi rim pa yang med/ dud 'gro byug/ 
258b8(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba/ khan mtho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed cing / ngan song gsum gyis mi 'jigs par/ gar song gar gnas kyang / chang 'tshong ba dang / shan pa dang / rngon pa dang / smad 'tshong ma
259a1(mdo sde): dang bsten cing 'grogs pa kha nas kyang ngag sdig pa smra zhing / sems la yang sdig pa sems/ yang na blon dang bsten cing dge ba'i mi dag la thabs sna tshogs
259a2(mdo sde): kyis bsdigs shing nor phrogs te/ bu smad gso'o// yang na rngon pa'i yo byad nya rgya la sogs 'chang zhing / nya la sogs pa bcus nas/ rang gis lag dar te/ bsod pa dang / bsregs pa dang
259a3(mdo sde): zla ba nya ba dang / shi ba'i tshe gso sbyin mi byed de/ rang nyam su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi las byed pa'i rnams phan tshun rtsod cing / bla ma dang / grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang / gdug pa'i sems
259a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma yang gcig la ci dag skyon 'dru zhing 'phya ba dang srog pa'i gtam smra ste/ dper na rtsalas pa mang po kun cig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang / phan
259a5(mdo sde): tshun dpung dang sde cha gcig la gcig tshig ngan gyis smra 'beb sa pa dang / bla 'og gi rims yang med pa dang / mi rgod ma rungs pa ltar mi dge ba byed pa dang / khe dang grags pa la
259a6(mdo sde): chags te/ tshig mi shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang nub par 'gyur te/ klog pa dang 'don pa yang med pa dang / de'i slob pa rnams kyang dgra chos dang / gtsug lag dang / yi ge
259a7(mdo sde): dang 'ji ba dang / bcom pa dang / bon chos dang / mig mangs dang / glu gar dang / du ba dang / sprug pa dang / 'phong rtsal dang / rgyug pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa slob cing
259a8(mdo sde): spyod de/ de ltar ma legs pa'i chos spyod pas/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du lhung ste/ bskal pa gra ngas med par ngan song gi sdug bsngal mying nas/ de las thar nas yang byol song du skyes
259b1(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / skom pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / khal lci ba 'grel zhing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ci zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa yang chos ma yin pa mang du byed de/ ri dang / 
259b2(mdo sde): tshal dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung na mi gan shing rtag tu grong du rgyug ste/ sems la rtogs pa mang zhing / khe dang grags pa tshol te/ nor rdzas dang longs spyod la chags shing chog mi shwa
259b3(mdo sde): pa dang / chos ston pa'i bshad mkhas shig yin na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang thog tu mi phebs te/ 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas grong rgyu zhing
259b4(mdo sde): khyim du zhugs nas/ khyim pa la chos ston pa khe dang gra/ gas pa'i phyir te/ longs spyod mang du sogs shing / dashan pa dang 'dra'o// sha dang chang la mi spyod pa dag gos/ 
259b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag khyed ni btsun pa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yin na/ snying rje ba'i sems kyang med de/ 'di ltar chos ma yin pa mang du spyod pas/ khyed ni shan pa dang 'dra
259b6(mdo sde): zhes spyo zhing brgyad par 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag de skad ces gshe ba thos nas/ kun log te des brdegs pa dang / gshe ba dang brgyad bkag ste/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra'o// 
259b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni/ nged sha dang chang 'thung ba ma gnang ste/ de nged de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/ da ni ci yang gnang bas/ nged sha dang chang
259b8(mdo sde): 'thung ba yin no// khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig la gcig bdag cag gis shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o zhes smra zhing / la la ni tshig kyal pa dang don
260a1(mdo sde): med pa'i tshig dang / 'dran tor gyi tshig dang / 'khrul pa'i tshig tu smra zhing / dper na dmus long zhig 'dzub mo gnyis nyi ma la gtsugs te/ nyi ma ya ba'i ni rlung ngo // 
260a2(mdo sde): yang so dog go zhes smra ba 'am/ mi 'on pa zhig bdag gis gnam gyi steng na chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar/ dmus long mang po tshogs te/ 'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang 'od
260a3(mdo sde): srung chen po la sogs pa sbrul de'i nang na bzhugs kyang kun gyis brdeg cing gshe ste/ de nas skrod cing 'dug tu mi ste ro// gzhan yang dper na seng ge ni spos kyi ri la gnas te/ ri dgas dang gcan
260a4(mdo sde): zan gang yang gnas der nyar mi bzod do// seng ge ri las byung ste/ song ba'i 'og tu ni gdug pa khro bo la sogs pa gcig gis gcig bos te spos kyi ri la lhags nas 'bras bu
260a5(mdo sde): zhim po za zhing chu mig las 'thung ngo // de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las thams cad skams shing med par gyur to// spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyob par mi 'gyur bas/ 
260a6(mdo sde): rtsa gdug pa skyes te/ zos ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas par 'gyuraro// nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ dge slong thams cad kyis ngas bstan pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'don cing klog pa yang gong ma ni
260a7(mdo sde): bar du bcug/ bar ma ni 'og tu bcug/ 'og ma ni gong du bcug/ bar ma ni 'og dang tha mar bcug ste/ don ma yin pa la don zhes zer/ don la ni don ma yin zhes zer te/ ji ltar mu stegs
260a8(mdo sde): can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni bden pa yin no zhes zer ba dang 'dri'o// de'i dus na mdo sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang / gzi brjid dang mthu med de/ la la zhig 'don tam klog kyang mi gzhi/ 
260b1(mdo sde): 'ga' yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa med do// de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid stor ba 'am/ bya 'dab ma med pa dang 'dra ste/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten yang stongs shing / zhig/ 
260b2(mdo sde): ral gso ba yang med do// ji ltar sku gzugs dang ba dan dang rin po che'i gdugs yod pa yang dgra cha zhig pa dang 'dra ste/ phug ron dang bye'u dang phag dang khyi dang lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang gnas su
260b3(mdo sde): 'gyuro// dge slong so son 'dug pa'i gnas ni byi dor bzang du byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di yang khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yin no// dga' bos sangs rgyas kyis
260b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te ngus so// de ltar dgaladape yid gdung zhing ngu ba ni btang ba las/ bcom ldan dngas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod de ltar ma ngu bar mdo
260b5(mdo sde): sde 'di gzungasu zung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel zhig/ de na sa dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gzungasu bzung ngo zhes gsol to// brgya
260b6(mdo sde): byin dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa bdag gis kyang yongasu bzung ste/ gang dag mdo sde 'diri 'am/ tshal lam/ shing drung ngam/ bas mtha' 'am/ 
260b7(mdo sde): dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam/ klog na/ bdag cag gis lha dang mi'i 'khor dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas te/ gnas der 'gro zhing / chung ngu na tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig
260b8(mdo sde): gcig tsam yang mi brjed mi nyams par bzung ngo zhes gsol to// mdo sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe/ dge slong stong snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par gyur to// dge slong ma stong lnga ba
261a1(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// dge bsnyen lnga bad+ma yongasu dag par gyur te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong // 'angs/ 
261a2(mdo sde): pa ting 'dzin mchog dam pa rdzogas+ho// / mdo 'di la mkhas pa blo gros zhib mos dgongs 'tshal// 
261a3(mdo sde): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA yo ba ma sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs
261a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bco/ ma ldan 'das grong khyer bar na sen/ drang srong lhung ba ri dgas
261a5(mdo sde): kyi nags na/ dgra bcom pa nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i se
261a6(mdo sde): dang / seng+ge blo gros dang / legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang / dpe med blo gros dang / sa 'dzin dang / mes byin dang / chu lha dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / bug sbas
261a7(mdo sde): dang bzang skyong dang / glog lha dang / rnam par snang byed dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / brtson pa mi gting dang / mthong ba don yod
261a8(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khri nyis steng dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / legs par gnas pa'i
261b1(mdo sde): sa su can mam ma dan sa 'a ma nga chu ma tshan mas bya la rnams ca #
261b2(mdo sde): gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
261b3(mdo sde): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin
261b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma
261b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir/ rtag tu skabs phyis/ pad+ma'i snying po khyod de bzhin
261b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces
261b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261b8(mdo sde): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing / ting 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar
261b9(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang
262a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262a2(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po legaso leg so// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsub bsag/ 
262a3(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/ khyod 'di ltar sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje bar zhugs pas pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin
262a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni leg so// pad+ma'i dang dal gyi snying po khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
262a5(mdo sde): zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyis snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
262a6(mdo sde): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bkA stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
262a7(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing tinge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu rdzogs par
262a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mes pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
262b1(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do// 
262b2(mdo sde): gnas med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur/ yang dag par thong ngas/ yang dag pa la sbyor bar gyur// yang dag pa la sbyor bas cil yang bre thogs par mi 'gyur// de bre thogs pa med pas yang
262b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do// yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no// chos thams
262b4(mdo sde): cad ni rten las 'byung ba ste/ rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do// chos gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dri ni ma skyes pa'o// de ltar na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa
262b5(mdo sde): ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de/ ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs pa 'thob bo// 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
262b6(mdo sde): dngos po dang snying rje'i sems kyi rje su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo// de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sheso// chos thams cad ni yongasu brtags pas sprul pa ste/ yongasu brtags
262b7(mdo sde): pa de yang shin tu stong pa'o// chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tingange 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting 'dzin thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de
262b8(mdo sde): lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang / ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
263a1(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 
263a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i tingange 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa lta mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i
263a3(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 
263a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa dru/ dge cu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no// / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis
263a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'dzin ba pa lags sam/ 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams ga/ zhan dag na yang dag sgyu ma lte bu'i ting 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu
263a6(mdo sde): dam pa dag kyang mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub kyi phyogs cha logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na
263a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes
263a8(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po
263b1(mdo sde): thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ti nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa
263b2(mdo sde): de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin thob bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 
263b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i tingange 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi/ 
263b4(mdo sde): zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis de las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
263b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad zer ba de de bzhin te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad
263b6(mdo sde): med grangs med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyis snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
263b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan pas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar
263b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na dga' bar/ 
264a1(mdo sde): gyur ba del bu ga 'phrul bangan par 'dum dag legs par mdzad dugasom/ rna srung du zhen/ bcom ldan das skyes bungs padaganyims sa rnam kyi
264a2(mdo sde): 'dir mchis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsab yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba 'i
264a3(mdo sde): san thos pas/ sgyum lte bu'i ting 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjes
264a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'ang dpag tu med pa de yang mthong ste/ mdzanganas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dag/ than dmed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 
264a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / der / skyes ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de nas
264a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba gdab par mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi steng chen
264a7(mdo sde): po 'jig rten gyi khams 'do gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ ri'i tshogs dang / shing ljon pa dang / r-i'i rgyu
264a8(mdo sde): po ri rab dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / khir lug dang / khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun dag de dag thams cad kyang gser kyi kha dog gi
264b1(mdo sde): snang ba des khyab par gyur to// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to// nub phyogs
264b2(mdo sde): logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das
264b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar
264b4(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur to// de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa bde ba can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang
264b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu
264b6(mdo sde): bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas pa de yang mthong ste/ dper na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher skyes te/ 
264b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin
264b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 
265a1(mdo sde): g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 
265a2(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
265a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/ ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang / thams cad dang ldan/ 
265a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sa ler mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/ mdom gang dam gyi phyogs na/ skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil la/ 
265a5(mdo sde): bsgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
265a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de yang snang // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / 
265a7(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyeso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do// 
265a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi steng / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
265b1(mdo sde): skyes 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de/ 
265b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong nas ngo mcher du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom
265b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
265b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo zhes kyang brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig
265b5(mdo sde): de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'ji garten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu mgul/ rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu
265b6(mdo sde): g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem che ma rab tu chem chem/ 
265b7(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan
265b8(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhe sa dang bcas
266a1(mdo sde): bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skyes bu dam bde gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
266a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de mthu brtan pa brnyes pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de ci'i
266a3(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis sems
266a4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i dog sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la
266a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgya sa kyi zhing 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
266a6(mdo sde): thub pa'i mtshan brjod par ma zad kyis zhing gzhan du ma dag na yang bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan yongasu brjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang 'od des reg pas rnam pa drug tu rab tu
266a7(mdo sde): g.yos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag sems can tshad med grangs med padag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ blan
266a8(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
266b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos// thos nas kyang de dag thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// 
266b2(mdo sde): de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
266b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad
266b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa shAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang rab rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par na/ bcom ldan 'das
266b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di lta ra yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi
266b6(mdo sde): gtong na gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni ci lag/ 
266b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ rgyu med
266b8(mdo sde): rkyen med par bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
267a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de deng byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston par 'gyur te/ 
267a2(mdo sde): de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des/ chos bstan pa de'i lnga ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / 'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od 'di bkye'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso/ 
267a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267a4(mdo sde): mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom da ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba
267a5(mdo sde): dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bku ra bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
267a6(mdo sde): der mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de khyed nyid las brtsams te/ chos ston par 'gyur gyis de'i dus la dbab
267a7(mdo sde): par shes na khyed deng zhig ces skabs bye bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen
267a8(mdo sde): thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nye 'khor na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po rnams la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshur shegs/ 
267b1(mdo sde): khyed kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya
267b2(mdo sde): ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
267b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/ smon lam dang thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can
267b4(mdo sde): der byung ste/ sems can dman pa la mos pa 'dod cha/ gas kyi shas che ba/ zhe sdang gi shas che ba/ ga da ti mug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang
267b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir// skyes bu dang / bde gnyis kyis tshig 'di smras ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi
267b6(mdo sde): khams bde ba can de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas/ mgrin cig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis
267b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag gis sha'i mig gis de mngon sum du mthong la/ mthong
267b8(mdo sde): nas kyang dad pa snyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
268a1(mdo sde): thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o//

268a4(mdo sde): bde ba can do nas deng ngo // de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag
268a5(mdo sde): thams cad re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byaso// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang
268a6(mdo sde): gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa cha mnyam par legs par rnam par phye ba legs pa zin pa sha stag go/ khang pa brtsegs pa re re yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad
268a7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las byas pa dag kyang yod/ dngul las byas pa dag kyang yod/ bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/ shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/ mu tig dmar po dang / 
268a8(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po dang / spug las byas pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / sna gsum pa dag
268b1(mdo sde): kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang shel dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/ rin po che gser dang dngul dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sna lnga pa'i khang

268b3(mdo sde): dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs
268b4(mdo sde): pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag kyang da yod/ a ga ru dang tsan+dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ a ra ka ru nag po dang tsan+dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/ tsan+dan thams
268b5(mdo sde): cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me to ga ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dka/ ra po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ sna ma'i
268b6(mdo sde): me tog dang / bar sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / skya nar dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / ta ra ni dang / go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog da nu ska ri las byas pa'i
268b7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog man da ra dang / man dar chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog pa ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / man+t+ra sha ka dang / 
268b8(mdo sde): man+t+ra sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen pod
269a1(mdo sde): shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / sbrul dang / sbal chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i sbal las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ me tog
269a2(mdo sde): thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/ kha dog dum pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong dum pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa yongasu dag pa/ 'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do// khang
269a3(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul/ de na lha'i bu mo cig gi lag na dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / glu dbyangs sgra
269a4(mdo sde): snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / rgyud can pi wang dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/ sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing
269a5(mdo sde): 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan dmar po'i phye ma'i phu ra ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// 
269a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i
269a7(mdo sde): bu mo kha cig ni tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i me tog gi pur ma thogs shing
269a8(mdo sde): 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man+da ra dang / man+dar chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / man+t+ra sha ka dang / man+dA sha ka chen po dang / me tog mdog mdzes
269b1(mdo sde): dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / me tog 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / kun tu 'khor lo dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang / me tog zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu
269b2(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / zla ba mchog dang / s+tha la dang / sbru la chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i sgra la'i me tog gi phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog thams cad dang / 
269b3(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
269b4(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshe dgas pa'i sku mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs dpa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu
269b5(mdo sde): tig mthon ka'i mu tig go phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos pa'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas
269b6(mdo sde): g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha
269b7(mdo sde): dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ legs par las su byas pa/ dbyibs shin tu legs pa/ brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to// 
269b8(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyed na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i sil snyan yan lag brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag
270a1(mdo sde): gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong
270a2(mdo sde): mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu zhig gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ bai DUR+Ya dang / shel gyis spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ me tog
270a3(mdo sde): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngur ba sgra 'byin pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ bya rog gi btung du rung bar mu dang khang chad du ga
270a4(mdo sde): bdag sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po/ che'i shing ljon pa'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor to// ri/ na po che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris// 
270a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re rer 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyis bkod pa dag so sor/ 
270a6(mdo sde): byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/ byang chub sems
270a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad
270a8(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to// snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/ bkod pa de lta bu des/ byang chub
270b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las btung ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis de skad cig thang
270b2(mdo sde): cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta
270b3(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil du mnyam par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas// 
270b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye baphrag rtsa bzhis yongasu bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ yo na tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu lhag ge'o// 
270b5(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang / stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba sa khyab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
270b6(mdo sde): gnyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
270b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig
270b8(mdo sde): tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par smra dbyangs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi brjid mtshungs
271a1(mdo sde): med yon tan dung po gcig la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs// thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa/ 
271a2(mdo sde): lam las 'das// shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshalo// nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnabs
271a3(mdo sde): gyur cing // dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 'jig rten kun tu gsal// mi mchog khyod mi tshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yongs ma mchis// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku'i/ 
271a4(mdo sde): 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba na/ dbu zhugs rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa lnga dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od// snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du
271a5(mdo sde): mog mog mi snang gsal ma mchis// rgyal ba zhing cig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du// 'gro ba/ 'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs// 
271a6(mdo sde): ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yong ma mchis// mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// spu'i khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnam ston
271a7(mdo sde): mdzad kyang // 'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis// 'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda'i la// sems can rnams la gnod pa ma mchis 'dren par
271a8(mdo sde): gyur ma mchis// gang na sems can dmyal bdud 'gro yi dgas ma mchis shing // rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la// mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te/ 
271b1(mdo sde): mchog tu nyam dga' ba'i// yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad// lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bslang slad du// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi
271b2(mdo sde): dgas 'gro ba shin tu mi bzad pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabasu nye bar mchi// zhing gzha
271b3(mdo sde): la la dag kyang na mkha' lta bur ston pa mdzad// de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis bltam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang // zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongasu bstam par ston pa
271b4(mdo sde): mdzad// rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lagaso// 'dul ba'i don tu gzug das kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa// la lar 'dod pa'i
271b5(mdo sde): dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par gyur// tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin snyed pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang / 
271b6(mdo sde): srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing // dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa// blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtso
271b7(mdo sde): gyur cing // shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs pham nas chad pas mi gcod la// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni bsdu bgyid cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems
271b8(mdo sde): can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa// bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur bdag tu gyur// 'jig rten 'din la la bltam
272a1(mdo sde): ba lta bur ston mdzad de// dogs la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang // nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i mtha' mar dbyung zhes// yid 'ong yan lag
272a2(mdo sde): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spangs lags kyang // 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la yong smin mdzad sladadu// la lar
272a3(mdo sde): sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'// mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad// yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang // yul
272a4(mdo sde): 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas/ brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyi ngas shing // drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na bzhugs
272a5(mdo sde): par gda'// 'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad na/ sa ni/ bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mcho ga la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'// mu stegs can gyi
272a6(mdo sde): tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad sladadu// sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs par gda'// 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du// 
272a7(mdo sde): mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas// sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin pa mdzad// ji ltar
272a8(mdo sde): sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par bgyi slad du// sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba'i sgren mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du// sangs rgyas
272b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston// thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston// gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyis 'gro ba ma mchis shing // rdul bral mya
272b2(mdo sde): ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa// bla na med pa 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskore// khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes// phyogs kyi lam
272b3(mdo sde): rnams thams cad du yang 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad// mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul lo bdag cag phyag 'tshalo// 
272b4(mdo sde): la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa// rtag/ dab brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang / dam bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos// 
272b5(mdo sde): mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dge ni shin tu rgyas par 'gang sa// ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang bra la 'gyur gyis// 'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan
272b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i mi rigs shes// 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston// bde gshegs sku'i phrin las mtha' dang pa
272b7(mdo sde): rol yang ma mchis// gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dge kyang dpag mi lang // nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de// rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams
272b8(mdo sde): kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang // rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang
273a1(mdo sde): po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis// 
273a2(mdo sde): de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa// 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni// rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'das pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// 
273a3(mdo sde): de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yis// 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan
273a4(mdo sde): gyur pa// mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag la tsha lo// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa/ 
273a5(mdo sde): yi// bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a6(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon
273a7(mdo sde): par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom
273a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo// 'di skad ces bcom
273b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyam dga' la ltar stsol zhig ces kyang gsung ngo // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen pode
273b2(mdo sde): dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongasu khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
273b3(mdo sde): gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin
273b4(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
273b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir khang pa brtseg/ sa pa sna tshogs brgyan cing yongasu khyab par gda'/ ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs
273b6(mdo sde): pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/ 'on te/ 
273b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces
273b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa du mas brgyan cing yongasu khyab par snang ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu
274a1(mdo sde): ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
274a2(mdo sde): chen thob kyi mthu yin no// gsol pa 'di dag gi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongasu khyab par gda' ba ni/ skyes
274a3(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongasu spangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// 
274a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med
274a5(mdo sde): pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongasu sbyangs pa yin// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta/ bu'i ting 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i
274a6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod yang shar gyi phyogs cha log su de na ci snang ltos shig/ de nas
274a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig bsgrib pa med pas bltas na/ shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi
274a8(mdo sde): bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274b1(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
274b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngamo zhes snyun gsolo// nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde
274b3(mdo sde): bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs
274b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ rin po che sna chogadas kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgya dan cing yongasu khyab par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de/ 
274b5(mdo sde): dag thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang ga kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
274b6(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo man
274b7(mdo sde): du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 
274b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis te nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sangs rgyas
275a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad na dga' ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ byang chub sems
275a2(mdo sde): dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de
275a3(mdo sde): gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong
275a4(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong
275a5(mdo sde): ba dang / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor sreg chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta bu'i rdzu
275a6(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
275a7(mdo sde): 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi// 
275a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
275b1(mdo sde): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin tu legs
275b2(mdo sde): par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / 
275b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/ 
275b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong dgi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa/ de snyed du tshad med pa/ de da snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa
275b5(mdo sde): de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa dang ga tu med pa bde ba kun ston pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan
275b6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
275b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
275b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad cig
276a1(mdo sde): brjod par byas nyon cig/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
276a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad ma mchis te/ 
276a3(mdo sde): ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse
276a4(mdo sde): mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ pad+ma dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa dang lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan
276a5(mdo sde): 'das blang ba ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya 'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar
276a6(mdo sde): bshags pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thig pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas
276a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od
276a8(mdo sde): seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon ten rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ston bkod par blta'o// de'i nyan thos kyi
276b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/ ji ltar da stan de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med zhes byas na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das
276b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'di seng ge rnam par rim po'i rgyal ba de nyan gyis kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems das
276b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun kyang de rnyeng ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum khan las brtsams te chos ston to// badz+ra dpal gyi snying po ngas bskul pa ga ng+gA klung gi khyi ma steng du/ 
276b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng gernam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yonan
276b5(mdo sde): bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te/ chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
276b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rdul
276b7(mdo sde): po de'i gsung rab la/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
276b8(mdo sde): po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad bla na ma
277a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongasu longs spyod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni
277a2(mdo sde): bdun khri drug stong yod do// rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 
277a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni medo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med kyi
277a4(mdo sde): ming mi grags te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tsha/ ngas par spyod pa las gyur pa rdzus te byung ba sha sta go/ sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / 
277a5(mdo sde): chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kha zas rigs pa med par gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las gzhan med de/ bu
277a6(mdo sde): de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
277a7(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstan to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas
277a8(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'od la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ spyod pa tshad med pa dag don tu gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang medo// rtul ba tshad med/ 
277b1(mdo sde): pa gang dag brtsams par mi bya ba de gang yang medado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med/ tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med
277b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba yong su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/ sems can dag la byams pa ni tshad med/ zhing gi bkod
277b3(mdo sde): pa dag ni ched med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongasu grub pa ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor yongasu 'dzin pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir// pad+ma'i dpal gyi/ 
277b4(mdo sde): snying po byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na sems bskyed pa gcig dgis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa/ de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongasu bsngo'o// ji lta
277b5(mdo sde): yongasu bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongasu bsngo bar byed pa/ de 'i tshe sems can 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon su du
277b6(mdo sde): byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu yongasu bsngo ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o// 
277b7(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o// de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan lnga
277b8(mdo sde): 'das pa/ tshad med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ma 'gag pa zhes bya'o// gang mi skye ma 'gag pa de ni tshad
278a1(mdo sde): med pa'o// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos rgyal ba
278a2(mdo sde): dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ 'di yang dag par rab tu ston to// des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par
278a3(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste dga'
278a4(mdo sde): pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang ldan cig tu ba bcom ldan 'das de la tshig su bcad pa dag gis mdo dan par bstod pa/ 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyu
278a5(mdo sde): ba rasmra ba'i tshogs kun yang dag rab tu 'jom// bdud kyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba// mtshungs med ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshalo// nyi zla dag dang me'i 'di
278a6(mdo sde): rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams// bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur// mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo// thub pa bskal pa rgya ma
278a7(mdo sde): 'das par yang // dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyad pa mdzad// 'phrin las de'i 'bras bu yid 'ong ste/ des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur// skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses
278a8(mdo sde): shing / sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs nas// de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste// rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston// srid gsum srog chags
278b1(mdo sde): kun gyi sman pa 'dra// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong // thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman// zhi ba bla na med pa rab tu ston// sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mche/ 
278b2(mdo sde): rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi// mkhyen nas gang gis ma ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston// mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje tso 'dra ba// ji snyed
278b3(mdo sde): rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang // rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la// de 'dra ba'i snying rje yong ma mchis// bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan// rgyal ba'i sku ni gse/ 
278b4(mdo sde): gyi ri bo 'dra// bye ba gnyis las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' dab// mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshalo// / chos sprin brgya las chos char 'bebs pa na// gang dag
278b5(mdo sde): rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam
278b6(mdo sde): yas su// mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin tu dka'o// bsod nams las kyi bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa// de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams dga'// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos
278b7(mdo sde): dbyings rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang gda'// bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yongs ma mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'// bden
278b8(mdo sde): pa gzigs shing don dam ston pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'cha
279a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton// nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du blags// rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgyu dang bral// rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshalo// 
279a2(mdo sde): mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi mnga'// dgongs pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra// rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan// rlung dang na mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// thub
279a3(mdo sde): pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags// stan
279a4(mdo sde): mnga' ba lha mis mchod pa la// bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid// rgyal ba mchod pa'i bas dad nams ci mchis pa// des ni thub pa chen po khyod 'dras
279a5(mdo sde): shog/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/ skyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i grogs
279a6(mdo sde): g.yon nas tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad+ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pa gnyis 'byung // pad+ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung
279a7(mdo sde): nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de/ ting 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis kyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug pa mthing ngo // 
279a8(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang tshig su bcad pa 'di smras// khyod gnyis lha'am klu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri za mi 'am ci// mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci// dri ba smos shig grogs pa dag/ pad+ma'i dpal
279b1(mdo sde): gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogasu byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la/ tshig su bcad de smras pa/ grogs po chos kun stong pa yi/ 
279b2(mdo sde): ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci// chos rnams thams cad ming med na// gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid gang la lha med cing // klu med srin bu yod ma yin// mi 'am mi ma yin yang rung
279b3(mdo sde): thams cad de na yong med do// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u cig shos des/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigasu gcad de smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong pa ste// ming la ming ni
279b4(mdo sde): yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad ming med de/ 'on kyang ming gis yongasu brjod// ming gi rang bzhi dan gang yin pa// des na ma mthong ma thos so// las kyis
279b5(mdo sde): 'gag pa ma yin na// 'di na gang gi ming zhig 'dri// skad du ni ming byas nas// ming btags byas te bstan pa ni// kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems// gcig shos
279b6(mdo sde): rin chen mchog ces bya// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang ldan
279b7(mdo sde): cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od se ng+ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
279b8(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u
280a1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu tshig su bcad de gsol ba/ pad+ma dag dang dri gda' dang // me tog breng dang na bza' 'am// 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam// rgyal
280a2(mdo sde): ba ji ltar mchod par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso// ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags// don 'di legs par bstan du gsol// 'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi
280a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshig su bca bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ 
280a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// mtshan mchog sum cug nyis ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur// / mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing // gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs
280a5(mdo sde): snyed dag/ me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te// 'jig rte// na mgon po phul ba bas// gang gis 'di ni thal sbyar/ nas// byang chub tu ni sems btud na// 'di ni bsod nam/ 
280a6(mdo sde): ches mang ste// de la tshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni co 'dra ba// de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med// de 'dra ba'i dpal yang med// pad+ma'i dpal/ 
280a7(mdo sde): gyi snying po da ltar khye'u de gnyis kyi slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshig su bcad gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'chas// bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i
280a8(mdo sde): sgra ra lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig/ ji srid du ni 'khor ba yi// sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa// de srid bskal pa du mar yang // sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi// ji tsam sngon
280b1(mdo sde): mtha' dran pa// rnam grangs 'di'i tshul dag gis// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// de srid bskal pa spyad par bgyi// gal te de ring slan chad du// 'dod chags kyi ni sems byung na// 
280b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhino// rtag tu dben pa'i tshig smra zhing // brdzun gyi/ 
280b3(mdo sde): tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te de ring slan chad du// rdul med byang chub ma thob par// bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur na// ngas ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur// nam kyang rang sangs rgyas ni
280b4(mdo sde): bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de// sems can rnams la/ snying rje zhing // bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// jilta dar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing // grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las/ 
280b5(mdo sde): gzhan du yon+dan bye ba rnyed// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du ba gyi// de na nyan thos gang yang med// rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med// de tshe bye ba'i tshad med pa'i// byang chub
280b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas// bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi// skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to// gal te 'di
280b7(mdo sde): dag gzhan yin min par// de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na// rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog/ tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni// sa yang rab
280b8(mdo sde): tu g.yos par gyur// sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar// de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin// stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis// me tog char dang bye ma'i char// spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang // 
281a1(mdo sde): na bza' bye ba rab tu phab// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam/ yid gnyis
281a2(mdo sde): za na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid
281a3(mdo sde): ces bya bar gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o// / 
281a4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni/ khye'u ri na chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
281a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen semasas shes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems
281a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa ni de yino// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
281a7(mdo sde): 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos par gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du/ 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur pa ngo mtshar to// 
281a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur na/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
281b1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
281b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems ma bskyed do// skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon+tan dpag tu med
281b3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan te 'di gnyis kyi yon+tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gyi
281b4(mdo sde): khams yan+tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'dadas de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol
281b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste
281b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan chen po bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de skad ces
281b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
281b8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes
282a1(mdo sde): bu dam pa de gnyis kyi zhing gi yon na bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe ji tsam pa dang / long spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 
282a2(mdo sde): 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par
282a3(mdo sde): bstan du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
282a4(mdo sde): dag kyang smon lam chen po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal
282a5(mdo sde): gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dang / la gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid/ la zung zhig dang bshad// byang chub sems dpa'
282a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de
282a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med de/ de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar bshad kyang rtog par sla ba ma yin// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
282a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe dngag tu med du zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'o
282b1(mdo sde): dus 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par zhun
282b2(mdo sde): de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongasu mya ngan la
282b3(mdo sde): 'das nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu 'grub ste/ lhag chad med par 'gyuraro// gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba med par
282b4(mdo sde): zad do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ de dag tu rgyu/ na mi chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar
282b5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'od dpag tu med yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag da nga / shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
282b6(mdo sde): ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
282b7(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
282b8(mdo sde): phyug rin po che du ma bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de mngon par rdzogs par sa/ 
283a1(mdo sde): rgyas nas/ 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal
283a2(mdo sde): brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag na de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bstan kyang mtha' rtogs
283a3(mdo sde): par mi nus// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon+dan gyi rgyu ni de snyed du 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan
283a4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bko/ dad pa gang dag yod pa yon+dan gyi bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i
283a5(mdo sde): char yang mi chog/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi chad nga / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
283a6(mdo sde): kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis gang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos
283a7(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal
283a8(mdo sde): brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chog ste/ steng gi cha dang / brgya steng gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// 
283b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug du 'gyu ro// de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum du gnas par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
283b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ 
283b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer
