361a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// ltad mo mi 'dod bkra shis 'dod ma yin// g.yon phyogs lam la de ni bsten mi 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten log lta gang dag dang // lam gol gang dag yin pa der mi mos// / 
361a3(mdo sde): rgyal phran tsam gyis chog par de 'dzin cing // su dang yang ni 'thab tu 'gro mi byed// tshig 'byung med cing mya ngan med par 'gyur// de yi sems la yongasu yi tshad med// de la yid mi ches
361a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur la// bsam pa ngan dang gnod pa byed pa med// rgyal po'i pho brang gang du de smra ba// rgyal po dang ni rgyal 'khor grags par 'gyur// skyab la nad kyis nam
361a5(mdo sde): kyang de mi thebs// za mar mi 'gyur ma ning 'gyur ma yin// legs par gnas shing bde dang ldan 'gyur la// de yi lus la nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur// rmi lam du ni sdig pa mi
361a6(mdo sde): rmi la/ des ni ji ltar ston pa de tshe shes// des ni yang dang yang du gter rnyed de// bde gshegs mchod rten mchod pas de ltar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba
361a7(mdo sde): phul ba'i son de ni 'dun pa bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi 'dun pa dang / longs spyod kyi 'dun pa dang / rigs btsun par skye ba'i 'dun pa dang / shes rab 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu
361a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas/ 'dun pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de
361b1(mdo sde): skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul// de yi lus rdzogs pa dang stobs cher 'gyur// de ni nam kyang rtsod pa
361b2(mdo sde): sten mi byed// dbang phyug tshugs pa med pa phyogs bcur spyod// drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul// rnam par grags pa'i longs spyod ldan pa dang // yon+dan mchog ldan rab
361b3(mdo sde): mchod khyim du skye// skyes nas tshe rabs dran pa nyid du 'gyur// g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mchog ldan 'gyur// srog chags rnams la rtag tu snying brtse byed// rtag tu mi 'tshe shin
361b4(mdo sde): tu nges par 'gyur// rnam ltung 'gro ba'i khyim du de mi skye/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me/ dbul ba phul bas/ yongasu dag pa bzhi thob ste/ bzhi gang
361b5(mdo sde): zhe na lus yongasu dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / yid yongasu dag pa dang / 'dza' bshes yongasu dag pa'o// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de skye ba'i gnas
361b6(mdo sde): de dang / de dag tu skyes pa na/ srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur te/ de srog gcod pa mi byed do// ma byin par mi le no// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong bar 'gyur te/ rang gi chung ma
361b7(mdo sde): la yang log par mi sten to// 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang btung ba spong bar byed// sen gang yang dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon nam/ bong ba 'am/ khu tshur ram/ mtshon char gyur pa gang
361b8(mdo sde): yang rung bas rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed/ de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ldog par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu de dag ni lus kyi yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// de la ngag gis yongasu dag pa gang
362a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ de brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin te/ de ma mthong ba 'am ma thos pa rjod par mi byed la/ mthong ba dang thos pa dris pa yang dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed de/ de
362a2(mdo sde): mthong ba 'am/ thos pa dris na yang dag par smra bar byed/ de bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don tu yang rung ste/ log par mi smra'o// gzhan dag gis brdzun du smra ba btsal ba'i tshe
362a3(mdo sde): yang dag par shes na bden pa srung bar byed de/ ngag gi yongasu ma dag pa de dag spang bar byed// de dag dbye ba'i phyir 'di nas thos pa pa bir mi snyed/ de dag dbye ba'i phyir pa bi nas
362a4(mdo sde): thos pa 'di mi snyod de/ 'thun pa rnams ni gcugs pa dar byed cing / bye ba rnams la ni sdum byed do// de dag rtsub po spangs pa yin te/ ngag gang zher 'debs pa brlang ba
362a5(mdo sde): gzhan la rtsub pa/ gzhan la mi bde ba/ mi sdug pa/ ma 'dod pa/ mi dga' ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ gzha na la gnod pa/ khon du 'dzin pa'i ngag de lta bu spangs nas/ 
362a6(mdo sde): ngag mnyen pa/ 'jam pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bden pa/ rnar snyan pa/ snying du sdug pa/ mdza' bar 'gyur ba/ skye bo mang po mgu ba/ skye bo mang po 'dod pa/ dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba
362a7(mdo sde): dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de lta bu'i ngag smra'o// de tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/ de spang bar bya ba gzhan dang mi smra ba yin/ de gzhan gyi lag rtsis dang brda' sbed par byed do// de
362a8(mdo sde): mang du smra bar mi byed/ dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed la mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i tshig mi smra ste/ de ltar de dag gi las yongasu ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu ngag gi
362b1(mdo sde): las yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// de yid kyi las yongasu ma dag pa spong ba yin te/ de brnab semasu mi byed cing de gzhan gyi nor dang / gzhan gyi rdzas dang / gzhan gyi yo byad dag la
362b2(mdo sde): brnab sems mi bskyed// de gnod sems mi byed de/ gnod sems spong ba yin// log par lta ba yang spong ste/ sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yino// de ltar yid kyi las yongasu ma
362b3(mdo sde): dag pa spong ba 'di ni yid kyi las yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// mdza' bshes yongasu dag pa yang 'thob ste/ gang dag brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang btung ba spangs pa
362b4(mdo sde): dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba can de dag la de ston cing gong du yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
362b5(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sa sa rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la yang sten cing bsnye na la bsnyen bkur byed de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongasu dag pa
362b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa ste/ mdza' bshes yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dbul ba phul bas/ yongasu dag pa bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// bcom
362b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnam par sbyang phyir bde gtse
362b8(mdo sde): gsungs pa la// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis shin tu bsdam// lta ba ma rnyed tshul khrims rnam par dag/ de yi mig ni yid las byung ba yin// nyi bzhin phyogs rnamasu ni shin
363a1(mdo sde): tu gsal// de yis zag pa zad pa myur du shes// de yi blo ni rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur// lha mig rdul dang bral zhing zag pa med// blo ldan de yis 'jig rten
363a2(mdo sde): sems rnams dang // lha yi mngon shes so so rig pa shes// 'dod na nyan thos byang chub rnyed mi dka'// mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin// drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me
363a3(mdo sde): phul// gal te sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod na'ang sla// blo ldan pa la gsum char nyams pa med// shes rab mig ldan longs spyod chen por 'gyur// shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po la yang / 
363a4(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/ bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phu la nas/ skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu/ 'dun par 'gyur
363a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mig mchog 'thob pa dang / dran pa bltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa dang / bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs pas
363a6(mdo sde): nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i lha'i mig mchog 'thob pa dang / shes rab yong su rdzogs pas tshul khrims nyams pa med pa 'thob pa dang / sngon bsod nams byas pas mtho ris
363a7(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang / bsod nams legs par byas pas dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / sems can tha~Md kyi mig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / shA ri'i/ 
363a8(mdo sde): bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob ste/ de la yang zhe 'gras pa med pa'i yid dang ldan zhing / mchog tu blta
363b1(mdo sde): na sdug par 'gyur ba 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen po thob cing mig stong dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'am/ tshangs pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i tshangs par yang 'gyur te/ 
363b2(mdo sde): grags pa'i bstan thob par 'gyur ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pas 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad po de dag 'thob bo// gzhan yang chos brgyad po thob
363b3(mdo sde): ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dpag tu med pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs pa dpag tu med pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang / sangs
363b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas da kyi ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi she/ sa rab dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol
363b5(mdo sde): ba dpag tu med pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa dpag tu med pa la 'jug pa thob ste/ shA ri'i bu mar me phul bas de ltar rnam par smin pa dpag tu med
363b6(mdo sde): pa yongasu bzung ba yin// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang seMn gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa na/ kye e ma'o chos 'chang // kye e ma'o chos rab tu ston to zhes/ mar me dbul
363b7(mdo sde): pa 'bul ba 'bul ba'i mar me de/ til gyi mar mer rjesu bzung bas chos kyi mar me rjesu 'dzin par byed// de mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshegs dpag tu med pa brgyad thob ste/ 
363b8(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ dran pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa thob ste/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ blo gros kyi tshogs dang / dad pa'i tshogs dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshogs dang / shes rab kyi chog
364a1(mdo sde): dang / ting 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / spobs pa'i tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa thob ste/ tshogs dpag tu med pa brgyad po de dag thob par 'gyuraro// 
364a2(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang thob ste/ rims kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du thob par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
364a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ de dang ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ chos mchog tu byung ba brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs mchog
364a4(mdo sde): tu 'byung ba thob pa dang / g.yog 'khor mchog tu 'byung dab thob pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu byung ba dang / dalha dang mi rnamasu skye ba mchog tu byung ba dang / dad pa mchog/ 
364a5(mdo sde): tu byung ba dang / spobs pa mchog tu byung ba dang / kun na sa nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob pa da / nga / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// 
364a6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir dpag tu med pa zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la des mchod pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa'i phyir te/ phan yon dpag tu med pa yin// de nas de'i tshe bcom
364a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ brtsam byos mngon par 'byung bar gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos// 'dam+bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde rnams gzho/ 
364a8(mdo sde): par gyis// shes ched du brjod pa de ched du brjod pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par
364b1(mdo sde): dka' ba ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ mir skye ba thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / de la mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims yongasu rdzogs pa dang // 
364b2(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag ni son thams cad kyis mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ de dag ni khyed rnams kyis thob zi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
364b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub don phyir sems can phan 'dod pas// 
364b4(mdo sde): bde gshegs mchod rten dbul ba 'dir phul nas/ mkhas pa de yis byis pa'i las nges ni// tshe rabs kun tu khyad par can du 'gyur// 'di nas shi 'bos lnga
364b5(mdo sde): mis bsngags pa yis// yang srid dam pa de ni thob pa ra 'gyur// ri rab bzhin du de ni mi g.yo la// 'o zer dag gis phyogs kun snang zhing mdzes// lha tshogs
364b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mthong nas gus dang bcas// mchog tu gus pas de la dag bskyed// bstod pa byed cing de la mchod pa byed// yang dang yang du lta bas ngoms pa med// bsod
364b7(mdo sde): nams mtshan byas de ni lhas mchod 'os// tshangs pa'i gnas na tshangs pa mdzes pa 'dra// ci yi las shig nges par nges bsten na// gang gis de yi lus ni shin tu mdzes
364b8(mdo sde): 'din bsod nams mi 'dod su zhig yod// 'phags pa'i tshul khrims mkhas pa su mi sten// thub pa mthong na lta bas mi ngoms te// chos thos nas ni su zhig bag mi byed/ 
365a1(mdo sde): mi'i 'jig rten gnas tshe de yis ni// bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas shing // bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la gnas byas pas// 'din rgyu/ 
365a2(mdo sde): mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed// mi yi lus ni bdag gi thob gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i bstan la dang ba mchog thob shig/ gal te bag med gyur na lus 'dor gyi// chos kyi dam pa 'ang
365a3(mdo sde): bar yong mi 'gyur// mi lus rnyed par dka' ba thob gyur na// blun rnams ci phyir rang gi don mi byed// bde gshegs bstan la gnod byed sems ldan na// shi nas g.yangs chen
365a4(mdo sde): por ltung bar 'gyur// de yi 'byor pa rgyal chen lhas thos na sa// skyo ba skyes te smon lam 'debs byed pa// mi da yi lus ni bdag gis theb gyur cig/ legs don gyur
365a5(mdo sde): nas tshangs spyod bdag ston shog/ 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe/ yang de bzhin du// chos la phan zhing sems la gsal gyur cig/ lha steng bye ba lha mor bcas pa yis// 
365a6(mdo sde): de ni bdag gi yin zhes dga' bar byed// lha yi bu mo yid 'ong brgyan pa rnams// skyed mos tshal bzhir de ni rtse byed 'jug/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos ngang kun nas ldang // glu dbyangs snyan pa
365a7(mdo sde): sgra yang thos par 'gyur// bsngags pa'i lha de ga las gar 'gro ba// de dang der ni gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong // mi sdug gzugs ngan nam kyang mi mthong ste// rgyal ba'i mchod rten
365a8(mdo sde): mar me phul bas 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos mi yi srid pa 'dir// dran dang ldan zhing ma yis mngal na gnas// btsas nas geng nas shi 'phos tshe rabs dran// 'phags pa'i ye shes
365b1(mdo sde): stobs las nyams mi 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas pas// de yis las byas pa ni de nyid kyis// 'khor los sgyur ba'i mi bdag stobs chen ldan// yid 'ong
365b2(mdo sde): gzugs bzang blta na dga' ba 'gyur// de yis las byas pa des tshe ring 'gyur// gcig tu dag pa nyid kyis bde dang ldan// do yi lus ni nad kyis snyom mi spongs// mar me phul
365b3(mdo sde): ba'i rnam smin de yin// bde bar gshegs la mar mes mchod byas pas// rkun po'i gnod med rgyal po'i chad pa med// gshed ma med cing chung ma byi bo med// de ni las kyis nas/ 
365b4(mdo sde): kyang gtso mi 'gyur// bde zhing lo legs gang du'ang 'jigs pa med// rtag tu 'byor cing legs 'byor nor 'bru lnga na// de yi skyed mas tshal mchog phreng ba dang // tshal dang
365b5(mdo sde): shing phran lo ma sna tshogs rgyun// de yis 'jig rten gtsu bo sangs rgyas mthong // mthong nas kyang ni mchog tudaga' 'gyur te// de dag rnams la gus par de mchod byed/ 
365b6(mdo sde): rgyal srid spangs nas dge slong nyid la sten// bsngags pa mtha' yas gzigs pa mtha' yas shing // mtha' yas blo ldan bde gshegs mchod rten la// mar me phul bas mtha' yas
365b7(mdo sde): blo ldan 'gyur// mar me bzhin du phyogs rnams kun tu gsal// mar me chen pos skyes mchog thub pa yi// mchod rten gsal byas rnam dag mig gis ni// byang chub rdul bral zag pa
365b8(mdo sde): med theb nas// de phyogs kun tu mar me bzhin du gsal// bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul bas na// rnam grol blo mnga' stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing // de bzhin mi 'dres chos kyi
366a1(mdo sde): pha rol byon// kun nas spyan ldan bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// phyogs rnams dag na bgrang byas 'jig rten khams// gang dag ji snyed yod pa ma lus
366a2(mdo sde): pa mar me lta bur me yi rgyu yis ni// ma lus pa dag rtag tu snang byas 'gyur// bdag nyid che la mar me phul ba las// mthu 'byung gang yin de ni de yin// mar me 'dra ba dag la son kun// 
366a3(mdo sde): lhag byas gal te mthu chen don dam mthong // rang rgyal rnamasu gyur la de mchod phyir// gcig 'gas mar me 'bar bar byas gyur la// mar me snying po ri rab tsam pas shing // de yis 'jig
366a4(mdo sde): rten ma lus snang byed la// rnam pa de 'dras mtha' yas phyogasakun tu// gal te mar me dbul bar byed gyur la// rang rgyal byang chub tu ni smon sems kyis// bskal pa brgya
366a5(mdo sde): phrag mtha' yas 'bar bar byed// gang zhig byang chub phyir ni smon sems kyis// mchod rten mchog la rtswa mes ga sal byed na// de bas de mchog 'bras bu ches che
366a6(mdo sde): zhing don dam gzigs pa sangs rgyas rnams gsung // phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpag med pa// rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir// re res de bzhin mar me rnams
366a7(mdo sde): phul zhing // bskal pa grangs med de dag 'bar byed la// 'jig rten ched du bde gshegs nyid 'dod cing // gang zhig 'jig rten dam pa'i mchod rten la// mar me 'bul lam lan cig
366a8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal na// de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong dka' bas mi khyab// thos nas dad dang dga' ba skyed par byed// dad med chos mchog
366b1(mdo sde): mthob byis pa rnams// zhus zhum por ni shin tu byed par 'gyur// de phyir 'jig rten kun mgon gang yin pa// dag chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' bas// thub rnams spyan/ 
366b2(mdo sde): sngar shin tu dang sems kyis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du smon lam thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / thams cad dang ldan
366b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mar
366b4(mdo sde): me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha dab ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus
366b5(mdo sde): te gtan la phab po// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya karma A ba ra Na pra tis
366b6(mdo sde): ba dI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha
366b7(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
366b8(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas/ 
367a1(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom
367a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
367a3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ son gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
367a4(mdo sde): 'tshal bas las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
367a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
367a6(mdo sde): par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
367a7(mdo sde): bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 'di
367a8(mdo sde): skad du/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ 
367b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo/ 
367b2(mdo sde): rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ 
367b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnga rab tu brdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu brdung ba/ chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ 
367b4(mdo sde): nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas/ phyag bgyi ba'i gnas
367b5(mdo sde): ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/ mkhyen par gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag la/ bdag mgo dang / ngag
367b6(mdo sde): dang yid kyis phyag 'tshalo// thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis gzir ba/ gti mug gis gzir ba
367b7(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis las kyi sgrib pa gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ sangs rgyasu ma 'tshal ba dang / cho su ma 'tshal ba dang / dge 'dun du ma 'tshal ba dang / dge ba dang / 
367b8(mdo sde): mi dge bar ma 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag byung ba dang / chos spangs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / dge 'dun dgra bcom pa bku
368a1(mdo sde): / pa dang / pham 'bum pa dang / lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam pa zhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang / bgying du stsal
368a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba dang / seMn kha cig la ngag rtsub po smras pa dang / skur pa btab pa dang / srang la g.yo bgyis pa dang / gzhal ba la g.yo bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba
368a3(mdo sde): drug tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na pha ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang / gang zag gi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang / 
368a4(mdo sde): ji ltar bslab pa'i bzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang 'dagal ba bgyis pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpo dan gyis bsgo ba ma mnyan pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la
368a5(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen pol yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i so/ 
368a6(mdo sde): rnams la mi snyan par bgyis pa dang / spros pa dang / brdegs pa dang / de dag la tha ba dang / zhe sdang bskyed pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna las byung ba'i sems kyis/ sangs
368a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang / chos la chos ma lags shes bgyis pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos lags shes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
368a8(mdo sde): 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/ sman du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo// 
368b1(mdo sde): mi 'cha'o// sman chad kyang mi bgyid// bdag las kyi sgrib pa gang gis sgribs te/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lda ma yin
368b2(mdo sde): gyi tshogs kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mau kham pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di
368b3(mdo sde): nyid la rnam par smin te/ gzhan du mi myong bar shog shig/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen
368b4(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan snga/ ra so sor 'chag so// 'thil lo// mau 'cha'o// sman ched kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems
368b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa/ na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa da nga / ma bcab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib
368b6(mdo sde): pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems
368b7(mdo sde): dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chagaso// 'thol lo// 
368b8(mdo sde): mi 'chab bo// sngan chad mi bgyid// ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam
369a1(mdo sde): so sor 'chags pa dang / mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad mi bgyid do// 
369a2(mdo sde): ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags
369a3(mdo sde): pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang / so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chad mi bgyid do// 
369a4(mdo sde): zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ ri gas kyi bu ma chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas/ 'di bzhin du las kyi
369a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par/ bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa/ nor che ba/ 
369a6(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ sa le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang po/ shin tu skyid pa/ gzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib
369a7(mdo sde): pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la
369a8(mdo sde): chen po lta bu drug pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ so le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang ba/ shin tu skyid pa/ gzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 
369b1(mdo sde): 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs
369b2(mdo sde): bar skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
369b3(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de bzhin
369b4(mdo sde): du 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dgazhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangadas pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang
369b5(mdo sde): tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes
369b6(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu che dang / son 'du shes med pa dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs mtshung
369b7(mdo sde): par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su gzugs med pa na mkha'
369b8(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / 'du shes med/ 
370a1(mdo sde): 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor
370a2(mdo sde): bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
370a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rigs pa
370a4(mdo sde): gsum nam/ mngon par shes pa drug gam/ stobs rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ 1dan thos dbang che bar grags pa 'am/ rang byang chub mngon
370a5(mdo sde): sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcu ba par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su thams cad
370a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye she
370a7(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de
370a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan gyis gzhan skye'o// gzhan 'gag go/ de la 'das pa'i
370b1(mdo sde): chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'gag pa zad pa bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa chung zad kyang medo// da ltar 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung ba/ 
370b2(mdo sde): ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa chung zad kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni stong po/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa
370b3(mdo sde): gang zag med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gag pa/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byung yang bdag kyang yod pa ma yin// shA ri'i bu/ 
370b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di lta ste/ son med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni/  las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di
370b5(mdo sde): ni so sor bshags pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos
370b6(mdo sde): kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung
370b7(mdo sde): ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rje su yi rang bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
370b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du bla gos
371a1(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag
371a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de dag thaMd la
371a3(mdo sde): rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med
371a4(mdo sde): pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las
371a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrim sa las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba/ 
371a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rango // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su
371a7(mdo sde): dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thaMng
371a8(mdo sde): la rje su yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rirang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang // byang chub sems dpa' gang da lta na sems dang po bskyed pa de dag gi
371b1(mdo sde): dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa brgyas byung ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang
371b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang
371b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnya
371b4(mdo sde): pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo // byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
371b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang la gas pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mcho ga gis rje su yi rangango // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang
371b6(mdo sde): gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
371b7(mdo sde): pas rje su yi rang ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
371b8(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gi rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / 
372a1(mdo sde): rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjesu li
372a2(mdo sde): rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
372a3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su ying ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / 
372a4(mdo sde): gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag/ na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam/ pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi ngo // skye bo mang po la
372a5(mdo sde): sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du sngon
372a6(mdo sde): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi
372a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung ba/ chos kyi char rab tu phab pa/ chos kyi char rab tu gtang ba/ chos kyi rnga rab tu rdung
372a8(mdo sde): ba chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi srog shing bsgreng ba/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ sems can thaMd la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad/ 
372b1(mdo sde): pa nyam bag tu spyod du btsud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan
372b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar
372b3(mdo sde): gyi rje su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / 
372b4(mdo sde): bde ba'i slad du ma 'ongs po'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi
372b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
372b6(mdo sde): 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thaMd la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa
372b7(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi
372b8(mdo sde): don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i sladadu/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
373a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs
373a2(mdo sde): pa chos kyi char rab tu gtong ba/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi rnga brdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdung ba/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa chos
373a3(mdo sde): kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du mdzud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang
373a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan po'i sems can dag/ dgi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thaMd la/ 
373a5(mdo sde): rjesu yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rjesu yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes yi ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di
373a6(mdo sde): ni rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rje su yi rang ba nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po grangs me/ 
373a7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa bskyed// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
373a8(mdo sde): dag thams cad dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos zas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / 
373b1(mdo sde): yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang zhig rje su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med/ dpag tu med pa bskyed// shA ri'i bu de
373b2(mdo sde): bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rje su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang bar bya'o// / 
373b3(mdo sde): bud med skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'dod cing bud med kyi dbang po rjes par 'dod pas kyang rje su yi rang ba 'di rje su yi rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
373b4(mdo sde): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par
373b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / de ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rna mas kyi mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ba'i bskul ba'i phra nga po bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
373b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
373b7(mdo sde): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
373b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
374a1(mdo sde): lha ngas la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bla na med pa
374a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsko
374a3(mdo sde): bar bskal gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skye bo mang po lo sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / 
374a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol// chos kyi
374a5(mdo sde): tshul rab tu gzung du gsol// chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzadadu gsol// chos kyi char dbab du gsol/ chos kyi
374a6(mdo sde): brdung du gsol/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/ chos kyi dung 'bud du gsol/ chos kyi srog shing bsgreng du gsol/ zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi
374a7(mdo sde): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ 
374a8(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos drag pa gcig tu bzar la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas
374b1(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ tshe'i 'du byed ma btang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas
374b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol ba 'debs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bod pa dang / 'jig rten la
374b3(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ chos kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad// chos
374b4(mdo sde): kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong / chos kyi rnga ni rab tu brdung / chos kyi rnga bo che ni rab tu/ brdung / chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/ chos kyi srog shing ni
374b5(mdo sde): rab tu bsgreng / chos kyi sgron ma ni mched par mdzad/ se ni thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/ 1ma bag tu spyod du 'jug cing re zhig bzhugasu gsol/ 
374b6(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba de bzhin du/ 'di
374b7(mdo sde): yang yongasu bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debs na
374b8(mdo sde): bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de
375a1(mdo sde): dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dngul ba phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor
375a2(mdo sde): bskor bar bskul na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog ste/ shA ri'i bu
375a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
375a4(mdo sde): dbul ba phul bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs dpa de dag la gsol ba btab na/ de ni de bas bso//  nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// 
375a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems da pa'i spyod pa spyad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/ dge
375a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba des na da la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs
375a7(mdo sde): brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsel zhes/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
375a8(mdo sde): gsol ba bta'o// shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du bzhugs par gsol to// dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
375b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byam pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / yongasu mya
375b2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
375b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la
375b4(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan da dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ 
375b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yongasu bsngo bar bgyi/ de sa da ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
375b6(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
375b7(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ se ni gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
375b8(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba
376a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun nam/ gang zag gam/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba rnams sam/ sems
376a2(mdo sde): can gzhan dag la yang rung ste/ zan chang gcig tsam stsal bar gyur pa gang lags pa dang / 'chags pa gang lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa gang lags pa dang / skyabasu mchi ba gang
376a3(mdo sde): lags pa dang / bslab pa'i bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
376a4(mdo sde): nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de da dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gzhal bzlums te
376a5(mdo sde): sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang / gzung ba ma mchi sa pas son thams cad la stsal to// ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la gtang bar
376a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de btang // sems
376a7(mdo sde): can thams cad la gnas rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang / long spod zad mi shes pa dang / bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / chos zad mi shes pa dang / ye shre
376a8(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa dang / spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
376b1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/ gzhal bzlums te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
376b2(mdo sde): yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad
376b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar
376b4(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa de nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
376b5(mdo sde): yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / son/ thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chi nga rgya bar gyur cig
376b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen
376b7(mdo sde): pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i sladadu/ dge ba'i
376b8(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ 
377a1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar da ltan da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir
377a2(mdo sde): spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi hrI
377a3(mdo sde): slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
377a4(mdo sde): rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de ba bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la
377a5(mdo sde): zhugs te/ sang rgyas kyi ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dri ma med pa shin tu dkar ba la bzhugs nas bdud sdig can bcom ste/ shes par bgyi ba dang / blta
377a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba dang / rtogs par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya reng 'char kar skad cig gcig dang ldan
377a7(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi bsnyes te 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can tha~Md kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par
377a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
377b1(mdo sde): med dang / 'od mchog dang / 'od dge dang / bsod nams 'ad dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer btu pa dang / 'od zer mtho dang / 'od dra ban dang / rin can
377b2(mdo sde): 'phro dang / 'od 'bar dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / shin tu brgyan dang / rin chen teg dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / yan lag mchog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
377b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
377b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas/ ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye ba mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thu dgas brtse ba dang / skye bo bal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams
377b5(mdo sde): kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi'o/ khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag da nga sems can thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par
377b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / 
377b7(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar shog ces brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongasu bsngo ba'i phung po ste/ 
377b8(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas/ yongasu bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
378a1(mdo sde): zhig mdo 'di len tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ don bsod nams kyi phung po
378a2(mdo sde): de bas ches mang du grangs med/ dpag tu med pa skyed// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus
378a3(mdo sde): thob par gyur la/ snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas kyang / rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsti stang dang / bu dung bya ba'i
378a4(mdo sde): phyir gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gso sa sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/ rim gro bya ba la lan cig kyang / 
378a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam gyi rin po che rnams yongasu zad par byas la/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang // de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun te/ gser dang
378a6(mdo sde): dngul dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las 'phang du dpag tshad bcu par byas te/ de dag la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
378a7(mdo sde): ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
378a8(mdo sde): lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di 'dzin tame/ kun chub par
378b1(mdo sde): byed dam/ 'don par byed dam/ klog gam/ skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/ don debs
378b2(mdo sde): bsod nams ches mang du skyed/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA
378b3(mdo sde): ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bsgrub pa 'di la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
378b4(mdo sde): bskul ba'i phyi ro// shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na'adadi lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad // / de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/ 
378b5(mdo sde): so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga so la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'angs ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
378b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// bsgrub pa
378b7(mdo sde): la gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dam pa'i chos de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
378b8(mdo sde): bar 'tshal zhing don du gnyer ba lagaso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i me tog man+da rabs mngon par gtor to// mngon
379a1(mdo sde): bar gtor nas kyang / tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skur pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa
379a2(mdo sde): rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras bgyid pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhi no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/ 
379a3(mdo sde): 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'od zer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya
379a4(mdo sde): ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 2'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur dab/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
379a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung // lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni/ 
379a6(mdo sde): lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to// de'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus pa ni bye ba phrag 'bum yod de/ thaMd kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa sha stag/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa na/ 
379a7(mdo sde): bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa sha stag go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni/ bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod/ 
379a8(mdo sde): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ rag pa zad pa sha stag/ lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de/ spangadang / 
379b1(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o// lha'i dbang po de'i tshe bud med gang ga'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig/ 'a
379b2(mdo sde): 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po las mngon sum du bzung / kun chub
379b3(mdo sde): bar byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de de nas shi 'phos nas/ bred
379b4(mdo sde): med kyi lus spangs te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ rtag/ dbar rgyun tu lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ dan brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas/ 
379b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur to// ko'u shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na/ sangs rgyas rgya zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyan chos ston te/ ngas da lta na yang mthong ngo / 
379b6(mdo sde): ko'u shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das
379b7(mdo sde): par nges par 'gyuraro// bud med gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongasu ma
379b8(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun
380a1(mdo sde): gcad pa gcas smras byed pa 'ad// denus pamam ldan 'das las 'dab bye sa spri nalags //  rdzun ma
380a2(mdo sde): grangs 'dir ming ci lags/ 'di rda ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de gad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau ru shi ka
380a3(mdo sde): de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar rung zhig/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ 'di som nye gcod pa zhes bya bar
380a4(mdo sde): yang rung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pa/ 'phrul nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshong pa ni don pa shA ri'i bu dang / swa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / 
380a5(mdo sde): dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten med rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed do// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib brgyan gcad pa zhes bya batheg
380a6(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po/ dA nA shI la la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing / gtan
380a7(mdo sde): la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+hirma ke du d+ha dza ba ri brits+tsha nA ma mahA
380a8(mdo sde): yAn sU / bod skad du// 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ 
380b1(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor dar byang chub sem
380b2(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med
380b3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su 'gyur/ 
380b4(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang lnga na par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba/ de dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu mi gtong ba dang / dgon/ 
380b5(mdo sde): pa brten cing 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / bla ma dang mkhan po'i gang ma ngag yongasu btsal ba dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
380b6(mdo sde): ba dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
380b7(mdo sde): 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo
380b8(mdo sde): rdzogas+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya s+t+ri bi bar ta d+ya kar Nan nA ma ma hA lan sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung
381a1(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la drug 'tsha'o// 'di na bdag gis thos bdus gcig na/ 
381a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa/ thob pa/ spobs
381a3(mdo sde): bzegs pa med pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i rjesu song ba/ sha stag la
381a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bang rim 'dzin dang / mchod sbyin rus 'dzin dang / sdang ba'i blo gros dang / rnam pa
381a5(mdo sde): dag pa'i blo gros dang / sbyangs pa'i blo gros dang / khyad pa ri blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / 'phel ba 'i blo gros dang / mthong dga' dang / legs mthong dang / 
381a6(mdo sde): cher snang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong la sogs pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems
381a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha~Md kyang 'khor de nyid du 'das par gyur te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu rnams
381a8(mdo sde): dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang / grong rdal dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas
381b1(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ smad g.yogs dang / chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom ldan
381b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
381b3(mdo sde): 'das ma dang gsum bdag gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa zhig mthong ste/ des phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag
381b4(mdo sde): ste/ rab 'byor sang khyod kyis sngon ma thos pa'i chos bsta/ dran pa thos par 'gyuraro zhes/ de skad ces bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang gi snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan
381b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni rigs kyi bu 'am gas kyi bu mo ches 'dod pa rnams kyi sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yeno// de nas bcom ldan
381b6(mdo sde): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
381b7(mdo sde): rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po'i khab
381b8(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la zhugaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chagasu bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing song ba las/ khyim bdag gcig
382a1(mdo sde): gis gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ sgo gang gi nang logasu cang mi smra bar sdod do// de nas khyim de'i nang nas bud med mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ bltan
382a2(mdo sde): sdug pa/ rgyan gyis legs par klubs te/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser gyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dpal shin tu 'bar ba/ kha dog rgyas shing mdzes pa dang / 
382a3(mdo sde): ldan pa zhig byung // de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci zhig
382a4(mdo sde): bzhed pa'i slad du sgo gang 'di na gzhes/ rab 'byor gyis smra sa pa/ che zhe bdag ni bsod snyoms 'dod pa'i phyir/ sgo gang 'di ni sdod de// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa
382a5(mdo sde): rab 'byor khyod la da rung yang bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes la byung lags sam/ btsun pa rab 'byor da rung yang / bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes thug sum chud dam/ rab 'byor
382a6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag gi bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes ni khong du chud mod kyi/ 'on kyang pha ma las skyes pa'i lus 'bras can dang / zan dron gyis bskyed pa 'di zas med kyi bar du 'a
382a7(mdo sde): bar mi nuso// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis mo rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ 
382a8(mdo sde): pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba
382b1(mdo sde): 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang mya ngan
382b2(mdo sde): dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'gag pa mngon sudam mdzad dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chen bdag gis 'gogs pa mngon sum du
382b3(mdo sde): byas// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci zhig ni 'gog par 'gyur/ chos gang ni rab tu bsgom par bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe 'gog pa ni ches gang gis rab tu bsgom par bya ba yang ma yin/ 
382b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te 'gog pa ches gang gi rab tu bsgom pa yang ma lags na/ btsun pa rab 'dar gyi lus bsod snyoms kyis ji ltar 'tshe bar 'gyur/ 
382b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ che zhe 'gog pa la snyom par zhugs te/ tsherang thams cad bkag pa las langs pa'i lus 'tshe bar byed/ byed// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te gtan du
382b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das na/ khyod kyi lus ji ltar 'tshe ba la 'jug par 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni lus 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras pa/ 
382b7(mdo sde): des na bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu ma bstan tam/ smras pa/ che zhe de yin// smras pa/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de rgyu bar
382b8(mdo sde): rab tu rgyu ba lags sam/ smras pa/ tshe zho ma yin no// smras pa/ 'on ci'i slad du/ btsun pa rab 'byor bsod nyams la rgyu ba mdzad/ smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni lus che ba'i phyir
383a1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma yin gyi/ srog gi phyir tsher ba dgag pa'i don du bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dadung yang tshor bas phrogs sam/ smras
383a2(mdo sde): pa/ che zhe bdag ni tsher bas mi phrogs mod kyi/ tsher ba dgag pa'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshungs pa med pa ste/ de ci'i sladadu
383a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ni lus dang sems kyi tsher ba myong ba ma mchis// nyon mongs pa med pa ni lus dang sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma lagaso// nyon mongs pa
383a4(mdo sde): med pa ni dga' ba 'am/ mi dga' ba skyed par mi ba gyi do// nyon mongs pa med pa ni su la yang nyon mongs dpas nye bar gnas pa ma mchis// gzhan yang gang gi slad du
383a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa/ med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan na/ ci'i slad du ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bgyi/ 
383a6(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe dmigs pa med pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa ni/ 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba yino// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ 
383a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhe ma yin// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na nyon mongs pa med pa de ji ltar 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar gyur/ smras pa/ 
383a8(mdo sde): che zhe nyon mongs pa med par bstan pa 'di ni bshad pa tsam du zad// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad pa mchis sam/ smras pa/ che zhe med do// smras pa/ 
383b1(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad pa ma mchis na/ ci zhig 'chad cing bzhugs/ smras pa/ che zhe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni tha snyad tsam gyis tha
383b2(mdo sde): snyad du 'dogs par zad do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam du brjod pa mchis pa de tsam du tha snyad 'dog so// ji tsam du tha snyad 'dogs pa de tsam du phyin ci log go/ ji tsam du
383b3(mdo sde): phyin ci log pa de tsam du rtsod par 'gyur// ci tsam du rtsod pa de tsam du dge sbyong gi chos ma lagaso// smras pa/ che zhe 'o na dge sbyong gi chos gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge/ 
383b4(mdo sde): sbyong gi chos ni tha snyad ma mchis pa/ phyin ci ma lo// brtsod pa ma mtshos pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chos dang / chos ma lags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni
383b5(mdo sde): chags pa dang ma chags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yul ma mchis pa dang yul ma lags pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chags pa ma mchis pa dang / ma
383b6(mdo sde): bcing ma grol ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chog shes pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos
383b7(mdo sde): ni phrag dog dang chags pa spangs pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'o// dge slong gi chos ni 'dod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yul thad
383b8(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa dang / zhen pa ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni phung po'i bdud las nges par grol ba'o// dge slong gi chos ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ nyon
384a1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'das pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni ma skyes pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'chi bdag gi bdud dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi
384a2(mdo sde): chos ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par ma bsgribs pa dang / sbyar ba ma lags pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni bdud kyi
384a3(mdo sde): yul las yang dag par 'das pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba'o// dge slong gi
384a4(mdo sde): chos ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang ma 'bags pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yid la byed pa ma mchis pa dang / zam das cad du gos ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi tshes ni mngon
384a5(mdo sde): par zhen pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan mtha~Md dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni khams dang khams ma lags tshul thams cad kyis
384a6(mdo sde): bcos pa ma lags pa dang / bgrang ba dang bral ba dang / gnas ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sgo gang der lha'i
384a7(mdo sde): bu gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa de dag las/ lha'i bu bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i lha'i
384a8(mdo sde): bu lnga brgya ni bud med de'i spobs pa thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ che zhi 'di
384b1(mdo sde): ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ che zhe 'di'i spobs pa 'di 'dra ba las na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom med do snyamo// de nas bud med
384b2(mdo sde): de'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems shes nas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom
384b3(mdo sde): medo snyam du dgongs pa de ni/ ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de nyid thugasu chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang de bzhin nyid khong du chud do// 
384b4(mdo sde): des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
384b5(mdo sde): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de bdag gi de bzhin/ nyid kyang de bzhin nyid de/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
384b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni/ nams kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur ro// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / sems can tha~Md kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni
384b7(mdo sde): nams kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur te/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni res 'ga' de bzhin nyid
384b8(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba ma lags la/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de yang res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags kyi/ rtag tu de bzhin nyid de kho na lagaso// des na bdag ni de bzhin
385a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// bdag gang ban na dgang lags pa dang / sems san thams cad kya pa gan nyid gang lags pa dang / tshem thams cad kyi pan/ 
385a2(mdo sde): gang lags pa de ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid de/ desan bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med des
385a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras// che zhe ci khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te rang gi shis pas shes/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos
385a4(mdo sde): rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chudab sems dpa' rnams sam/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gang yang rung ste/ sems can gzhan gyi
385a5(mdo sde): sems shes pa de dag thaMd ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gan na gyi sems shes pa lagaso// de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa gang lags pa de yang sangs
385a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus mkhyen pa lag so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / mar me dang / skar ma la brten nas/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi
385a7(mdo sde): gzugs rnams mthong ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma rig pa'i mun pa na 'jig rten gnas pa las/ gang su dag pha rol gyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
385a8(mdo sde): pa la brten nas/ shes pa lags// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smraso// che zhe khyod 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa khyod su yin pa dang / 
385b1(mdo sde): ga las 'ong ba bdag la ston cig/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la 'dri ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod su yin pa dang / gang las 'ongs pa bdag la
385b2(mdo sde): ston zhig ces de skad smras na/ ji skad du lan 'debs par 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe chung zad kyang lan gdab du med// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin chos thams cad sprul pa'i
385b3(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes na/ bdag gis ci zhig she su mchis/ gzhan yang gang zhig btsun pa rab 'byor la 'dri ste/ ci khyod so so'i skye bo yin nam/ 'on te slob pa 'am/ dgra
385b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na/ lan ji skad gdab/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems pa la zhugs te/ che zhe 'di'i lan ji ltar gdab par bya snyamo// de nas bar snang
385b5(mdo sde): las btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis chung zad ci thob pa 'am/ rtog pa 'am/ mngon sum du byas pa 'am/ mdo/ na bar rtog pa gang gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes pa de/ 
385b6(mdo sde): che zhe 'di la ston cig ces sgra byung // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bar snang de las sgra byung ba thos nas/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smraso// che zhe bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ 
385b7(mdo sde): slob pa yang ma yin/ dgra bcom pa yang ma yino// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bdag gis ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i gdags
385b8(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag la zung zhig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / yon gnas shes
386a1(mdo sde): bgyi ba lagaso// smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni dgra bcom pa zag bzad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas ma yino// smras pa/ 
386a2(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na shes bzhin gyi brdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhes gal te bdag zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon
386a3(mdo sde): gnas yin par 'dzin par gyur na ni/ de ltar na bdag brdzun du smra bar 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir bdag de ltar mi 'dzin pa de'i phyir/ bdag ni yang dag par smra ba yin gyi brdzun du smra ba zhes
386a4(mdo sde): mi bya'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sgo gang 'dir lha bden pa mthong ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ dus pa rnams la slu bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhes
386a5(mdo sde): bdon pa mthong ba de dag ni bslu bar mi nuso// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis bden pa rnams gzigs sa/ ma/ smras pa/ mthong ngo // smras pa/ gal te bden pa rnam
386a6(mdo sde): mthong du rung na ni/ de dag bden pa ma lags par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bden pa rnams ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bden pa
386a7(mdo sde): mthong ba zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dag so// 
386a8(mdo sde): bden pa mthong zhes bgyi ba de ni/ phyin ci log yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dag so// smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis gang las bsams te de skad smras/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byin
386b1(mdo sde): ci log las nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba gang lags pa de ni/ bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te/ des na phyin ci log yang dag par mthong bas/ bden pa mthong zhes bgyi'o// de na
386b2(mdo sde): sgo gang der chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha 'dus pa de dag gis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la rags pa'i lus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis che zhe 'di'i
386b3(mdo sde): spobs pa thos pa de ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yino// gang dag mos pa
386b4(mdo sde): de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mos pa mang ba rnams ni gang nas kyang / rnam par grol ba med do// mos pa mang ba la ni 'ching ba
386b5(mdo sde): med pas na/ de ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do// de nas bud med des yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la/ 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms la
386b6(mdo sde): rgyur mi zhud dam/ bshos bcad de ci bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhes bdag gis bas ni 'di nyid yin te/ chos mnyan pa 'odi lta bus tshig go/ che zhe gang chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi
386b7(mdo sde): phyir yid mi bde ba skye ba de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshig su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin// gang lus dang / srog dang / bsod snyoms
386b8(mdo sde): 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang tha na legs zhes bya ba 'dod pa de yang chos 'dod pa ma yin no// smras pa/ che zhe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag chos 'dod pa ji lta bu yi/ 
387a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa la mi sred pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang mig dang / gzugs mi 'dod pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang
387a2(mdo sde): ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang / chos mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang chos ci la yang mi rten pa de ni/ chos 'dod pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang
387a3(mdo sde): gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang dmigs
